summary: Mental Health, Stress-free. Based on CBT and Mindfulness
recentChanges: Sanvello is continuously working to improve access to its products and services. This release helps make self-care, coaching and telehealth services available to more individuals.
comments: Easy to use and there's a lot to explore. I wish that the web version had more functionality like the app, and that everything would sync in between the two. It would be easier to do the thought/journal exercises on my computer rather than in the mobile app. It would be nice to have everything available in both web and mobile app.

Wonderfully calm and resourceful! I see a therapist regularly but have found Sanvello to help me in the in-between times. So far love the meditations and articles on the home page. Only thing is I wish I could change the order and content of the tiles on the home page. This might just be a feature I have yet to discover as most things seem to be easy to customize.

I would say this app really helps with stress and puts your mind at ease. They continuesly say that your bad feelings will not last for ever and for me that gives me some kind of validation. I also think this app really focuses on meditation and throughout the meditation you can really just try to let go and connect with yourself. This is my first day on this app but I went on it because I felt anxious and now I just feel relaxed.

I'm definitely a fan of this app! It doesn't block a ton of features so premium isn't super necessary, which is helpful to a teen like me, I love the community features and the personal hope board as well as the mood tracking, it's all very nice and definitely helpful

Sanvello came to me at the right time. I was under tremendous stress and not knowing where to turn. My employer told me about Sanvello and decided to try it. I love that there are so many resources in one app. It's simple to use and it keeps me motivated to stay on top of my feelings and manage my environment.

title: Anxiety Symptoms & Cures
description:
xperiencing occasional anxiety is a normal part of life. However, people with anxiety disorders frequently have intense, excessive and persistent worry and fear about everyday situations. Often, anxiety disorders involve repeated episodes of sudden feelings of intense anxiety and fear or terror that reach a peak within minutes (panic attacks).

These feelings of anxiety and panic interfere with daily activities, are difficult to control, are out of proportion to the actual danger and can last a long time. You may avoid places or situations to prevent these feelings. Symptoms may start during childhood or the teen years and continue into adulthood.

Examples of anxiety disorders include generalized anxiety disorder, social anxiety disorder (social phobia), specific phobias and separation anxiety disorder. You can have more than one anxiety disorder. Sometimes anxiety results from a medical condition that needs treatment.

title: The Tapping Solution
description:
Over 2.5 million people have gone through online events, courses, and trainings of The Tapping Solution. Now The Tapping Solution app is making it easier than ever before to use tapping to lower stress levels, reduce anxiety, get motivated, get better sleep, eliminate negative emotions & much more!

Tapping has been recommended by top doctors, therapists, psychologists, personal development experts and mental health experts including Mark Hyman, M.D., Christianne Northrup, M.D., Wayne Dyer, Louise Hay, Cheryl Richardson, Ruth Buczynski, Ph.D., Dawson Church, Ph.D., Kris Carr, Gabrielle Bernstein, Eric Leskowitz, M.D., & many others!

Tapping is already simple and easy to do and these Tapping Meditations make it effortless for anybody to follow along, tap along, and get quick and lasting results. There is a huge range of topics!

TOPICS INCLUDE:

* Lowering stress about:
work, money, relationships, kids, weight, health, the world and more

* Getting motivated to:
work, exercise, write, eat better, get organized, get productive, change a habit and more

* Releasing negative emotions such as:
anger, sadness, fear, hurt, guilt, shame, resentment, rejection, loneliness, regret, self-doubt and more

* Supporting your body in healing from:
allergies, arthritis, asthma, back problems, high blood pressure, headaches, inflammation, tinnitus and more

* Pregnancy & women's health support for:
nausea, labor pain, information overload, stress, sleep deprivation, whole body relaxation and more

* Relationship support for:
singles that are lonely, breakups, releasing anger, overthinking, pre-date nervousness, forgiveness, difficult conversations, & more

* Weight loss and body confidence support for:
critical self talk, weight loss anxiety, getting back on track, excuse buster, eliminating sugar cravings, love and acceptance

* Sleep support for:
falling asleep, quieting the mind, big day coming up, nightmares, insomnia and more

* Releasing limiting beliefs around money
* Calming anxiety
* Turning a bad day around
* Feeling safe and grounded
* Stopping a panic attack
* Releasing overwhelm
* Quieting the critical voice
* And more!

You can track your daily results with before and after measurements on each meditation to see your results!  And you can track your daily streaks to keep the habit going.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS:

The Tapping Solution offers an auto-renewing monthly subscription at $11.99/month and an auto-renewing yearly subscription at $94.99 which allows you full access to all Tapping Meditations for as long as you maintain an active subscription.

The Tapping Solution also offers a lifetime subscription, which is a one-time only payment of $399.99, giving you unlimited access to all of the tapping meditations inside the app forever.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on your country.

Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your Google Play account at the time of initial subscription purchase.  Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period.  Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period end date, and the cost of the renewal will be listed.  You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to My Subscriptions in Google Play after the purchase.

Read more about Terms & Conditions & Privacy Policy here:
http://thetappingsolutionapp.com/terms.php

comments: The tapping solution app is, hands down, the best thing on my phone. At any point throughout the day...no matter where i am...i can get relief from anxiety, instant motivation to move forward on a project, help with moving past any emotional baggage or blocks, or a peaceful way to move through any overwhelming emotion that might be triggered. Just knowing its there, always ready to use in an instant, is a comfort.

Free items were great and they had decent amt. However I was unable to access the premium items during the free trial and also after I was charged the yearly fee. I contacted support but everything they asked me to do didnt work. Their support was readily available but at times their questions were redundant. I eventually gave up and asked for a refund. (app kept saying to pay then when I clicked the pay button it would pop up showing already paid) Luckily, I was able to get a refund!.

Love this app but I had hoped that the downloaded sessions would play when the app goes down which it does from time to time. They used to but not anymore. And I have found lately they don't play even when the app is working so I have to go and find the session all over again. Downloaded sessions still not working. Wish they would fix this as the live session worked for 2 minutes then I changed session and can't get anything now.

This is a great app and a great style of meditation. I really like how it focuses on affirming feelings, then releasing them. My one complaint is that you can't choose which voice to listen to. Each video is only recorded by one person, so trying multiple meditations in a row can be a little jarring. I tried the paid version hoping it would include that feature, but it did not. (I only do the meditations by Jessica and unfortunately most of the meditations are recorded by Nick. No offense to Nick, just my preference.) Other popular meditation apps have a voice setting to account for personal preferences. Would definitely use this app every day if they added that feature!

I used The Tapping Solution for free to make sure I was committed to using it. After a week I decided to upgrade to premium. My body and mind feel like they are being slowly reprogrammed. For four years my right knee has been sore and painful. Walking up steps was a chore. I have begun to feel relief each day. I am thankful for this process and the Ortners. Don't be afraid to tap and begin to let go.

title: MindReset - Clear your stress in moments!
description:
Clear your mind from anxiety and stress, leaving you free to enjoy a healthier life!

The app was developed based on 20 years of tried and tested behavioural change work in private practice helping many people with a unique method. Interrupting the connection between your negative emotional memories and your brain, clearing your mind and leaving you feeling much better. 

Using advanced eye tracking technology, this unique method is now brought right to your mobile device.

Your brain is being triggered by emotional memories hidden inside your mind, that’s why your problem has been so difficult to diagnose, because it‘s real, you haven’t made it up. Your mind holds the key to why you have too much or too little cortisol or adrenaline leading to massive social anxiety, panic attacks, stress and burnout and even chronic pain, but they are all symptoms of past emotional experiences. 

You may have the time on your hands to master meditation, mindfulness or another healing therapy, which is great. The benefits of meditation are now scientifically proven to be beneficial to your body and mind. You could spend hours practicing DIY meditation at home or simply allow MindReset to accelerate the process for you in minutes.

Fear driven problems associated with anxiety and stress are listed below:

Hyperarousal 
•	angry outbursts
•	irritability
•	sleeping problems (insomnia)
•	difficulty concentrating
•	Tired yet wired
•	Adrenal Fatigue
•	other mental health problems – such as depression, anxiety or phobias, 
•	Self-harming or destructive behaviour – such as drug or alcohol misuse 
•	other physical symptoms – such as headaches, dizziness, chest and other pains and stomach-ache 
•	PTSD, Trauma, Emotional Memory Images, sometimes leads to work-related problems and the breakdown of relationships.
•	M.E. ratio 3 women to 1 man
•	Abdominal pain, cramping or Irritable Bowel Syndrome IBS
•	A bloated feeling
•	Gas
•	Diarrhoea or constipation — sometimes alternating bouts of constipation and diarrhoea
•	Level of depression

Hyporarousal

•	You feel distant and disconnected from your body
•	 Emotional and or Physical Numbness
•	Blank Mind
•	Profound detachment can’t get into or hold onto a relationship or job
•	 Inability to move or respond
•	Extreme drowsiness and even temporary loss of consciousness

Your fear response is the cause of your problems. By interrupting your thoughts, we can clear cached Emotional Memory Images that have been running for years. This ‘chemical imbalance’ is really a neurochemical overload, to an emotional stimulus, draining your body of the vital energy you need to begin your own healing process.

Now the app is here to help, it's fun, quick and simple with a positive long term effect.

title: PinkyMind - Online counselling & therapy chat app
description:
Pinkymind is a leading online counselling platform with qualified and certified Psychologist, therapist and Listeners offering counselling and therapy for Stress, Anxiety, Panic attack, Depression, OCD, Relationship issues.

Launched on April 2nd, 2019, platform has handled over 15,000 chat sessions, 2000 therapy sessions.  

IMPORTANT FEATURES:
-	Remote counsellors offering online counselling and therapy over chat, call and video.
-	We offer Online counselling in Hindi, English and other regional languages
-	All counsellors are qualified, certified and experience
-	You can directly schedule the session with therapist or if you need assistance you can take Quick chat for assistance.
-	Each session is for 45 minutes
-	We offer AFFORDABLEAND ANONYMOUS online counseling

QUALIFIED AND CERTIFIED THERAPISTS
The mental illness may look small, but it can be horrific if the situation is not attended early. Please speak up instead of fighting the battle alone. Pinkymind Counselors or Psychologists or therapists are qualified and certified, who are here to help you to fight back against mental illnesses and burnouts. All online counselling sessions are confidential and if you still wish to keep the conversation anonymous you can do it by taking chat or audio appointment.

WHAT IS PINKYMIND? Why do we need it?
Pinkymind is a easy-to-use platform  for emotional online counselling or Psychology app, Online counselling is a medium for people to reach out, who for one reason or another, are hesitant to discuss their problems. The platform aims to address these problems before they fester and escalate. On Pinkymind you can discuss your problems without revealing your identity. The process is quite simple and secure.

WHO NEEDS OUR SERVICE?
a. People who require support to deal with 
-	Depression
-	Anxiety
-	Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
-	Panic attack
-	Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
-	Mood disorders
-	Stress 
-	LGBTQ
-	Gender identity crisis
b. People who feel lonely and are hesitant to reach out due to social stigma.
c. People who don’t know where to go or whom to reach out to for the support required.
d. People who need online psychologist for family counselling, marriage counselling, personal counselling, child counselling, mental health counselling, psychological online help, Online therapy, career counselling
e. People who searching for counsellor nearby can now download our Pinkymind app and have the feeling the counsellor are near me.

Download Pinkymind app for online counselling and therapy and Book an appointment with the certified counsellor or Psychologist or therapist to have a private conversation today!!

title: Mood Log
description:
Mood Log makes it quick and easy to track your mood. Mood Log provides an extremely flexible logging system making it easy to keep track of any mood related information such as anxiety, depression, menstruation, panic attacks, headaches, cramps, nausea and any other custom records. With each record you can record the severity of the event as well as a custom note and any medications taken.

• Fast, simple and straightforward way to log and track and your mood
• Keeping logs of your mood can be extremely useful for understanding the up and downs to your moods
• Extremely customize-able with the ability to track any tags you want as well as any medication and the quantity taken
• Comes with many mood tags including depression, anxiety, panic attacks, headaches, nausea, cramps and menstruation. These tags can be edited and deleted
• Update records quickly and easily to adjust for changes in your mood 
• View your average mood
• View what the most common type of tag within each category is such as the most common mental, physical, positive, negative and neutral tag
• View a variety of statistics about your records such as your most recent tag, as well as the most recent tag within a given category, such as most recent, mental, physical, positive, negative and neutral
• View statistics related to any specific tag association, such as how many times you tagged your mood with anxiety, depression, headache, cramps, nausea or panic attacks
• View your events in a calendar view. Quickly and easily update, delete or add new events from the calendar view. The calendar view can be useful in finding patterns in your mood
• View your events on a graph by year, month week or all moods at once. The graph view can be useful in finding patterns in moods
• Set reminders either daily, every other day or weekly to help you keep your logs consistent 

Upgrade
• Upgrade Mood Log to enable exporting your records as a spreadsheet that can be viewed with any spreadsheet reading program such as Google Sheets and Microsoft Excel
• Upgrading enables the option to export your logs as a database backup that can be used to restore your records on a new device when switching phones or on the same phone
• Use Dropbox automatic syncing to easily switch between devices while keeping your records synchronized as well as make manual backups to Dropbox
• Upgrading removes ads

Customization
• Choose to have times displayed in AM/PM or 24 hour format
• Select which day of the week to be the first day of the week
• Select which statistics you wish to view on the home screen

Mood Log is an effective Mood Diary, Mood Tracker or Mood Journal

comments: Go to mood tracker: depression, bipolar, anxiety, etc. Simple! you can input at any time. 1-10 mood and different tags (sleepy, happy) also create tags. It tracks when you take medicine or drugs. This is the simplest app without losing functionality. Exactly what you want if you are trying to work with a psychiatrist OR manage mental health on your own. (screw moodpath lol)

I love this app for tracking my moods. With bipolar two disorder, I can combine the info I track here with my fitbit sleep tracker data to provide my psychiatrist with a comprehensive look at my progress with respect to hypomanic and depressive episodes. My only complaint is the graphs. I would like to be able to change or customize how I see the data so I can better analyze trends.

Exactly what you would expect it to do. Log your Moods. Edit: I have used it near every day since I downloaded 2 months ago. They say to gain power over your demons, you must name them. If you make it a habit to recognize your feelings and label them, you will feel better. Just taking the time to jot a few things down will help tremendously. I cannot suggest this app enough. And the custom reminders are beautiful. A notification to be mindful for two minutes? I couldn't ask for more.
best app for recording any time of sessions: gym, Studio, study. The best by far.

I love this app because in addition to the default moods and physical aspects, I can add my own that best reflect how I feel. It's in a quick, easy to use, yet sufficiently detailed format. I best love that I can put in my own notes as short or as long as I want. I don't need the complicated graphs I saw in other apps. The simple words that I use to describe myself in this app best meet my needs and allow me to more clearly convey my life to my doctor and counselor.

title: UP! - Depression, Bipolar & Borderline Management
description:
UP! is a highly automated mood diary. Track your personal warning signs of depression, mania and hypomania effortlessly when needed. UP! supports you in keeping a daily journal of your emotions and habits in the blink of an eye.  With UP!, managing, monitoring and analyzing symptoms of bpd, depression and bipolar just became easier.

Your Benefits
• Increases your competencies to differentiate between normal mood swings and disease symptoms.
• Sharpens your competencies to recognize early warning signs.
• Supports you to better understand the psychology behind your mood.
• The UP! mood diary is a valuable companion for your psychotherapy.
• Supports a collaborative approach to respond on mental health issues even better.

Trilogic telemedical setup: Share your mood with your therapist & trusted people.
• Document your state of mental health and simply generate reports about the past 14 and 30 days in PDF-Format. Discuss the mood diary in your therapy. You can print or directly send reports using your smartphone. 
• Recommend the UP!Doctor web application to your psychiatrist. Connect to it by using a pairing code. Share information effortlessly.
• Better together: Connect with a trusted person from family & friends using the partner app UP! Buddy.

The UP! Community
The UP! mood diary originally was designed for individuals with bipolar I and bipolar II.  Also, bipolar individuals with rapid cycling and mixed episodes are using the app to document their state of mental health. UP! is also used by people with borderline personality disorder (BPD), cyclothymia and recurrent depression. Since UP! in general is an asset to CBT, the app is also successfully used for other mental health conditions like major and recurrent depression, anxiety & panic attacks and post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD).

Highly automated: UP! – the smart mood diary that writes itself.
• The UP! mood diary automatically keeps journal of your physical activity, your work-life-balance, sleeping habits and your social activity. 
• Your personal early warning signs for hypomania, mania or depression are automatically displayed when you report an unusually depressed or elevated mood to UP!
• UP! provides customizable reminders for the fast mood input option and the detailed diary input option.

Advice for usage:
Become more mindful about your mental balance. UP! is designed to foster self-awareness and patient-empowerment. Use the evening for a detailed diary entry to document your habits and your mood but make this also a routine for introspection. Make use of UP! for self-reflection to better detect the connections between your daily life and hypomania, mania and depression. Identify your mood triggers and develop coping strategies for them. Become aware of negative behavioral patterns and establish positive & healthy new ones. Therefor, team up with a health care professional and share the knowledge and information’s gathered with UP!

The science behind UP!
UP! was developed with scientists to support people who must cope with a bipolar affective disorder (bipolar 1 and bipolar 2).  The app digitizes routines and concepts suggested by supranational treatment guidelines and implicitly implements psycho-educative & cognitive behavioral therapeutically (CBT) approaches.

Your feedback matters to us:
 We need feedback to constantly improve the mood diary. Problems, questions, suggestions, praise and criticism - tell us: info@netural.com

TAKE CARE AND DOWNLOAD NOW!

Completely renewed auto recording. Place and activity tracking needs less power and is much more reliable now. UP! is now fully ready for Android O and Android P.

If you find any strange behavior or bugs please use the feedback functionality within UP! and contact us. That helps a lot to improve! Thank you!
comments: # 1): I have only used this application one time, just a moment ago, and I already like it! The only reason that I'm only giving this app three stars, for now, is for the simple reason that I don't know how well this application helps in long-term care. I believe it's got the potential to be very useful, but until I'm certain, I'm not rating four stars or more. If I find that this app is more useful than I expected, then I'll automatically rate it 4 stars, and possibly 5 stars, later on!

It tends to forget what day it is, so when I put in my sleep it is for the day before, but im trying to do today. And when I change the date it erases the previous day. Its very frustrating. I would like to have another mood meter saying something like mad and cool something like that. My warning signs are being angry, not so much being happy and sad. I had a good day and I put I was happy, and it said it was a warning sign but it wasn't and I put down a sad, and it didn't mark a warning sign.

It's a nice app the only bad thing about it is that you have to pay to look back on your previous months if you want to see if you are improving plus there is no option to send this data to your doctor via email I wish I could effort the pay version but I'm on disability and i have barely enough to survive on

I've only been using this for a week but it's really helping me keep track of moods and taking my medicine. However I do think theres room for improvement I think they should add more moods and allow you to note warning signs even if the server doesn't ask you to, I added an elevated mood and it didn't prompt me to enter warning signs and I can't find a way to manually mark them. Sometimes you have to adjust your sleep times. Otherwise great app!

App will try to force you to use location tracking, which seems absolutely unnecessary to me. Also, when I enter +2 anxiety, -2 energy and -1 self-confidence, it'll still say 'I feel okay', which is obviously not the case. I wish you could enter that yourself as well as the UI doesn't do a proper job with that.

title: Relax Lite: Stress Relief
description:
** Voted Top Mind & Body App of 2014 by Leading Doctors **

Effective and rapid stress relief in 5 minutes. 

De-stress with our guided breathing and meditation exercises that use calming music to promote relaxation. It’s an ideal stress management tool, being simple and intuitive.

Finding time to relax can be very difficult for most people. Our app can be easily integrated into your daily life. ""Relax"" by ""Saagara"" enhances the way you feel and leaves you with more energy, stamina, and focus. The more you use it, the better and more effective the results.

UNIQUE FEATURES
- Music cues that use distinct tones for each phase of breathing.
- A structured course that gradually reduces your breathing rate as you progress through the sessions.
- Guided Meditation features an 8 minute session that focuses on different parts of the body.
- Beautiful graphics 
- Quick start feature
- In-app purchase opens up even more features including Intermediate and Advanced Breathing Sessions, and a 12 minute Guided Meditation Session.

HEALTH BENEFITS
Practicing deep breathing for only 5 minutes a day can reduce stress and stress-related illnesses. Practicing deep breathing has the following benefits:

1) Has an almost immediate relaxing effect.
2) Improves focus and reduces anxiety.
3) Lowers blood pressure and heart rate naturally.
4) Improves stamina and fitness by optimizing the usage of your lung capacity.
5) Works as a sleep aid for people affected with Insomnia.
6) Helps in pain management.
7) Helps in managing Headaches and Migraines.

WHO WOULD FIND THIS APP USEFUL
A) People interested in Meditation: 
The guided breathing exercises are not only a great form of breath meditation, but also extremely useful in regulating your breathing during other mediation techniques. The guided meditation is based on Yoga Nidra. Yoga Nidra is a systematic multistage set of relaxation techniques designed to induce deep meditative state. Yoga Nidra techniques have been extensively studied and are used to treat PTSD, anxiety, depression and insomnia.

B) If you have Panic Attacks:
Our guided breathing when used with the quick start function is an extremely rapid and effective technique to help you manage your panic attack and it can used anywhere. When used with headphones you can discretely handle your panic attack almost in any setting from the office, coffee shop, in the park, on a bus, or while flying in a Plane.

C) If you suffer from Insomnia:
The guided breathing technique is very effective in dealing with insomnia. Alway use the same music style to guide the breathing when using the app for insomnia. the more you use the app the more effective it will be. A guide to how to use this app for insomnia can be found at:
http://www.saagara.com/learning-center/guide-to-better-sleep

D) If you have a stressful lifestyle or job:
Both the guide breathing and guided meditation will quickly help re-center and relax you.

**Available in English, French, and Chinese Languages

**Classic Mode is available in the Settings for the classic breathing exercise view. 

Visit our website for more information: http://saagara.com
Make sure you check our our learning center for tips on yoga, diet, and being mindful: http://saagara.com/learning-center

Recommended by Leading Doctors
https://www.healthtap.com/apps/2279

comments: I have the light version and didn't find it helpful from the start. The beginner breathing exercise has no speed adjustment and goes too fast from the very first level. There should be a way to slow down the speed of the breathing in and out, it's going too fast from the very start. Very unpleasant for anyone who is trying to learn deep breathing for the first time. Might be suitable for someone who has done breathing exercises before.
I think this is a great app, that helps me destress very nicely.

i like the audio cues for inhale & exhale. agree with other reviews that the breathing exercises could do with a bit more introduction, however, if you have ever done yoga breathing before this week be simple to use. the meditation is also good, a simple " check in with your body" approach, but british users will definitely Google at the butTOCK part 🤣

I love simplicity of user interface. 8mins meditation is really very useful,this is what i was looking for. Manny other apps are too complicated to use, some have 1 hour meditation, because of that we lose interest. But here due to 8mins we do it regularly.
Great app.. The sounds re kinda relaxing.. And I love it.. Thank you

title: Don't Panic!
description:
Can you survive to level 1000?

Defend yourself by tapping on the screen to emit an attack which neutralises the enemies within it's vicinity.

Up to 1000 levels of difficulty with positive and negative upgrades. 

Positive upgrades include chain attacks, extended range chain attacks and a UV Pulse to help neutralise the enemies. 
Negative upgrades increase the enemies reproduction speed.

Play the game and leave a review with suggestions on what to add to the game.

recentChanges:
Fixed a bug causing "You Died" screen to appear for new players.
New Players start with 100 health instead of 0.
comments: Very fun game, no random ads popping up. Graphics are really cute. Very easy on the eye. Could only get up to level 500! I love this game!!
A simple yet fun game which is surprisingly addictive! Looking forward to the release of the leaderboards in future versions.

title: Psychiatry Pro-Diagnosis,Info,Treatment,CBT & DBT
description:
Psychiatry PRO-Project Reach Out is a free Mental Health App that is akin to having your own Personal Psychiatrist & Psychotherapist all rolled up into one and available to you anywhere anytime.Mental health,wellness & well-being made easy & free.

Based on simple questions it can test for Diagnose Mental Health Disorders and then give information about Diseases & Treatment options Pharmacotherapy,Psychotherapy & then also offers Interactive Disorder specific detailed Self-help CBT courses. 

Our Comprehensive App currently offers:-
Diagnostic test of Mental Disorders 
Information 
Psychotherapy-Cognitive Behavior Therapy 
Dialectic Behavior Therapy
Mood & Thought Record Diary 
Suicide Prevention 
Personal Development  
Alcohol Addiction Counselling 
Substance Abuse Counselling 
Quote of the day
Chat
Forums
Anonymous posts
Bibliotherapy 
Nutritional information  

1.Diagnosis
Screening Psychiatric Interview Tests based upon the Diagnostic & Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (DSM-5) similar to a real-world Psychiatric Assessment. This Comprehensive Diagnostic Screening tool currently tests disorders such as Depression,Anxiety disorders,Panic Attacks,Social Anxiety, Phobias, Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD),Post traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD),Body dysmorphia,Eating disorders,Anorexia & Bulimia nervosa, Binging & Purging,Bipolar disorder including Mania & Hypomania,Schizophrenia & Psychosis, Insomnia,Self harm & Suicidality,Borderline or Emotionally Unstable Personality disorder & Antisocial Personality Disorder,Alcohol Addiction & Substance Abuse etc

2.Information 
The App provides a Library of Professional level Information about  Prevalence,Incidence,Pathogenesis,Prognosis & Treatment of Psychiatric Disorders.Knowledge and awareness instill a less negative approach to mental health problems and improves Treatment Outcomes..

3.Psychotherapy 
What you think is,what you feel is,what you do! Thus changing thoughts and behaviors can change how a person is feeling which is basically what Cognitive Behavior Therapy or CBT is,a Talk therapy clinically proven to work & widely used in clinical practice.App also included DBT Dialectical Behavior Therapy specific for Borderline Personality Disorder.

4.Mood & Thought Record Diary 
App includes a Mood & Thought Record Diary which are essentially parts of CBT & help in recognizing Negative Automatic Thoughts and then subsequently changing theses & core-beliefs,behaviors and feelings in-turn.

5.Suicide Prevention 
There is a separate Suicide Prevention section with a worldwide phone and website directory and modules such as distress tolerance and suicide safety planning.

6.Personal Development
CBT based Wellness & Personal Development section with Interactive Self-help Programs based on Cognitive Behavior Therapy with Worksheets and exercises to boost mental health and well-being. This covers topics such as Procrastination, Anger Management, Self-Esteem, Assertiveness, Self-love, Perfectionism and Mindfulness.

7.Alcohol and Substance Abuse Addiction Counselling 
The app includes addiction counselling materials based on CBT Principles and can help users overcome problems with addiction to alcohol or other substances such as illicit drugs.

8.Quote of the day,Chat,Forums,Anonymous posts,Bibliotherapy & Nutrition 
The app includes Features such as Anonymous Problem Posting, Quote of the day,Chat-rooms, Forums,Nutrition & Supplements information,Books to read,Motivational Articles are included.

9.Video e-CBT -Work in progress
Our Trained CBT Therapist is currently working on a Video Series ,which is first of its kind E-CBT series.The videos will be emulating real life Clinical Psychotherapy sessions.

10.Future features-Work in progress  
Team plans to implement One-on-one Video/Audio Psychiatric Consultation with a Psychiatrist, One-on-one Video Psychotherapy sessions & Group Audio Support Sessions With Our Trained CBT Therapist, Psychotherapist & Life-Coach in the near future..

comments: This is an incredible app. I am excited. I often get distressed and use a psychologist's service. Now that I am using this app, I go to my psichologist seldomly. There is so much info in this. It also works great in my phone. Nice
The tests help me understand what people with such mental issues may face, which is interesting. The UI can do with an improvement. I can't read the notice if it is shaking violently!
Great app. Simple and pleasant interface. Clear and convenient functionality. I liked giving you a top five.

Very useful tool for diagnosis and treatment options. User friendly. Clear outline of diagnoses and useful information within each section. Informative for user without an information overload. Good for non medical and medical users. Will recommend to colleagues and patients as an information tool
This is a great and unique app. Easy to use liked the UI. Does anything you would except and more. Recommended.

title: Anxiety and Panic Cure Forever
description:
The End of Panic Attacks & General Anxiety. Used by +70,000 plp. worldwide.. 

Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD) affects over 4 million adult Americans every year, and is a condition where the person feels extremely worried or anxious on a regular basis. Exaggerated feelings of worry or anxiety are normal in some situations, but for people who have generalized anxiety disorder or related conditions, the feelings are out of proportion with the situation at hand.

People with generalized anxiety disorder are unable to stop worrying about everyday events and situations, and may become overly concerned with money, work, school, health or their families. They spend their days in constant worry or anxiety over certain situations, and they often end up feeling worn out, depressed, sad, and cannot enjoy relationships or social activities.

There is no known root cause of generalized anxiety disorder, but doctors and researchers conjecture that there are several factors that contribute to the development of this anxiety problem. Family history often plays an important role in the development of generalized anxiety disorder. If a person’s parent were constant “worriers”, they probably grew up in an environment where fear and anxiety were part of everyday life.

This App will help you to get rid of your Anxiety and Panic Attacks forever!


Anxiety, natural remedies, family, work, worried, freaked out, medicine, therapy, psychology

title: How To Deal With Anxiety
description:
How to Overcome Anxiety is an application that helps you to overcome disruptions in your life Anxiety is a condition that usually arises with excess stress and worry. It is usually the feared possibility of the consequences of an action that brings about anxiety. The people who get anxious are always worrying about the bad things that might happen and thus create an environment of fear in their minds.


in this app we will discuss:

Dealing with depression
Fight Depression Naturally
how to deal with depression
how to overcome depression
how to deal with stress
how to deal with anger
how to deal with anxiety
dealing with anxiety
how to deal with a breakup


feature on the app

_ update once a week
_ useful tips that you will provide
_ a very simple look in the app.


little explanation about How to Overcome Anxiety 

If you want to know how to overcome anxiety, you must be quick to notice what wrong with you and what you need to do to correct it.

It is wise you quickly learn how to overcome anxiety now otherwise you will continue to feel stressed, unhappy and anxious throughout your life. You will suffer unduly because anxiety will weaken you mentally, sap your energy and you will not be at your best. Anxiety comes in many forms. Some suffer from panic disorder where there are unpredictable attacks of panic on the person, with its physiological consequences, while some others feel helpless in an embarrassing situation and this is agoraphobia. There are also others suffering from various other phobias like fear of heights, insects and water. Some feel that they are always watched by others, and thus suffer from social anxiety disorder. People who have undergone some traumatic event in their past suffer from post traumatic stress disorder. Some people perform repeated and ritualistic behaviors to rid themselves of obsessive compulsive disorders and the most common form of anxiety is generalized anxiety disorder. These people are usually over anxious of a situation and may end up in some major depressive disorder.

As it can be seen, anxiety comes in many forms, and the first step to be taken in the treatment of anxiety lies in finding out what the cause is. Once the reason of the anxiety has been found out, it proves to be rather easy to cure anxiety. It is best to avoid these situations as much as possible in the beginning of your treatment so that there is no feeling of anxiety at all.

It may be needed to approach a psychiatrist to help in the treatment of anxiety. Under their guidance, you learn to handle anxiety attacks in three steps; before, during and after the anxiety attack.

A person who suffers from anxiety should not set self-defeating goals. It is instead better to set productive and possible goals that improve one's thought and action. With this step, the patient learns to gain better control over oneself and thus overcome anxiety. When suffering from a bout of anxiety, it is better to calm oneself naturally rather than trying to fight or control one's anxious feelings.

Someone with anxiety should work at producing positive thoughts in the mind. Once pessimistic or unpleasant thoughts enter the mind, it is better to divert oneself and think of other situations with vivid, optimistic pictures. If possible, it proves to be better to think positive thought of these pessimistic thoughts, using objective words.

title: Social Anxiety Disorder Learning
description:
Social anxiety disorder or social phobia as it is also known is quite common although when you suffer from this disorder you can really feel like you are all alone. It seems like everyone else is living their lives in a normal fashion, socializing without any inhibitions, getting up in front of people without withdrawing into complete anxiety, and sailing through their lives with ease.

More Learning in this app:

- What triggers social anxiety?

- Is Social Anxiety a mental illness?

- Can social anxiety be cured?

- What is the best treatment for social anxiety disorder?

The reality is that other people get nervous when they have to encounter these types of situations however; people that have social anxiety disorder are more than just nervous. The thought of walking into a crowded room or getting up in front of people can be downright debilitating and cause you to avoid the situation at all costs.

A person struggles with social anxiety disorder can experience frustrating symptoms just from thinking about these types of scenarios. Some of the symptoms can include nausea, tenseness, feeling light headed, sweating, trembling, and many other unpleasant symptoms.

Although your symptoms may make it seem like the problem is insurmountable the good news is that there is a lot of social anxiety disorder help available for people who suffer from this debilitating and uncomfortable disorder.

There are a plethora of different ways to seek social anxiety disorder help and the types of options that are available will depend upon the severity of the disorder and the individual person. While some people can gain control of the disorder by making a few simple changes others may require different approaches for seeking relief from the condition.

Here are a few methods to help you get started with seeking help for social anxiety disorder inside app, Download Now.

title: Infinity Zen
description:
Self-help application for Panic Disorder patients monitor and control their seizures, providing security and support.

Infinity Zen helps to promote well-being at the time of the panic crisis. It can be used daily, as self-help, or in the maintenance of crises, soothing and avoiding the appearance of new critical episodes.

It allows recording the duration of the seizures and trigger situations, to be worked together with the therapy. It uses features that take focus, such as images, videos, interactive sounds, and written and recorded messages.

It offers breathing exercises, muscle relaxation and notification with locator (GPS), to warn friends at the time of crisis.

title: BetterHelp: Online Counseling & Therapy
description:
BetterHelp is the convenient way to get professional help from licensed therapists and counselors online. 
With over 10,000 trained, experienced and accredited counselors covering a range of areas – from depression and anxiety to family and couples therapy – it’s never been easier to receive personal, professional help when you need it. 

-------------------------------------------
BETTERHELP – FEATURES
-------------------------------------------
⦁ Over 10,000 counselors & therapists covering a wide variety of specializations including Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral therapy (DBT), and more
⦁ Fight stress - improve your mental health and mood with e therapy
⦁ Get professional help with depression, panic and anxiety attacks, obsessive compulsive disorder (ocd), ptsd, or any other mental illness you may be dealing with
⦁ All counselors are licensed, trained, accredited and highly experienced
⦁ Match with an available counselor best fit for your needs
⦁ Unlimited private one on one communication with your therapist
⦁ Schedule live sessions with your counselor or use the secure messenger
⦁ Gain access to constructive, educational group webinars
⦁ Fight the stigma of mental illness by getting help from someone who cares

PROFESSIONAL HELP, PERSONALIZED FOR YOU
Facing mental health obstacles alone can be daunting – receiving support and guidance from a professional counselor has been shown to make huge, positive changes to help you overcome personal challenges. 

Among other things, BetterHelp can provide support with:
Depression
Anxiety
Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
Panic Attacks
Bipolar and Mood Disorders
Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
Social Anxiety

LICENSED AND TRAINED COUNSELORS & THERAPISTS
There are over 10,000 counselors in BetterHelp, each with at least 3 years and 2,000 hours of hands-on experience. They are licensed, trained, experienced and accredited psychologists (PhD/PsyD), marriage and family therapists (MFT), clinical social workers (LCSW), licensed professional counselors (LPC), or similar credentials. 

All of our therapists have a Master’s Degree or a Doctorate Degree in their respective field. They have been qualified and certified by their state professional board by completing the necessary education, exams, training and practice. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?
You and your counselor will get your own secure “room”. This will be your private place to communicate day or night. You can access this room from any internet connected device, wherever you are. 

You can write about yourself, the things going on in your life, ask questions and discuss the challenges you’re facing. Your counselor will login to the same room and respond with feedback, insights and guidance. 

Together you’ll work towards making a positive change in your life, accomplishing your goals and overcoming your problems. 

HOW MANY SESSIONS CAN I HAVE?
You aren’t limited to a certain number of messages (“sessions”). The frequency of your sessions depends on your availability and the interaction between you and your counselor. You may prefer to have 3-4 short interactions per week, or 1 long and thorough session. You can use the service as much or as little as you like, depending on your needs.

YOU DESERVE TO BE HAPPY.

WE ARE HERE TO HELP MAKE IT HAPPEN – DOWNLOAD BETTERHELP TODAY!

recentChanges: Thank you for using BetterHelp! We are constantly improving our app and delivering enhancements to the App Store. Every update is a boost to the app's stability, speed, and security.
comments: I like the convenience of the app and makes counseling way more accessible than traditional counseling. I took off one star just because the questions you answer before getting matched with a counselor don't seem to matter; I asked for a female counselor and immediately got matched with a male counselor. But it's easy to switch counselors if you don't mesh well with one and the variety of communication options is great.

I love having access to a counselor without having to go into an office. It helps to have someone to message when you are actually going through something and the flexibility of taking at any time. Sometimes it takes a few hours to hear back, but good just the same. Definitely recommend of you've been thinking about starting a counselor about anything.

You get what you pay for! The UI is nice, the app works well. But the therapists seem very disconnected and don't really seem to care much at all, responding in broken or incomplete sentences. Perhaps I just got unlucky with my matches, but my experience wasn't very good. I'm making more progress on my mental health by just journaling and meditating.

Okay, so I tried this app 4 years ago and the councelor I was given was terrible at responding to me. So I gave it up after the free trial. So I come back again for anxiety, and I guess I didn't read well enough and clicked a payment option. Holy cow! What they took out of my account was way more than expected, and I didn't have much anyways! But there isn't a phone number to call, it's an email. So congrats on making my anxiety worse!! They better give me my money back cuz I didn't use the app

I would rate it five stars if it wasn't for the audio on the app. The audio didn't work for me when I had to use my phone to have a session with my counselor. I couldn't hear her but she could hear me. I have an Android, I tried to maximize my volume, even tried putting on headphones and tinker with the different volume settings, but didn't work still.

title: Anxiety & Depression Symptoms
description:
Anxiety and Depression are a struggle for many hundreds of thousands of people in today's society. The symptoms associated with Anxiety and Depression can vary from patient to patient. 

Life has many ups and downs and for many it can translate into different emotional states such as feeling unhappy, stressed, depressed or even sometimes anxious. What we need to understand is that this is a normal part of life.

Many difficult events and experiences can leave us in low spirits or cause depression. This can include but is not limited to: relationship or marriage problems, stress from work, being bullied at school or getting diagnosed with an illness.  

Some people who have been diagnosed with agoraphobia will experience worsening symptoms of stress, anxiety attacks or panic attacks if put in situations that make them feel trapped, helpless or embarrassed. 

Managing stress and anxiety symptoms or seeking advice from a psychologist may help in dealing with the illness. 

Other factors that can affect our mood are hormonal changes. These changes take place during puberty, after having a child or in our later years when menopause takes place. These extreme changes can have an effect on our emotional and mental well being. 

Included in our Anxiety and Depression Symptoms app is:
* What is Depression?
* What is Anxiety?
* Clinical Depression and its symptoms 
* Theories about the causes of depression and anxiety
* How Doctors view and treat depression
* Therapy to Treat Depression
* Therapy Methods for Anxiety
* Symptoms
* Helping Yourself treat anxiety and depression
* and much much more...

Download our FREE copy of Anxiety and Depression Symptoms apps and start learning the reasons for Depression and Anxiety and ways to deal with these situations.

title: Exposure - Face Your Fears
description:
Features: 
• Enter your own personal fear 
• Create a fear hierarchy
• Complete exposure tasks while live updating your anxiety levels

Effective against: 
• Phobias (snakes, spiders, heights, flying, etc.)
• Social anxiety disorder
• Post-traumatic stress disorder
• Panic disorder
• Generalized anxiety disorder
• Obsessive-compulsive disorders 

Overview:
Exposure therapy is one of psychology's greatest, most effective treatment tools that have been discovered over the past few decades. A key technique in behavior therapy for anxiety, exposure therapy involves gradually exposing someone to their feared object, situation, or task without any danger in order to overcome their anxiety. This app enables people to go through exposure therapy.

Before exposure, users first create a fear hierarchy - a list of activities that induce anxiety ranked from highest to lowest. Then, they work through the activities in the fear hierarchy, starting with the least anxiety-inducing activity and working their way up.

Warning: We highly recommend using this app under the guidance of a mental health professional. 

Detailed Guide: 
Many people with phobias recognize their fear as illogical, but their mind is still afraid nonetheless. This is because the primal fear centers of our mind act subconsciously whenever it spots anything it thinks is dangerous (such as lions or snakes) in order to escape immediately. However, in today's modern society when we don't have to worry about predators eating us, our minds can often trigger false alarms to things that aren't actually dangerous. 

The fear center of our mind learns through association, not logic. If you were afraid of pigeons, every time you see a pigeon your fear would rise. Then when you run away, your mind becomes even more convinced that a pigeon is dangerous because you ran away, your fear levels dropped, and you were safe. This cycle repeats itself, sustaining the illogical fear until maybe you avoid going to certain places because there might be pigeons there. 

To break this fear, the mind needs to learn to un-associate pigeons with fear. Luckily, the mind can only sustain a fear response for so long. So if you go to where pigeons are and just stay there instead of running away, eventually your mind will learn that pigeons are not actually dangerous. The most important principle is to make sure that the fear leaves before you do. 

This app helps you break the fear. First, add what you are afraid of and then construct a list of activities that will induce various levels of anxiety. Then, you can start exposing yourself by doing these activities starting from what gives you the least amount of anxiety. During the exposure process, you can track your anxiety levels by updating it continuously, and finish when it falls to 20/100 or lower. As you work your away through the activities, your fear should continue to fall! 

Warning: We highly recommend using this app under the guidance of a mental health professional. If you leave the activity before your anxiety falls, then this will actually reinforce your fear instead of lowering it. Try starting with the easiest activity first. Going straight to a challenging task might actually increase your fear. It is very difficult to stay in a situation when your entire body is screaming at you to leave, especially if there is no person there coaxing you to stay and wait.
descriptionHTML:
Features:
• Enter your own personal fear
• Create a fear hierarchy
• Complete exposure tasks while live updating your anxiety levels

Effective against:
• Phobias (snakes, spiders, heights, flying, etc.)
• Social anxiety disorder
• Post-traumatic stress disorder
• Panic disorder
• Generalized anxiety disorder
• Obsessive-compulsive disorders

If you leave the app or just want to check any other app on your phone, the stopwatch freezes and you can't continue even if you update the anxiety 2. Add some kind of history so you can see your progress over time 3. If I did exposure in the evening, in the morning it is still marked with the star (done), while it should be reset so you can practice it again.

I recommend this if you've been running from your fears and are telling yourself that you need to read a little more or do a little more before you face your fear... It'll get you started off in the right direction.
I think its helpful but it could be better

title: Unwinding Anxiety®
description:
Learn to control your anxiety with Sharecare’s Unwinding Anxiety. Break the cycle of worry with exercises to calm your mind, check-ins, experts and community support.

Our progressive 30-day program, with short daily exercises, will help you learn how your mind works, so you can change habits. You’ll learn how to switch gears the moment unwanted sensations and anxiety arise, and ultimately change the “habit-loop” that leads to anxiety. 

The program was designed by Judson Brewer, MD, PhD, a renowned thought leader in the science of self-mastery. Dr. Brewer has 20 years of clinical and research experience at Yale and the Center of Mindfulness at the University of Massachusetts Medical School. His TED talks and lectures are popular worldwide.

PRICING

Unwinding Anxiety® offers an unlimited free trial that includes the first four daily modules. Upgrade in app to access all features and the remaining modules on an auto-renewing subscription basis*:

1 month: $29.99
6 months: $139.99
1 year: $209.99

Awareness and Anxiety Relief—one step at a time
With each step you’ll build momentum to the next one, gaining confidence one day at a time. As you progress, you’ll see from your own experience a sustainable change in your relationship with your emotions.

Learn how to flex your mindful muscle
Awareness methods empower you to turn-off your inner critic and turn-on your curiosity -- and by extension, feel better in the moment. Learning how to be kind to yourself isn’t easy, but it’s naturally rewarding, so your mind and body will want to do it again and again! 

Get in touch with your inner teacher
One user told us, “Unwinding Anxiety helped me find the inner teacher in me to learn how to change my relationship with anxiety and feel better about myself.” And, that’s just what this app was designed to do—put you in the driver’s seat to regulate and manage your response to anxiety.

Own your progress and feel the change
When you keep track of your development, you own it. A progress analytic dashboard, daily exercises, along with a unique stress test help you chronicle your mood and anxiety levels throughout the day, so you gain invaluable insights into triggers and behaviors that occur in your body and mind.  You will end your day on a healthy note with specific practices before bed for a restful sleep.

Key Features 
•	You’ll have access to experts, including Dr. Judson Brewer. 
•	You’re not alone. You can share your experience, ask questions and feel supported by those who “get” what you’re going through. 
•	Proven training exercises with video and recorded lessons put you in tune with your body&mind connection, so you can control your response to anxiety.
•	An online journal helps you collect, analyze and manage your progress.

Benefits 
•	The ability to adjust the things you can, instead of spinning your wheels over what you have no control over.
•	Become more kind to yourself.
•	Control your response to anxiety.
•	Find joy living in the moment.

*PRICING & TERMS

All prices are for U.S. customers. Pricing in other counties may vary and may be converted to your local currency.

If you choose to upgrade in app, your Unwinding Anxiety® subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of term and your credit card will be charged through your Google Play account. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renew at any time in your Google Play Account Setting, but refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the term.

Need help with the app? Please email uasupport@mindsciences.com

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://app.unwindinganxiety.com/terms

recentChanges: Fixed a bug showing the wrong onboarding screen
comments: Unwinding Anxiety is easy to use and helps develop mindfulness practices for daily life along with formal learning. The online community is accepting and supportive, and all of the video/audio lessons are interesting and informative. This app really does help to reduce anxiety and worry and replace it with more valuable habits.

I have done meditation practice in the past and in and out of therapy for over 20 years dealing with anxiety. This app and the way it stays with me every day all day long has given me new tools that I never had and I am seeing changes in my mind habits I did not think possible. Thank you

Jud talks in a way that makes you comfortable (it's not boring), he is gentle in his teaching and VERY informative about how Anxiety works. The daily modules are short enough to be able to catch on and implement right away. I've gained great knowledge from day one and every day after.

So it's free for like the first 4 sessions after that you have to pay. I feel like it's pretty expensive but out of all the apps books and everything I've tried I feel like this has helped the most so I probably will pay for it.
It works. Follow the program, and the anxiety just goes away on its own.

title: Social Anxiety Test
description:
This app presents the Social Phobia Inventory (SPIN), a validated screening questionnaire that aims to measure the severity of Social Anxiety Disorder (SAD), also known as Social Phobia. The SPIN is a 17-item self-rating scale which covers fear, avoidance, and physical signs of social anxiety. 

Disclaimer: This questionnaire cannot indicate a diagnosis of social anxiety disorder. Only a qualified professional can make this diagnosis. Please consult a physician if you are concerned about social anxiety disorder. 

The Social Phobia Inventory (SPIN) is © 1995, 2014, 2017, Jonathan R.T. Davidson, MD. All Rights Reserved. For further use, please contact the copyright holder at mail@cd-risc.com.

comments: I have severe anxiety, so this really helped me when I figured out more about my diagnosis. It helped me open up and realize I'm more than a little embarrassment. I want people to see my strong opend side, not my social anxiety side. Panic attacks have gone away a little bit. I'm more confident about my body. I might not be done with anxiety, but, I've been helped more than ever. THANKS❤❤

The questions may be appropriate to determine an overall summary of whether you have social anxiety, but what I found unacceptable was one of the Resources linking straight to a "How Niceness is Killing Your Relationship" audio. Immediately seemes very unscientific (as it doesn't even know whether I'm in a relationship) and ends with a very American advertisement - the content of which some people may deem exploitative.

Yeah it kinda change me a lot when i found i had a social anxiety... it really help me understand my true self so i research about this social anxiety..now im trying to improve my self and hide my weakness and show my strong side to other so they don't look down on me.. really thank you it really turn the table around...^ω^

title: Panik Tagebuch: Angsttagebuch bei Panikattacken
description:
Das Paniktagebuch bietet Ihnen eine schnelle und unkomplizierte Möglichkeit, Ihre Angst-und/oder Panikattacken aufzuzeichnen, einzuordnen und rückblickend auszuwerten. Die Aufzeichnungsart basiert auf ärztlichen und psychotherapeutischen Aufzeichnungsempfehlungen. Lernen Sie sich und Ihren Körper besser zu verstehen und Situationen und Gegebenheiten, die Angst und Panik auslösen können zu identifizieren.

Das Ziel der App ist es, Zusammenhänge zwischen Situationen, Bedingungen und Gegebenheiten und dem Auftreten von Angst- und/oder Panikattacken besser zu erkennen und aus diesen Erkenntnissen heraus Änderungen unternehmen zu können, die eine Besserung von Angsterkrankungen oder Panikerkrankungen zur Folge haben.

Sie haben nicht nur die Möglichkeit, mehrere Angst- und/oder Panikattacken pro Tag zeitgenau und in  Stärken unterschieden zu protokollieren, sondern auch die damit verbundenen körperlichen Symptome, äußeren Umstände, Stimmungen, Arbeitsbedingungen, sportliche Aktivitäten, Ihre Schlafdauer und Flüssigkeitsaufnahme ganz bequem per Button auszuwählen, sowie jederzeit eigene Notizen hinzuzufügen.

Nach der Speicherung Ihrer Eingaben sehen Sie eine Schnellübersicht Ihres Tages. Sie können rückwirkend Änderungen vornehmen, Einzeleinträge ausführlich betrachten, 7 Tage Übersichten aufrufen und zu verschiedenen Kalenderwochen wechseln und mit nur einem Klick zum aktuellen Tag wechseln, eine Wochenübersicht sowie eine Monatsübersicht mit ausführlichen und übersichtlichen Diagrammen und Graphiken anfordern und diese entweder so wie sie sind auf Ihrem Smartphone belassen oder als PDF oder Bild zu speichern und anschließend ausdrucken.

Das Panik Tagebuch bietet Ihnen:

Standard-Version:

☆ Kostenlos und werbefrei

☆ PIN geschützt & verschlüsselt

☆ Speichere bis zu 10 Panikattacken pro Tag. 

☆ Speichere Deine Symptome, Stimmung, äußere Umstände, Arbeitsbedingungen, sportliche Aktivitäten, Deine Schlafdauer, Deine Getränkeaufnahme und Deine persönlichen Notizen. 

☆ Alle Deine Einträge können auch rückwirkend bearbeitet werden. 

☆ Sichere Dein Tagebuch lokal auf Deinem Handy. 

☆ Vergleiche Deine einzelnen Einträge miteinander um Übereinstimmungen zu finden. 

☆ Lernen Dich sich selbst besser kennen. 

Premium-Version:

In der Premiumversion erhälst Du noch zusätzlich zu den bereits vorhandenen Funktionen der Standardversion:

★ KEIN ABO

★ Nur einmal freischalten und das Tagebuch unbegrenzt nutzen. 

★ Wochenübersicht mit übersichtlichen Grafiken und Diagrammen für Verteilung der Panikstärken, Anzahl der Panikattacken pro Tag, die Uhrzeiten der Panikattacken, Deine Schlafdauer, Deine Getränkeaufnahme, Deine häufigsten Symptome, Deine Stimmung, die häufigsten äußeren Umstände, die Arbeitsbedingungen, sportliche Aktivitäten. 

★ Monatsübersichten mit übersichtlichen Grafiken und Diagrammen für Verteilung der Panikstärken, Anzahl der Panikattacken pro Tag, die Uhrzeiten der Panikattacken, Deine Schlafdauer, Deine Getränkeaufnahme, Deine häufigsten Symptome, Deine Stimmung, die häufigsten äußeren Umstände, die Arbeitsbedingungen, sportliche Aktivitäten. 

★ Du kannst jede einzelne Grafik als PDF auf Deinem Gerät speichern und Du kannst jede einzelne Grafik sofort ausdrucken.

★ Speichere Dein Angsttagebuch verschlüsselt online, damit Du das Tagebuch auf ein anderes Gerät übertragen kannst. 

★ Importiere Dein Tagebuch online mit nur einem Klick. 

★ Alle Daten werden verschlüsselt und auf einem nochmals extra gesicherten Server abgelegt. 

HANDBUCH
https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/apptagebuch/handbuch/

FAQ
https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/apptagebuch/faq/

DATENSCHUTZ
https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/apptagebuch/rechtliches/datenschutz.html

AGB
https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/apptagebuch/rechtliches/agb.html

HAFTUNGSAUSSCHLUSS
https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/apptagebuch/rechtliches/haftungsausschluss.html

title: My Panic Alarm Free
description:
There are several reasons why you may need an instant alarm on your phone as you may need to have one in your pocket. There are situations where you may just have time to touch an icon and doing nothing else or choosing any option: menace of theft or violence, heart attack or other disease, someone following you in the night. Situations where you may just have time to touch an icon: This is then the app you should always carry with you. Just touch the icon, and this app will take as much attention as possible from people around you with an instant loud alarm and emergency flashing colors and written help text. 

NOTE: People with Epilepsy should not use this application. 

This application follows EULA.

My Panic Alarm (c) 2011 - Tecworks

title: Anxiety Relief Sounds
description:
Anxiety is a normal reaction to uncertainty and things that may harm us. This is an anxiety-provoking and stressful time for everyone, and it's okay if you feel more anxious than usual. It is important to take time for yourself to manage your mental health. 

Take time to listen to these anxiety relief sounds every day and while listening, relax your mind and focus on what you are grateful for. You can also meditate with these sounds or do your yoga ritual, all these practices will lower your stress and help give you the peace you need. 

Too much anxiety can start to cause harm as feeling stressed and fearful every day takes a toll on health and well-being very quickly. Anxiety and fear lead to panic attacks and this is why you need to act as soon as you start to feel out of balance. 


You may use this app in several ways: 

-to help reduce your anxiety by simply mediating to the sounds,  just go through the app and play the sounds that you like for as long as you wish with the help of our intuitive timer;

-you might want to be woken up by the sounds of waterfalls, birds or bamboo forest – in this case just set the chosen sound as an alarm;

-if you wish to hear the calming melody from this collection of soothing sounds whenever someone calls you up or when you receive a notification , just set any of the sounds as your default ringtone, contact ringtone or notification sound. 


Be kind to yourself and give your body a chance to relax and heal.

Features:

✓ high quality sounds
✓ handy timer – music automatically turns off 
✓ ability to set melody as ringtone, alarm or notification
✓ beautiful background images for each meditative sound
✓ works offline, no internet needed
✓ simple design and intuitive controls 

We are constantly working on improving our apps and making them more useful to our users. This is why we need your feedback. Please feel free to contact us for any issues you might have or suggestions on how we could improve our apps.
descriptionHTML:
Anxiety is a normal reaction to uncertainty and things that may harm us. This is an anxiety-provoking and stressful time for everyone, and it's okay if you feel more anxious than usual. It is important to take time for yourself to manage your mental health.

Take time to listen to these anxiety relief sounds every day and while listening, relax your mind and focus on what you are grateful for. You can also meditate with these sounds or do your yoga ritual, all these practices will lower your stress and help give you the peace you need.

Too much anxiety can start to cause harm as feeling stressed and fearful every day takes a toll on health and well-being very quickly. Anxiety and fear lead to panic attacks and this is why you need to act as soon as you start to feel out of balance.


You may use this app in several ways:

-to help reduce your anxiety by simply mediating to the sounds, just go through the app and play the sounds that you like for as long as you wish with the help of our intuitive timer;

-you might want to be woken up by the sounds of waterfalls, birds or bamboo forest – in this case just set the chosen sound as an alarm;

-if you wish to hear the calming melody from this collection of soothing sounds whenever someone calls you up or when you receive a notification , just set any of the sounds as your default ringtone, contact ringtone or notification sound.


Be kind to yourself and give your body a chance to relax and heal.

Features:

✓ high quality sounds
✓ handy timer – music automatically turns off
✓ ability to set melody as ringtone, alarm or notification
✓ beautiful background images for each meditative sound
✓ works offline, no internet needed
✓ simple design and intuitive controls

We are constantly working on improving our apps and making them more useful to our users. This is why we need your feedback. Please feel free to contact us for any issues you might have or suggestions on how we could improve our apps.
summary: Reduce your stress level, relief anxiety and find your inner-peace!

title: Breathing exercises
description: Breathing exercise – this application has the goal of helping a user acquire two key breathing exercises which directly influence lowering hyperventilation, heart beating, shiver, anxiety, tension and panic attack. The slow breathing exercise is used in the very situation of anxiety, discomfort and panic, while the deep breathing exercise is done in the particular times in order to help the user acquire the technique of correct, deep, abdominal breathing. It is recommended for everyone since the exercises can help in situations of stress and nervousness.

title: Breathing Exercises
description:
This breathing exercises app will reduce stress, calm the body and focus the mind, while also increasing energy.

Practice this for at least 5 minutes. If you did this each day you would notice stress levels dropping, sleep improve and your ability to focus as well as feeling a lot calmer!.

LEARN HOW TO MEDITATE & BREATHE
Breathwork gives you the tools to achieve benefits in a wide range of issues including: managing acute/chronic pain; helping with insomnia, weight loss, attention deficit, anxiety, depression, trauma, and grief; improving intuition, creativity, mindfulness, self-esteem, and leadership; and much more. 

Breathe App will help you utilize your breath to benefit your body, mind, and spirit.

If you want to learn how to defeat anxiety and stress immediately, quietly, and without even having to physically isolate yourself from your surroundings, then this app is for you!

START LIVING MINDFULLY
Stress, panic, and anxiety are a part of daily modern life, and the longer they are ignored, the worse they become. While some people are lucky enough to find their own internal calm, most just pretend to be fine until these problems lead to graver health issues like heart complications, respiratory disorders, or panic attacks.

This breathe app was designed specifically to guide you through incredibly effective breathing exercises that can be done immediately, quietly, and on the down-low, without the need for anything other than regulating your own breathing. So, are you ready to unlock the pathway to calm without the need for any feel-good pill-popping prescriptions or expensive therapies? Are you ready to learn the most basic and easiest of ways to beat anxiety through the regulation of your own inner peace? Let’s get started!

BREATHING EXERCISES FEATURES
- Beautiful full screen breath visualization 
- 4 breathing exercises to calm and focus yourself building a daily habit
- 4 breathe bubble
- Guided session lengths from 1-60 minutes 
- Free-form session lengths

Download Breathing Practice for FREE today and enjoy!

title: Healing Sounds-Anxiety Relief
description:
This is FREE application of healing sounds. It is based on a method which use sound frequencies to the body and mind of a person with the intention of bringing them into a state of harmony and health.
  
This application consist of three sounds of healing :
  
1. ANXIETY RELIEF
According to wikipedia.org, Anxiety disorders are a group of mental disorders characterized by feelings of anxiety and fear, where anxiety is a worry about future events and fear is a reaction to current events. These feelings may cause physical symptoms, such as a racing heart and shakiness. There are various forms of anxiety disorders, including generalized anxiety disorder, phobic disorder, and panic disorder. While each has its own characteristics and symptoms, they all include symptoms of anxiety.This sound will help you to relief the anxiety symptoms. 
  
Usage : play this sound with the headphone when you get the anxiety symptoms.


2. ADD-ADHD Therap
According to wikipedia.org, ADHD (attention deficit hyperactivity disorder) is a psychiatric disorder of the neurodevelopmental type in which there are significant problems of attention, hyperactivity, or acting impulsively that are not appropriate for a person's age. These symptoms must begin by age six to twelve and be present for more than six months for a diagnosis to be made. In school-aged individuals the lack of focus may result in poor school performance. This sound will help person with ADHD symptoms to make their brain more focus. 
  
usage : play this sound once a day using headphone.


3. PAIN RELIEF
Pain is a signal from our body that something is not right. It can be due to a physical injury, some kind of disease, or emotional upset. Most types of physical pain can be treated with this sound. This sound can reduce or relieve headaches, sore muscles, arthritis, or other aches and pains.
  
usage : play this sound with the headphone when you get the pain.


NEED INTERNET CONNECTION TO ACCESS THE APP


DISCLAIMER : those who should not use this application include: Those who are prone to or have had seizures, are photosensitive, epileptic, pregnant or wear a pacemaker, whether knowingly or not, should not use this application. DO NOT LISTEN THESE SOUNDS WHILE DRIVING OR OPERATING MACHINERY. Although these sounds contribute to wellness, they are not intended as a replacement for medical or psychological treatment. No medical claims are intended, express or implied. Despite the fact that all statements are accompanied by research and references, no statements made in the application or related documentation have been evaluated or approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.

title: Insight: For Stress & Anxiety
description:
Parents

Our guided relaxation exercises include parenting specific ones to soothe the parent self, as well as soothing tools for everyday stressors.


Teens

title: ASMR Boyfriend: Panic Attack Comfort 2
description:
ASMR Boyfriend: Panic Attack Comfort 2 is a sequel to the calming and invigorating app for single girls and lonely women who periodically face the problem of panic attacks. All of this caring ASMR boyfriend's relaxing audio recordings are categorized into different categories to keep you comfortable at every stage of your panic attack.

How is ASMR Boyfriend: Panic Attack Comfort 2 different from other panic attack psychological support apps? Typically, these are just tips on how to breathe when the first symptoms appear. Yes, it is useful, but it is not enough, because at such moments people need emotional support, they want to hear the voice of a familiar person and words of approval.

How is ASMR Boyfriend: Panic Attack Comfort 2 different from the many videos and audios you can find on the Internet? After all, there you can access a database of many ASMR boyfriends. Different voices, ages, physical appearance, triggers, and many other factors increase the effectiveness of emotional support in a panic attack. But these ASMR boyfriends have a huge disadvantage. This requires internet access and a stable connection. As for ASMR Boyfriend: Panic Attack Comfort 2, it works offline, allowing you to access soothing, relaxing and invigorating voice recordings at any time.

How is ASMR Boyfriend: Panic Attack Comfort 2 different from its free version?
1. Lack of advertising.
2. Brand new audio messages from this caring ASMR boyfriend.
3. More frank conversations (this ASMR boyfriend talks about his personal life).
