recentChanges: Want to hear some good news for a change? And let's be honest, there's no such thing as too much good news! Well, here you go! So, here you go! You've all been wondering if you could search for a topic and find the related content in the App... well, now you can! Just type any keyword into the search function in the App to access all sorts of related content. Come on, don't wait! Enjoy meditations, sleep stories, music and blog articles on the topics you are searching for!
comments: I wish there was a way to mark specific mediations as "complete" - a lot of the time when I finish a meditation it doesn't record that I've completed it. For some reason the only way to mark a segment ad complete is by going back and playing through the entire thing again, skipping using 15s button until I get to the end. Maybe it's because I end it 5 seconds early or something, but I wish there was a way I could like hold down on the segment and say "mark as complete" or something.

Very nice app, organized and stylish app. But i wont put my card and pay premium for 78₺. I can buy a trip tick with 80 ₺ to go to nice and relaxing place. I dont trust these app bc i dont know there's hidden messages behind the audios. I install it to see if it is good or not. To see the prices are high or not. For Nature is free to hear all types of sounds. for an app, you have to pay to hear all types of sounds. *i can record all sound i want and add it in one record and its free.

I enjoyed this app at the beginning. However now I find that there is too much guidance and no long sessions. The voice is asking to do something e.g. imagine, remember certain situations but it does not pause to do so, which rises irritation. I regret that I bought a subscription, which is very expensive compared to other meditation apps

You can't do much If you don't get premium and to get a free trial of premium you need to put in your card details and I don't what to do that. Just trying to find one thing that's free give me so much stress that there is no point and just to get a free app like this. I just wish that there where more things on this app that where free so I don't have to get premium

As a beginner i found delightful to be conducted into meditation and awareness by the app. Even though I didn't had the money to pay for all practices I've went through the free ones until I found a way to put in my monthly expenses. Life changer, recommend both as a free and premium user.

title: MyLife Meditation by Stop. Breathe. Think
description:
MyLife (formerly known as Stop, Breathe & Think) is an award winning meditation and mindfulness app that helps you find your quiet place. It allows you to check in with how you’re feeling, and recommends short guided meditations and mindfulness activities, tuned to your emotions. Whether you’re anxious, sleepless, hopeful, angry, or anything in between, we’re here for you. Our personalized meditation and mindfulness experience won the 2017 Webby People’s Voice Award for Best Health App, and has been featured by the Today Show, Apple, Cosmopolitan, Parents and many more.

Meditate with a community! Over 4,500,000 downloads and 17 million emotional check-ins and counting!

At MyLife, we believe that taking a few minutes each day to take care of how you feel is as important as regular exercise. By developing this simple habit, you can better navigate life’s ups and downs, slay your stress and get more sleep.

**MINDFUL MEDITATION TUNED TO YOU**
 
HOW ARE YOU? Check-in with how you feel & pick a tuned mindfulness session to improve your day and sleep better. MyLife recommends daily meditations for beginners and experienced meditators, yoga and acupressure videos based on your mood. Look no further for free meditation apps!
 
REDUCE STRESS: Create space for yourself through mindful breathing and self-care. Practice guided meditations, deep breathing exercises and learn to manage stress at any age with daily meditation for kids, teens and adults. Use our meditation timer when it’s time to meditate.
 
TAME ANXIETY: In a recent study, users were 82% more likely to NOT be anxious with consistent usage of our app. 
 
MEDITATE FOR BETTER SLEEP: Meditation timer, sleep sounds, quick meditations and breathing activities to help you sleep better.
 
BREATHE MINDFULLY: Learn to cultivate your breath to find calm, focus and feel more grounded. Count your breaths to calm your mind and live more mindfully.
 
TRACK YOUR PROGRESS & MENTAL WELLBEING: Track your mood before and after your daily meditations.
 
**MEDITATION & MINDFULNESS FOR EVERYONE**
 
Our meditation & mindfulness app offers activities for all levels. Meditation for kids, teens and adults. It’s like your personalized mindfulness coach. Topics include:
 
+ Morning meditation
+ Guided meditation
+ Slay your Stress
+ Breathe Mindfully
+ Tame Anxiety
+ Sleep Better
+ Strengthen Focus
+ Manage Depression
+ Meditation for Commuting
+ Mindfulness techniques for College Life
+ Meditation for Kids,Teens & Tweens
+ 20+ Meditations in Spanish
 
**WHAT MEDITATION FANS ARE SAYING**
 
Best Mindfulness App
"I’m a psychologist and this is my favorite mindfulness app. I love the check-in feature before and after meditations, I love the selection of emotions, and the different durations of meditations. For years I had the free version, but I bought the yearly subscription so I could use the longer meditations.”“
 
Mindful Options
"Designed to fit your schedule and environment. Once you check in with how you’re doing, it provides a variety of ways to ground and engage based on your mood. You might have a brief set of gentle yoga poses to try, or you can sit and listen to guided meditations. Choose the option that works best for you at that moment. What a satisfying app!”
 
SUBSCRIPTION
MyLife is free for foundational meditations, and we offer a premium membership that unlocks 400+ premium activities, guided journaling, yoga, acupressure, soundscapes and more premium features.
 
SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
MyLife offers two auto-renewing options: $9.99/month $58.99/year. Prices are in US dollars. Your price may be converted to your local currency. Subscriptions automatically renew at the end of each term and you will be charged through your Play Store Account. You may turn off subscription auto-renewal at any time through your Play Store Account Settings. We can't offer a refund for unsubscribing early.
 
Privacy Policy: http://my.life/privacy.html
Terms of Service: http://my.life/terms.html

MyLife offers two auto-renewing options: $9.99/month $58.99/year. Prices are in US dollars. Your price may be converted to your local currency. Subscriptions automatically renew at the end of each term and you will be charged through your Play Store Account. You may turn off subscription auto-renewal at any time through your Play Store Account Settings. We can't offer a refund for unsubscribing early.

Privacy Policy: http://my.life/privacy.html
Terms of Service: http://my.life/terms.html
summary: MyLife is free for foundational meditation, and has 400+ premium activities
recentChanges:
We have a new name! Stop, Breathe & Think is now MyLife. All our great features and design remain unchanged to help you slay your stress, sleep better and simply relax. We have also added a lot of new content, with over 400 activities now available in the app! Check out our new Latinx tracks, meditations for climate anxiety and chill pills. We hope you enjoy.
Happy meditating.
The MyLife Team
comments: I really like this app. There are a wide variety of available sessions and i enjoy being able to put in my emotions and have a list of tailored sessions. I have two recommendations: the first is to be able to search for sessions by name or topic, and the second is to have the option put in the goal of the session instead of/in addition to your emotions, to help the list of sessions be even more tailored to you. I also wish the voices were a bit more soothing (slower/calmer/quieter/gentler)

I love using the meditation timer on this app. It has guided meditation as well as timed with different sounds, like the forest, rain and desert, etc. You can also choose the length of time of mediation and if you would other sounds. Some features unlock with more use or if you buy the subscription. This is a great app! Update: I still use this app everyday! It is amazing!

Works wonders for my anxiety! The body scan practice actually stopped me from having a panic attack last year. I have a difficult time with sounds, but I love Jamie's calming voice. Thank you for creating such a wonderful outlet that allows me to calm down and breathe when I forget to. I highly recommend this app to my mental health group as well!♡

Deceptively simple app, it seems like theres almost nothing to it at first. But what it does have, actually works. The breathing timer is my go to, especially during these stressful times. Every now and then I'll go with one of the guided meditations too, they're pretty cool. There's an explanation in the settings about how meditation actually helps that doesnt sound like total spiritual nonsense, so that was pretty cool. My only complain is that the art style.

Love this app. I'm a mental health provider and I work with young people. This is a great way to introduce mindfulness. I'm also so excited that you added a Progress Muscle Relaxation exercise (Squeeze and Let Go)! I've looked high and low for a good one, never found one until this!

title: Zulu — Logical Puzzle & Anxiety Relief Game
description:
The best time killer is now available on all platforms - get to know "Zulu", new brain logic and antistress game!

Most simple logical relaxing game, where all that is needed from you - to clean the field from all the symbols. Pleasant interface, soft colors, clear symbols make this anxiety relief game easy and interesting. 
Do not believe it? Try it now! 

Rules are simple: 
 - Choose two identical symbols that are standing nearby to delete them. Symbols can be of different colors.
 - If there is an empty space between symbols, or one is standing on the end of the line, and another at the beginning of the next one - you can also remove them! 
 - Add more symbols to your field to make your game more interesting! 
 - Game hints won't let you lose! 
 - It's up to you whether you choose light or dark mode! 

Every exiting thing is simple,  and you easily can find proof of it during playing our anxiety and stress relief game!
How fast you would be able to make symbols in pairs? Check it by downloading "Zulu" right now! Get your portion of rest right here and now!

Privacy Policy: https://biggiko.com/zulu/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://biggiko.com/zulu/terms.html

summary: Shake your brain with logical puzzle! Get rid of all the symbols on the board!
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: This game is a pretty good way to spend a couple of hours. And it takes a little while to get good at it. It would be interesting to see who has the longest chain without starting over.

BEWARE! There's only one "board", so when you've solved it, there's no other puzzle! PROS: It's very challenging and unique. CONS: One puzzle, undo and reset is REALLY slow, and adding new dots is slow too. Dark theme purple dots are hard to see.
Good concept,but annoying that the rows just repeat.

I really like the game, it's challenging and good for killing time, but the more dots you have on the board, the more unstable the app becomes. I just had to uninstall and reinstall it, because I couldn't do anything... Could you fix that, @BiggikoLLC?
Like that I'm not being timed so there's no pressure. Wish it were a little easier to "win" though. Maybe allow diagonal matches? Lot's of fun though, satisfying.

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* “I’m generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‘Concentrate on your body’” - New York Times

* “In the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses” - Mashable

* “Eliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal” - Tech Republic

* “Found myself similarly refreshed afterwards” - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

recentChanges: Thanks for using Calm! This update contains multiple bug fixes and performance improvements. As always, you can expect an original Daily Calm every day, new music and Sleep Stories every week, and new Meditation programs every month.
comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

title: Overcoming Anxiety
description:
Over the past few decades, anti-anxiety and antidepressant medications are among the top ten prescribed medications in the US. 

A lot of Americans are struggling with anxiety disorders at some level or another.

Multi-billion-dollar pharmaceutical industry benefits when people continue to believe they really have no choice over their situation.

Whether you want to be more successful in your relationships, or you just want to be a happier person, or you would like to be more effective in your career, you need to deal with anxiety.

Living an ordinary life is not easy. Each and everyday, a person goes through bad situations and experience difficulties in different aspects of daily life, be it personal, social, work, or even in light situations such as recreation.  External activities or events taking place everyday can cause a person to feel bad, have problems, and experience high anxiety. Feeling scared? awkward? uneasy? restless? or just plain bad? These are caused by encounters from negative reactions acquired by the person or through outside experiences. Fortunately, not all people are subject to high anxiety. 

		In recent studies, it has been determined that medically sound manipulations of the brain organ called “Amygdala” somehow showed some influence or control over anxiety levels. The amygdala are almond-shaped neurons located inside the medial temporal lobes. This brain organ is active in important human cognitive and emotional functions such as emotional learning, memory modulation, and other neuro-psychological activities.  

		High anxiety can affect anybody anywhere, anytime but there are some people who are more predisposed to this psychological and emotional distress. For example, in NBA today, Commissioner David Stern was questioned and had a conference regarding a certain NBA referee named Tim Donaghy who supposedly was betting on NBA games.  Claims have been made regarding the alleged involvement of Stern and Donaghy in game-fixing. During the said conference, in front of dozens of reporters, Stern tried hard to maintain proper composure while answering questions fielded by the media.  Surely, he was trying to mask the anxiety he felt.  It is also most likely that a majority of the basketball referees were feeling fear and anxiety about what might happen should the game-fixing controversy escalates. 

		In that situation, it can be show that these two emotions can occur at the same time or in conjunction when a person is faced with a very serious situation or problem.  There are moments when the problem or tension gets so high that a person experiencing fear and anxiety may resort to acts of hostility or hysteria. 

		In reading all this, one has to ask, “Is there any way to avoid fear and anxiety?” 

		Well, it depends on the person. By not being bothered by the outside opinion, by being strong and true to oneself, knowing that you can stand on your own, that the person can avoid fear and anxiety.   Perhaps, self-confidence is the key to maintain peace of mind and a sense of control over one's life.  

		 Being calm and collected helps a person to approach a problem or difficult situation with psychological and emotional stability. That way, undertaking a difficult task or facing a problem becomes a challenge, and not a paralyzing burden.

		However, it is important to note that there are situations that call for more responses other that having a self-confidence boost.  People with psychological disorders or serious emotional problems may need the help of doctors and other health professionals so that they can deal with stressful situations and other matters that bother them.  Medications may be prescribed to control the symptoms of their severe emotional distress.  Anti-stress medication, together with counseling and therapy, can do miracles for people who have long suffered from fears and worries that prevent them from living a good, satisfying life.

In recent studies, it has been determined that medically sound manipulations of the brain organ called “Amygdala” somehow showed some influence or control over anxiety levels. The amygdala are almond-shaped neurons located inside the medial temporal lobes. This brain organ is active in important human cognitive and emotional functions such as emotional learning, memory modulation, and other neuro-psychological activities.

High anxiety can affect anybody anywhere, anytime but there are some people who are more predisposed to this psychological and emotional distress. For example, in NBA today, Commissioner David Stern was questioned and had a conference regarding a certain NBA referee named Tim Donaghy who supposedly was betting on NBA games. Claims have been made regarding the alleged involvement of Stern and Donaghy in game-fixing. During the said conference, in front of dozens of reporters, Stern tried hard to maintain proper composure while answering questions fielded by the media. Surely, he was trying to mask the anxiety he felt. It is also most likely that a majority of the basketball referees were feeling fear and anxiety about what might happen should the game-fixing controversy escalates.

In that situation, it can be show that these two emotions can occur at the same time or in conjunction when a person is faced with a very serious situation or problem. There are moments when the problem or tension gets so high that a person experiencing fear and anxiety may resort to acts of hostility or hysteria.

In reading all this, one has to ask, “Is there any way to avoid fear and anxiety?”

Well, it depends on the person. By not being bothered by the outside opinion, by being strong and true to oneself, knowing that you can stand on your own, that the person can avoid fear and anxiety. Perhaps, self-confidence is the key to maintain peace of mind and a sense of control over one's life.

Being calm and collected helps a person to approach a problem or difficult situation with psychological and emotional stability. That way, undertaking a difficult task or facing a problem becomes a challenge, and not a paralyzing burden.

However, it is important to note that there are situations that call for more responses other that having a self-confidence boost. People with psychological disorders or serious emotional problems may need the help of doctors and other health professionals so that they can deal with stressful situations and other matters that bother them. Medications may be prescribed to control the symptoms of their severe emotional distress. Anti-stress medication, together with counseling and therapy, can do miracles for people who have long suffered from fears and worries that prevent them from living a good, satisfying life.
summary: Getting Ahead of Anxiety

title: Therapeer: Peer Emotional Support
description:
Therapeer: A private emotional support team focused on helping YOU.
Support others emotionally and improve your own emotional well-being.

Get private peer support coping with marriage problems, divorce, depression, anxiety, PTSD, and other matters related to your emotional well-being.

WHAT'S THERAPEER?
• As a PEER you can help other community members seeking emotional support via private group chat.
• As a HOST you can open your own private Support Room, where 3 experienced Peers will join and focus solely on supporting you in your time of need.
• Earn kudos when providing support as a Peer, to use towards your very own private Support Room, FREE OF CHARGE.
• Therapeer is completely ANONYMOUS. You are never asked for your real name and we’ll never disclose your personal information.
• A variety of topics to choose from, including Marriage problems, Depression, Anxiety, PTSD, and many more.


WHY USE THERAPEER?
You're not alone: Everyone faces emotional issues from time to time. Research shows that sharing your experiences with others can be highly therapeutic for both you and the listener. Using Therapeer and participating in private support sessions provides an opportunity for people to share personal experiences and feelings, coping strategies, and to gain a sense of community and empowerment.
Yes, you can go to therapy - but time and place are rigid and it can be so expensive. We get it.
Yes, you can share your issues with your friends, but they don’t always have the time, energy, or ability to answer your emotional needs. We get that, too.
Yes, social network groups and in-person support groups can help, but there's no anonymity. There are certain issues you don’t want the whole world to know about. We TOTALLY get that.
But most of all: Other support group formats aren't focused on solving just one issue - everyone shares the stage. And there's no guarantee that anyone will even respond. Sometimes, you just want the focus to be on YOU.

We get all of that. We get YOU.


HOW DOES IT WORK?
• Provide other community members with emotional support as a Peer. By doing so, it will help you deal with your own challenges in a broader perspective and will make you feel better by knowing you helped others in need.
• Already gained the gratification of helping others? Go ahead and create your very own support room (or, if you don't want to wait, we offer the option to purchase a credit to open your room immediately).
• After your private anonymous Support Room is opened, we match you with other Therapeer community members who have struggled with something similar to what you're experiencing. Peer assignment is based on your personal preferences and on the topic being discussed.

Join Therapeer today! Transform your struggles into strength, support people in need, and improve your own emotional well-being.

CONNECT WITH US!
Feel free to contact us anytime with your questions, comments, and suggestions. We’d love to hear from you!

Email us: support@therapeer.app

comments: I loved this app so much, it's fast and you get to chat with people who experienced the same thing as you. And it is really filled with people full of love ... after my session, i felt so much better than before.
Absolutely love this app, such a brilliant idea and lots of people using it, so immediately get help and theres always people on there to chat to!
Great experience, I would recommend it. However 60min is a short time when you are going through something, please consider extending the time
One of the greatest apps .. it allows you to chat with people from a lo over the world and share your fears and anxieties and talk about anything that you want. Everybody is lovely and supportive.
Great app. Talking as an Individual (a civilian) but as well as proffesional. ;)

title: Colors: Anti-Stress, Relax, Sleep
description:
Do you need help on a stressful day? Are you overwhelmed? Do you have trouble sleeping? Colors helps you eliminate stress, relax or fall asleep easily, quickly and safely with a new way of improving emotions through color and the senses.

Experience the almost magical experience of immersing yourself in color light while listening to the sound of color with the sonocromatic compositions by Neil Harbisson.

Colors is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free.

Neil Harbisson @neilharbisson is the first cyborg in the world officially accepted by a government. The antenna implanted in his skull allows him to have a new sense: the ability to hear colors. Neil Harbisson has achromatism, a visual condition as a result of which he sees the world in grayscale.

Silvia Lladós López @silvia_colors, had a physical health problem that led her to investigate how exposure to color light can help us improve our emotional state and well-being.

Together they have developed Colors, an app that uses game, color psychology and stimulation through light and the sound of color, to find out the emotional state and eliminate stress, relax or fall asleep easily, quickly and safely .
The app has the support and advice of experts in the field of health.

Colors for Children:
(+4) used together with an adult. Ideal to help parents discover the emotional state of their children and help them every day to improve their emotions and fall asleep easily.

HOW IT WORKS:

1. You can use the app everywhere and anytime (works in airplane mode)

2. Unlimited access to free content without ads:

· Play to find your color
Drag, add, paint and remove colors for a few seconds to relax your mind, and decide, without thinking, what color you like most at this time. The color you choose will express how you feel.

· Discover the meaning of your color and how it can help you.

· Immerse yourself in color light using your mobile or tablet.
Do sessions anywhere, anytime! Wake up refreshed and happier with the wake-up option!

· Check your progress
Access the "Me" screen (silhouette icon) to see all your previous sessions, favorite colors, and check your progress.

Use it also in massage sessions, during a short nap, and even to make your child fall asleep faster!

3. Listen to the sound of color with the “Sonochromatic Waves” by Neil Harbisson.

Live the almost magical experience of immersing yourself in color light while listening to the sound of color in all its amplitude.

Activate, through a subscription, the sonochromatic wave compositions Neil Harbisson has created for each color range that you can listen to while performing the light sessions.

A total of six sonochromatic waves that will let you experience an almost magical and unreal experience!

When setting up your session or scheduling your alarm clock, access the option “Waves”.


Colaborate with us:
Part of the benefits of the subscription are used to conduct scientific studies to investigate the benefits of exposure to color through light and sound stimulation.
Some content is only available through a subscription . If you choose to subscribe, the payment will be charged to your Google account at the time of subscription confirmation.

Put color to your life! Feel refreshed and happier

Tell us how you lived this experience! hello@colorstheapp.info

Copyright © ColorsTheApp
"Sonochromatic Waves": Copyright © Neil Harbisson

Activate, through a subscription, the sonochromatic wave compositions Neil Harbisson has created for each color range that you can listen to while performing the light sessions.

A total of six sonochromatic waves that will let you experience an almost magical and unreal experience!

When setting up your session or scheduling your alarm clock, access the option “Waves”.


Colaborate with us:
Part of the benefits of the subscription are used to conduct scientific studies to investigate the benefits of exposure to color through light and sound stimulation.
Some content is only available through a subscription . If you choose to subscribe, the payment will be charged to your Google account at the time of subscription confirmation.

Put color to your life! Feel refreshed and happier

Tell us how you lived this experience! hello@colorstheapp.info

Copyright © ColorsTheApp
"Sonochromatic Waves": Copyright © Neil Harbisson
summary: An almost magical experience! Immerse yourself in the light and sound of color
recentChanges:
· Neil Harbisson, a cyborg artist with an antenna implanted in his skull that allows him to listen to colors, has created compositions of sonocromatic waves so that you can immerse yourself in the light of a color and feel the sound of color.

· A part of the app is free.

· We have removed the ads.

· We have added a News section to the "My Color" screen
comments: I like the concept but it crashes when I go to purchase the upgrade for sound. It says it's not available is this true? Thats really disappointing

I like it but the app crashes from time to time, and it doesn't save so even if I switched to another app and cane back, the game would reset. Also every time you open it the instructions appear which is unnecessary

Really quite goofy. I can move colored circles around that's sbout all. I can do the same and more in PicsArt with a heck of a lot more funtions & custom colors. i didn't see any additional features or option to subscribe. Pointless. uninstalling.
So far, this app is really clalming and I feel like this will help me. No restrictions so that is definitely a plus. No membership required either. I absolutely love this app.
Great app. Really helps my anxiety and gives great sound effects that I really like. Would really recommend.

title: Overcoming Anxiety
description:
Overcoming Anxiety gives you the support you need to see your way through your anxieties, fears and worries. Self-assessment scales help you to determine if you have a problem with anxiety. Simple tools help you take control of your own recovery programme using cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT). An online catalogue offers recommended reading for anxiety and these books can be purchased as e-books for use within the app’s built-in e-reader.

This easy-to-navigate app comes from the publishers of the bestselling Overcoming book series. These books enable people with a range of common mental health problems and disorders to take back control of their life. Each guide is written by an expert practitioner and uses clinically proven techniques to treat long-standing and disabling conditions, both psychological and physical.

This app is totally free and is intended to support a course of therapy, or a guided recovery programme with a doctor, therapist or other healthcare professional. It can be used alongside the book Overcoming Anxiety or other self-help titles for anxiety disorders.

The features in this app can be used at home or on the move, and with just a few minutes spent every day on these exercises, you will build a record of the tools and techniques that work for you and be able to set goals you can work towards over time. 

Visiting www.overcoming.co.uk will also give you access to the wider catalogue of Robinson self-help publications, advice for other mental health conditions, and downloadable resources from our range of books.

title: Breathe • Calm down • Meditate
description:
Minimalistic (yet highly customizable) breath meditation app without ads or distractions. Including a meditation timer.

Choose from well explored breathing rhythms - or create your own - to activate your parasympathetic nervous system.

Learning how to to relax is just like training a muscle (in the brain) - the more you exercise, the stronger it will become.
Build up resilience now and benefit from a clear and functional mind when undergoing stress. Become a less stressed, more compassionate, more healthy human.

Breathing techniques: Custom, Coherent Breathing, Box Breathing, 478, 1:2

The app helps you to: meditate, relax, calm down, fall asleep

summary: Take deep breaths into your belly ... and feel calmness, positivity & optimism.
recentChanges: If you're reading this, release your shoulders from your ears, unclench your jaw and remove your tongue from the roof of your mouth. We physically tend to hold on to stress in least noticeable ways. Relax.
comments: I love this app! Simply to use. Very helpful breathing techniques.

This is a brilliant and simple app. I enjoy using it to relax and to achieve heart cohérence. I like the night theme, the different sounds you can choose and most importantly the ability for the app to run in the background when doing the exercises. I would just ask for an unlimited timer to be added for longer breathing exercise. Keep up the good work developers and thanks for this app.
So relaxing and soothing. I love it it helps me go to sleep instantly.
I dont like it it ok but still i rate 2 stars cuz it dose not help when i am mad, sad, scard.
It works and is easy to use. Simple layout. I wish there was more information about the different techniques and a faq section.

title: Mindfulness: Guided Meditation for Stress, Anxiety
description:
This app contains the best guided mindfulness meditation audio curated for maximum relaxation, fight stress, anxiety, panic attack, procrastination and gives you clarity and peace of mind. This can be used for everyone from beginners to those who practice mindfulness regularly.

Mindfulness Guide app includes:

- 5 minutes Breathing meditation for beginners
-12 minutes intermediate breath, sound and body scan meditation
- 19 minutes Complete Meditation for advanced users
- 9 minutes and 20 minutes versions of Loving and Kindness Meditation
- 7 Minutes meditation for working with difficulties
-3 minutes short body scan and body and sound meditation guide
- 27 minutes guided sitting practice meditation
- 13 minutes body scan for sleep for sleep-deprived users


This Mindfulness Guide app sessions are all free to use. No monthly subscription. No in-app purchasing. No none sense and minimalist design.

Additional bonus sessions are music background for sleep.
And there's more! 3 high quality spa music for relaxation and reflection.



Sample Transcript is written below:

Breathing Meditation (5:31)

Find a relaxed, comfortable position
Seated on a chair or on the floor, on a cushion
Keep your back upright, but not too tight
Hands resting wherever they're comfortable
Tongue on the roof of your mouth or wherever it's comfortable.
And you can notice your body
From the inside
Noticing the shape of your body, the weight, touch
And let yourself relax
And become curious about your body
Seated here
The sensations of your body
The touch
The connection with the floor
The chair
Relax any areas of tightness or tension
Just breathe
Soften
And now begin to tune into your breath
In your body
Feeling the natural flow of breath
Don't need to do anything to your breath
Not long not short just natural
And notice where you feel your breath in your body
It might be in your abdomen
It may be in your chest or throat
Or in your nostrils
See if you can feel the sensations of breath
One breath at a time
When one breath ends, the next breath begins
Now as you do this you might notice that your mind might start to wander
You might start thinking about other things
If this happens this is not a problem
It's very natural
Just notice that your mind has wandered
You can say "thinking" or "wandering" in your head softly
And then gently redirect your attention right back to the breathing
So we'll stay with this for some time in silence
Just a short time
Noticing our breath
From time to time getting lost in thought and returning to our breath
See if you can be really kind to yourself in the process
And once again you can notice your body, your whole body, seated here
Let yourself relax even more deeply
And then offer yourself some appreciation
For doing this practice today
Whatever that means to you
Finding a sense of ease and well being for yourself and this day
[bell rings]

comments: App went down April 8-9, 2019. since it's been back online, it glitches. It stops, somewhere in the middle of the meditation, then in the early morning, it will finish by waking me up, with the finish of the meditation. It's not a four star anymore. Too bad. I used to love this app, it was my favorite. * I reinstalled, it didn't help.

Fastest way to meditate, just open app and select the version or time limit that suits you. Not as varied as Insight Timer, but If you need to relax NOW, and don't want to click on several pages before you get to the actual meditations, then this is the app for you. Instant meditations, no BS no loud or flashing ads, you are always seconds away from guided relaxation & grounding techniques. Simple, reliable and drama free access to guided meditations

lovely music to induce deep relaxation, even when you think you might be too stressed to unwind. with tracks at 8 hours long, the music won't suddenly stop and jolt you out of your chilled groove. the woman who talks thru the meditations has a soothing voice, I was worried it might grate after a while, but I find it quite the opposite. I could do without the gong before and after meditations as I found it quite jarring, but that's my only gripe with otherwise decent spp

I find this app very relaxing. The lady narrator has a warm and relaxing voice to listen to which makes meditation comfortable. Although the music meditations are nice, personally I prefer the guided meditations to chill and to go to sleep. I hope there will be another update soon will include more guided meditations.
glitches and stops in the middle of meditation. No cool! when my phone goes to sleep so does the meditation, it does not continue as it should. Very annoying.

title: Whispers from God - Christian Meditation
description:
Whispers from God is a Christian Meditation App created to help you align your heart and mind with God’s Word. 

This app is beautiful and very easy to use. Designed to help you renew your mind as you begin each morning and calm your mind before each night’s rest. Daily meditations, which include scripture readings, are designed to help you through anxiety, fear, hurt, relationships and more. These meditations will encourage you to quiet your mind and allow you to focus your attention on what God’s Word says about you and your life. 

 “Keep this Book of the Law always on your lips; meditate on it day and night, so that you may be careful to do everything written in it. Then you will be prosperous and successful.” Joshua 1:8 

BENEFITS INCLUDE:

•	Daily guided meditations
•	Daily encouragement from the Word of God
•	Meditations to guide you through your struggles
•	Find hope in hearing the Scriptures
•	Draw closer in your relationship with God 
•	More wisdom and understanding of the Scriptures
•	Reduce your stress and fight anxiety/depression with the truth of God’s Word
•	Fall asleep quicker by quieting your mind with sleep sounds and Scripture readings
•	Enhance the quality of your sleep by bringing more peace to your mind
•	Improve your relationships with family, friends, and co-workers
•	Join the Whispers from God  Community

Users can select from 38 different scenic landscapes as the backdrop to each meditation. Allow the soothing sounds and sights of God’s creation relax your heart, soul and mind as you focus on each guided meditation.
In addition to receiving daily meditationals, you may CHOOSE FROM OVER 130+ TOPICAL MEDITATIONS (with more added weekly) specific to your daily needs. 

TOPICS INCLUDE:

•	Overcoming depression
•	Conquering anxiety and fear
•	Overcoming sin
•	Discovering purpose
•	Finding joy
•	Recovering from addiction
•	Forgiveness
•	Relationship challenges
•	Parenting
•	Marriage
•	And much more!

Whispers from God creates access to hear God speak, as you simply listen to the Word, read the Word and meditate upon it. When we do this daily, His whispers will build up our faith and our heart, soul and mind will be aligned with Christ.

Join the Whispers from God Community where you can share your growth and encourage others throughout your biblical meditation journey.

“But his delight is in the law of the LORD, And on His law, he meditates day and night. He is like a tree planted by streams of water, that yields its fruit in its season and its leaf does not wither; In all that he does, he prospers.” - Psalm 1:2-3 

Terms of use: https://whispersfromgod.app/terms-conditions
Privacy policy: https://whispersfromgod.app/privacy-policy

Find true peace for your soul as you learn to meditate daily upon the Word of God and incorporate the Scriptures into your life.

Our prayer is that our app helps you grow closer to Christ and align your soul with the Word of God.
comments: I previously gave this app 5 stars, before I realized it is only a FREE TRIAL. You can listen to 21 meditations before it ends. But the monthly fee is $8 and the annual fee is $40. That's a bit steep. So I'll be uninstalling, and it's really disappointing. They're not guided meditations in the sense I'm used to. Imagine bite sized sermons on scriptures related to the issue you're dealing with (anger for example).

I love the easy lay out of the app & cobtent. Update, Sept 30,20. This app was working fine then afew weeks later, I can't log in. I get this message"Error: socket closed during hand shake " Uninstalled and intastalled several times even powered phone on /off. Still get the same message. Am very disappointed, because when it works, the messages are uplifting, and I was used to taking 3 minutes breaks at work to use the app. I can't reach out to developers, am subscribed for a year, for this?

The meditation is easy to access and stills my spirit while turning me to God and His Word. The speakers talk fast compared to what I'm used to, so a method in the app to change the rate of speech would be good. Some devotional speakers express themselves more meaningfully than others in their tone and emphasis, but I thank the Lord that the app is available and I know His Word does not go forth and return void. He will use this tool to His Purpose if we are open to His transforming power.

Whispers is a great app...I love the scriptures and devotionals... the sound of the waves along with the word of God refresh my spirit and gives me a sense of peace and calm especially at nights..to God be the glory!!
So easy to use, very simple in its content on various topics. Being able to apply this in everyday walk with God. Great for those just beginning their relationship with God.

title: Visualize Healing with Andrew Johnson
description:
Use the power of guided meditation and mindfulness to be happier, stress free and able to overcome adversity. 

Choose this gentle meditation and relaxation techniques to weather any storm and listen when you need mental and wellbeing support. 

Through the power of visualisation learn to meditate, be calm, and create a relaxed happy mindset. Achieve positive change in all areas of your life and use this exercise to achieve your goals.

Destress, improve your mindset, sleep better, grow your confidence and be healthier with guided meditations, mindfulness sessions and positive messages – and much more.

Mindfulness expert, coach and therapist Andrew Johnson has been helping people deal with life’s challenges with guided relaxations, meditations, self-care tools and breathing exercises for many years. 

His best-selling range of mindfulness apps have a variety of content to help you, whether you are looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety, lose weight, improve your health & confidence, learn relaxation techniques, etc.

Key features:

  • Short meditations you can do anywhere: at work, commuting, at home, walking.

  •Inspirational sessions to help you tackle life’s challenges, to be calm and find clarity.

  •Mindfulness stories and talks to help you build better, healthy habits.

  •Meditations to help you feel inspired and find motivated to eat well, workout and stay 
   healthy both in body and mind.

  •Relaxation techniques and tools to help you sleep better every night, to wake feeling 
   energised and refreshed.

  •Breathing exercises and calming meditations for anxiety, panic attacks and stress relief.

  •Meditation sessions to stop anxiety in its tracks and release stress.

How do I get more?

Start your day mindfully, keep feeling positive and be inspired throughout the day with a range of guided meditations to help during tough or stressful moments. Boost your energy with a Power Nap, stay focussed to Beat Procrastination, and then drift off using a Deep Sleep meditation for a restful night.

Think of Andrew as your personal mindfulness coach, always there to help when you need him most.

Search for Andrew Johnson to unlock more daily mindfulness and guided meditation sessions.

comments: This is great for those with worries and pain in the body. It takes you through a deep breathing exercise then a guided visualization. I listened to it every night for a week, but then the App suddenly stopped working. I uninstalled it then reinstalled it again, and it still cuts off once the speaker comes on. I was quite disappointed.

I suffer from anxiety and post-traumatic stress disorder I have listened to this application for more than 4 years and it has helped me deal with this. I've been able sleep some of the best sleep I have ever had.
Absolutely love this meditation. I purchased the tull version and use it daily. Definitely recommend. 10/10
so soothing and relaxing

Andrew's voice is healing and comforting, you truly get so relaxed that your mind, body and spirit. I have very severe migraines, and I am currently working on Biofeedback, but I have been bringing in this app into my sessions as opposed to the one's that they use, and my measurements have gone down.

title: Anxiety Test
description:
Anxiety Test allows you to evaluate your anxiety. Anxiety Test has different recognized questionnaires such as HAM-A, GAD-7 and self test. Anxiety Test asks your different questions and you provide answers on the scale of 0 to maximum either 3 or 4 depending upon the type of test you choose. anxiety test helps you better understand whether you should see a doctor or not. 

Disclaimer:
These self-test are not designed to be a final diagnostic for your anxiety. If you result is on the high range, you must see a proper physician.

The good thing about this app is that it has multiple tests unlike other apps..
Anxiety test app is best app. I like this app so much.
Very useful app.
Anxiety test really allowed me to find the help i needed in the darkest days of my life.

title: Anxiety Cures - Relieve Stress, Increase Happiness
description:
Anxiety Cures is an educational/research app to help you end anxiety, improve mental health, manage stress, reduce depression, increase mindfulness, stop panic attacks, and finding happiness. 

The app is updated regularly with in-depth knowledge, extensive research, and tools from many sources, that are scientifically shown to help reduce stress and improve relaxation, like calming sounds generator, brain training, sleep time calculator, and breathing exercises.

How To Use This App For Maximum Results
1️⃣  You will receive one (or more) articles virtually every day.
2️⃣  Spend 1-5 minutes to read/skim the article. If the article interest you, bookmark it for easier find later.
3️⃣  When you have more time in the day, you can dig deeper to understand more the subject taught in the article. Use your daily journal to make some notes as necessary. You can spend 15-30 minutes on this.
4️⃣  If the article requires you to take actions, e.g., to do some breathing exercise, relaxation or meditation, make a plan to find the best time and space where you can perform the actions effectively. You can do it on the same day, or later in the weekend.
5️⃣  Make this as part of your daily/weekly ritual, and you'll see positive changes happening in your life and happiness becomes your life's reality.

In today’s fast-paced, rapidly-changing world, feeling stressed and overwhelmed has quickly become a big part of our everyday lives – and being able to identify and cope with anxiety, stress, and depression is fast becoming an essential life skill.

Features
★ Contents to help relieve anxiety, sleep well, relaxation, happiness (updated regularly)
★ Motivational videos
★ Inspirational quotes
★ Tools for relaxation, breathing exercise, sleep sounds: rain sound, calming sound, white noise, sleep calculator, brain test, etc.
★ Free and fun games to help improve your mood, train your mental agility and kill some time.

Download now. Turn your stress to your advantage and your fear into confidence

4️⃣ If the article requires you to take actions, e.g., to do some breathing exercise, relaxation or meditation, make a plan to find the best time and space where you can perform the actions effectively. You can do it on the same day, or later in the weekend.
5️⃣ Make this as part of your daily/weekly ritual, and you'll see positive changes happening in your life and happiness becomes your life's reality.

In today’s fast-paced, rapidly-changing world, feeling stressed and overwhelmed has quickly become a big part of our everyday lives – and being able to identify and cope with anxiety, stress, and depression is fast becoming an essential life skill.

★ Contents to help relieve anxiety, sleep well, relaxation, happiness (updated regularly)

★ Free and fun games to help improve your mood, train your mental agility and kill some time.

Download now. Turn your stress to your advantage and your fear into confidence

This app is designed to help people and specially Veterans who have experienced Post Traumatic Stress Disorder/Syndrome or living with PTSD Symptoms. Bust PTSD App helps to reduce PTSD symptoms in a cost-effective and time-efficient manner. The beauty of Bust PTSD App; No Disclosure of Personal Information Required, No Need to Work Around Schedules for Appointment, it's Affordable, Reduces Symptoms and Improves Quality of Life. Bust PTSD App may also help people to deal with Depression, Panic Attacks and Anxiety Issues, because unresolved and untreated PTSD can be a contributing factor in a variety of mental health issues or conditions.

title: PTSD FREE
description:
Certified by The American Institute of Stress, PTSD FREE is created for veterans, soldiers, and anyone suffering from Post Traumatic Stress. A 3-tier solution designed to help users manage PTSD symptoms. The app offers one-touch instant relief, a customized reminder that helps predict PTSD reactions, a tab to manage your meditation practice, and a tool to help process the traumatic memories that fuel PTSD. Through brainwave entrainment, the app quickly shuts down the fight-or-flight reaction and activates the body’s natural relaxation response. The app includes a complimentary Stress Is Gone Membership, which provides ongoing aftercare through online tools and can connect you with a live coach if needed.

KEY FEATURES: 

Stopper Tab
• One-Touch Instant Relief to manage random stress reactions. 
• Predicts and stops routine reactions just before your stress is triggered. 

MyMeds Tab
• Structures and maintains your meditation practice. 

Resolve Tab
• Revolutionary Tool to Process Traumatic Memories that fuel PTSD reactions. 

Also Includes
----------------------
• Complimentary Stress Is Gone Membership; 24/7 access to online relaxation tools (PC and Mobile). 
• Stress Stopper Breathwork; 3-step process helps users take control by activating the Relaxation Response whenever they become stressed. 
• Coaching; allows you to contact a coach if/when your stress becomes unmanageable. 

STANDARD FEATURES: 

√ Intuitive set-up and design 
√ Facebook Integration 
√ In-App Browser

APP BENEFITS: 

√ Naturally avoid stress-related diseases 
√ Naturally calm stressful emotions 
√ Naturally quiet stressful thoughts 
√ Naturally stop a stress reaction 
√ Enjoy all the benefits of meditation 
√ Learn to fall asleep fast 

The key to managing PTSD more effectively is using this app as directed. Every time you become stressed, press the app icon and breathe. Every time a Stress Stopper reminder shows up on your device, breathe along with the animation. When it’s time to meditate, give yourself the 5, 10, or 15 minutes of relaxation that will improve your life. And finally, get to the root of the issue; use the Resolve Tab to help process those past memories that affect everyday life. All these tools together will prolong your life and help prevent future stress-related health problems such as cancer, panic attacks, anxiety, depression, cardiovascular and gastrointestinal diseases, migraines, sleep problems, chronic fatigue, ulcers, etc.
Stress Is Gone offers PTSD FREE to Veterans and Active-Duty Soldiers, as an additional tool that compliments any treatment plan. The app offers in the moment self-care and added support. There is help, we’re here, and we deeply and respectfully thank you for your service. Download now to start managing PTSD with greater efficiency.

title: How to Deal With Anxiety
description:
This app contains about How to Deal With Anxiety. Learn everything and you will find tips and knowledge to reduce even get rid anxiety in any situations.

Health issues can make your life worse and hence they must be paid due attention. There are certain health complications that show their adverse effects at once. On the other hand, there are those that gradually build up and turn into something serious even before you know about it. Anxiety is one such disorder that can turn into a monster if you do not take measures to deal with it. Panic and anxiety disorders trouble millions of people worldwide. Anxiety is related to stress and is a psychological and physiological state where the person feels disturbed emotionally and mentally. Most of the people also refer to this complication as 'slow poisoning'. You should ideally be aware of the aspects that will help you deal with anxiety. Dealing with anxiety is not a very difficult process, especially if you happen to follow the right methods.


In this app, we will disscuss the following topics:

• How to Beat Anxiety Without Medication, According To a New Scientific Study
• How To Deal With Anxiety The Natural Way
• 5 Ways to Help Reduce Anxiety in Children with Autism
• 10 Things You Should Know If Your Partner Has Anxiety
• How to Overcome Job Interview Anxiety
• How To Handle Anxiety At Work So It Doesn't Destroy Your Whole Day
• 15 Easy Ways to Beat Anxiety Now
• 7 Useful Strategies for Managing Anxiety and Burnout
• How To Deal With Anxiety - 12 Tips For Managing Anxiety at Work
• 9 Easy Ways To Deal With Everyday Anxiety: A Doctor Explains

And much more..


[ Features ]

- Easy & simple guide book app
- Periodic update of contents
- Support Offline Database 
- Shareable contents
- You can ask questions from our experts
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it


A little words about How to Deal With Anxiety:

How to deal with anxiety and stress may be a common question asked by most of us at this time and age. We experience anxiety and stress almost everyday of our lives. It may be caused by different factors which in turn affect our work, relationships and most of all, our health. 

There is an impending need to manage anxiety and stress so that our physical and mental well being is not compromised. Inability to sleep well, headaches, mood swings and loss of concentration are just some of the negative effects they bring. Never be enslaved again with the following tips on how to deal with anxiety and stress.

Remember that you don't have control of everything that is happening around you. Focus on current and important things that you have power over. Worrying about tomorrow only brings stress over things that haven't even happened yet. Live in the now and always try to look at the positive side of any situation.

Engage in activities that will increase your self confidence. Through this, you'll have more faith in your self to overcome stressful and anxiety ridden circumstances. How to deal with anxiety and stress is also just a matter of self empowerment. Make use of your best qualities and improve on the ones where you lack.

Find a hobby or any interesting activity that you could look forward to doing at the end of the day. May it be writing in a journal, gardening, scrapbooking or baking. Use it as a way for you to relax and loosen up. Have your mind presently involved in your chosen activity and block out stressful thoughts and set problems aside. Consider it as a "me,myself and I" time where you can recharge and regroup after a long busy routine.

Keep in mind that it is only you who can make or break your day. Anxiety and stress will impede your everyday living only if you allow them to.


Download How to Deal With Anxiety app now to read more..

title: Yoga for Anxiety
description:
Yoga Sequence for Anxiety and Stress Relief     
  
Anxiety can be a bit of a hassle. Whether you suffer from a generalized or acute anxiety disorder, it can create feelings of limited control, low self-esteem, persistent fear, panic, anger and defeat.

You can use the tools of yoga to find peace and support from within. This simple practice has been designed to help you.  It’s perfect for when you are feeling anxiety or seeking more balance in your life. Especially in a time when we are so focused on the body - use this practice to tend to your mind, your thoughts. Accept where you are today and allow the simple yet powerful tools of yoga to guide you to relieve and joy. You deserve it. 

Anxiety does not have to control you, it is simply a part of what makes us human. 
You don't need a class, special yoga clothes or athletic wear to perform these poses. All you need is space, dedication and the fearlessness to implement them. You can do this sequence whenever you're feeling anxious, to help ground you back to the present moment. Be inspired, be free and be well.

title: TalkLife for Anxiety, Depression & Stress
description:
TalkLife is all about support. Our community is full of people who have also felt alone, battled depression or living with anxiety and needed somewhere safe to talk. TalkLife is a positive community where people have real conversations about how they feel - lonely, misunderstood, unhappy, or actually feeling alright. 

People use TalkLife to seek support for the bad times, but also celebrate the good ones. You, your thoughts, your feelings are important - don't keep them bottled up. You can even vent anonymously. 

You may feel bad now, but you're not alone, and there are better times ahead. TalkLife is here for you through the shiny and the muck, and they can really lift you. Download TalkLife and say hello. 

Download TalkLife and you can safely talk about any struggles and reach support across many areas including, anxiety, self-harm, living with depression, self harm, loneliness, PTSD, bipolar, suicidal thoughts, and many more. 

*Please note, if you are in a crisis situation, please seek emergency support as soon as possible. Peer support should not be used if you are in an emergency situation.

comments: I've only been on for a less than an hour and I uninstalled. I can't stand the creepy/inappropriate comments. Honestly made me feel worse. The ads are annoying and the filters are so limited. I want to filter based on country and multiple age groups. I do not like how all the categories are merged together on my feed. I wanted to find a safe space to escape the toxicity on other social media sites and this is just as bad.

For the moment, you can actually converse with people. It's not flooded with bots, OF/IG farmers, or the casual hook-up crowd. There are edgelords, but for the moment.... It's great. Said after spending 10+ hours of near continual usage on the app. Further, in that time the mods/admins were active in discussing community issues, and pending changes in an open posting. Refreshing, and grateful that I stumbled across TalkLife. Keep it secret, keep it safe. ;)

Few things annoy me about it (full page ads every so often, not non stop though but they are hard to exit out of), can't quickly scroll to the top of a page and can't set unique backgrounds for a post. All in all though, a good, helpful app!

I'm using this app for 5 months and it helped me in a lot way, like making friends, taking care of my mental health and helping people. And the new update is so cool. Especially the groups we can moderate our own group and publicize it. So happy to see a community growing and being a part of it.

Im not saying this is a replacement for seeing a psychiatrist. But for peoplelike me sometimes its good to express yourself in a healthy way and receive support. This app honestly helped me stop crying and smile for the first time in a long time.

title: Ease My Stress & Anxiety
description:
Never go to bed with stress again.

Our ancestors had lot of time on their hands and have left behind so many simple yet powerful techniques for us. We just need to follow their footsteps and not try and attempt to re-invent their cycle. I fell into that fast-paced lifestyle and destroyed my health. Diagnosed with diabetes at 32 years old, I had a heart attack due to work related stress. Thats when I decided enough is enough and I need to transform from the inside out. 3 years of intense research and experiments in Yoga led me to these routines which gave my body a chance to repair and reverse all my health issues. I have reversed my diabetes, strengthened my heart and rid my body of medications. When I look back, I remember the stressed and harmful lifestyle I was living and the diseases it created. 
I took Yoga teacher certification and Pranayama Teacher certification from classical gurus (Old-School). 

I am now on a mission to help people get rid of lifestyle diseases, stress and medications. What I am sharing in this app is my daily routine and the fundamentals I practice every day. Stress is the silent killer of our time - leading to heart attacks and preventing us from achieving our health goals thereby triggering even more diseases. A 40-year-old getting heart attacks is becoming common.

Get rid of unwanted stress and get complete control of your body. Never go to bed again with stress and suppression.

1. Prevent Back Pain – With countless hours of sitting all day we mess up the natural alignment of our back. This simple routine will help fix the weak areas around the spine and neck and puts back the Spine discs in the natural socket. It will fix your back pain and will be helpful to make you sit straight for Meditation. Studies show that 80+ million Americans are suffering from some form of
back & spine related issues.

2. Release Stress in Upper Back & Neck - Text neck is now a common problem because of regular use of smartphones. Doing these routines will alleviate stress in the upper back and neck and practicing this exercise regularly can help avoid major issues. This chapter will prepare you for the next chapter where you will learn of how to breathe correctly.

3. Fix Breathing - Nourish & Detoxify your body by fixing your breathing – to perform optimally, our Brain and Body need sufficient oxygen. This technique is natural way of breathing and we used to breathe this way when we were babies. Stress leads to heavy, shallow breathing which in turn leads to even more stress. Practicing the Deep breathing exercises will help improve breathing and calm down the body. With regular practice, you will feel the oxygen saturating your body. You can’t meditate if you don’t know how to breathe correctly. Breathing deeply strengthens the heart.

4. Om Chanting - With Chanting OM, you produce vibrations and stop thoughts flowing through your head and helps in relaxing. It is a type of meditation and with regular practice we produce alpha, theta and delta waves which results in secretion of hormones like Serotonin. Serotonin is a natural mood stabilizer. It’s the chemical that helps with sleeping, eating, and digesting.

5. Strengthen Lungs/Fire Breathing - Regular practice of this routine will help strengthen lungs and the cardiovascular system without running. This routine will activate millions of air sacs in the lungs.

6. Fix Stress & Depression - Several techniques to de-stress the body. These can be applied
almost anywhere.

7. Remove Suppression – learn to release anger and frustration, as long-term suppression will lead to depression and panic attacks.

8. Meditation – I will teach you to Tap into your Higher brain(Analytical). With the past 7 weeks of training in relaxation techniques, the final week of Meditation can help you reach your full potential to live a stress-free lifestyle. You will not be running @100 miles per hour on the inside anymore.

title: Beat Social Phobia with Andrew Johnson
description:
A guided meditation to help you overcome social phobia and anxiety in challenging social situations. 

Go into social settings and gatherings feeling confident and free from anxiety or stress. Use these relaxation techniques to build self-esteem and empower yourself with positive intentions and affirmations. 

Through simple yet powerful messages, Beat Social Phobia will help you to:

  •Shift your mindset, strengthen your mental resilience.
  •Feel powerful in a social setting or difficult circumstances. 
  •Feel relaxed even in an uncomfortable situation.
  •Ensure sure you have a positive and amazing day despite social phobias.

If you need a daily self-care reminder that you can thrive in social settings, then download this app today.

Destress, improve your mindset, sleep better, grow your confidence and be healthier with guided meditations, mindfulness sessions and positive messages – and much more.

Mindfulness expert, coach and therapist Andrew Johnson has been helping people deal with life’s challenges with guided relaxations, meditations, self-care tools and breathing exercises for many years. 

His best-selling range of mindfulness apps have a variety of content to help you, whether you are looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety, lose weight, improve your health & confidence, learn relaxation techniques, etc.

Key features:

  • Short meditations you can do anywhere: at work, commuting, at home, walking.

  •Inspirational sessions to help you tackle life’s challenges, to be calm and find clarity.

  •Mindfulness stories and talks to help you build better, healthy habits.

  •Meditations to help you feel inspired and find motivated to eat well, workout and stay 
   healthy both in body and mind.

  •Relaxation techniques and tools to help you sleep better every night, to wake feeling 
   energised and refreshed.

  •Breathing exercises and calming meditations for anxiety, panic attacks and stress relief.

  •Meditation sessions to stop anxiety in its tracks and release stress.

How do I get more?

Start your day mindfully, keep feeling positive and be inspired throughout the day with a range of guided meditations to help during tough or stressful moments. Boost your energy with a Power Nap, stay focussed to Beat Procrastination, and then drift off using a Deep Sleep meditation for a restful night.

Think of Andrew as your personal mindfulness coach, always there to help when you need him most.

Search for Andrew Johnson to unlock more daily mindfulness and guided meditation sessions.

title: Mood Patterns - a mood tracker with privacy
description:
Overview
General Features
* usable as mood tracker and mood diary
* avoid recall bias with experience sampling
* as many surveys per day as you like
* 30 predefined mood scales
* 20 fully customizable scales
* customizable additionally data:
 - places
 - people
 - activities
 - sleep
 - events
* set alerts to be notified if your mood level or variation changes
* get associations between mood and additional data
* explore mood before and after event
* surveys can include notes
* markdown formatting of notes
* see data in beautiful, zoomable graphs
* export graphs
* export data 
* light and dark theme
Security Features
* NO internet connection
* App lock (with fingerprint)
* encryption of stored data
Note
Due to its many features Mood Patterns is NOT the simplest mood tracker. It probably will take you a few minutes until you know your way around the app. But we try our hardest to make it worth your while with helpful, detailed, and multifaceted insights. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask them at contact@moodpatterns.info or our FB page (link in the app).
 Details
Gain insights into your feelings
A mood journal or mood diary is a great way to keep a record of your feelings, but Mood Patterns can do much more for you. It is not just a mood tracker but links how you feel, to your location, company, and activity as well as to how you slept and to recent events in your life. Use it to explore the patterns in your mood.
Capture how you feel in your daily life
Classical diaries are great, but they have one major flaw - they are subject to recall bias. Some activities in our lives are more salient than others. We remember them better and more vividly and therefore often believe that they take a larger part of each day than they do. However, for most of us, routines fill the largest part of our daily life and those are often overlooked in diaries. 

To capture all parts of your life that matter Mood Patterns uses a technique of the social sciences: ecological momentary assessment also known as experience sampling. It never asks you to remember anything but records how you feel right at the moment. 
You are unique
Where we go, who we meet, and what we do is individual. With Mood Patterns, you do not have to choose from a fixed set of categories but can tailor your options to your personal needs. Be as nuanced as you like in configuring places, people, and activities.
Your data is yours
How you feel is sensitive private data. We believe it should not be carelessly entrusted to anybody. Mood Patterns  does not request Internet permission, therefore no data transfer in the background without your knowledge is possible. Mood Patterns will not send us or anybody else your data.

Nonetheless, we believe that you should have full access to the data you produce. You can export all collected data as a SQL database anytime you like.
Your data is safe
Denying Mood Patterns Internet access frees you from the need to trust us, but what about others? An app lock assures that only you can use your Mood Patterns app. To prevent that the app lock is bypassed  by connecting your mobile phone to a PC all data is 256-bit AES encrypted. Unfortunately, there is no 100% safety but Mood Patterns makes it hard to get your data without your consent.
descriptionHTML:
Overview


General Features


* usable as mood tracker and mood diary
* avoid recall bias with experience sampling
* as many surveys per day as you like
* 30 predefined mood scales
* 20 fully customizable scales
* customizable additionally data:
- places
- people
- activities
- sleep
- events
* set alerts to be notified if your mood level or variation changes
* get associations between mood and additional data
* explore mood before and after event
* surveys can include notes
* markdown formatting of notes
* see data in beautiful, zoomable graphs
* export graphs
* export data
* light and dark theme

Security Features


* NO internet connection
* App lock (with fingerprint)
* encryption of stored data

Note


Due to its many features Mood Patterns is NOT the simplest mood tracker. It probably will take you a few minutes until you know your way around the app. But we try our hardest to make it worth your while with helpful, detailed, and multifaceted insights. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask them at contact@moodpatterns.info or our FB page (link in the app).

Details


Gain insights into your feelings


A mood journal or mood diary is a great way to keep a record of your feelings, but Mood Patterns can do much more for you. It is not just a mood tracker but links how you feel, to your location, company, and activity as well as to how you slept and to recent events in your life. Use it to explore the patterns in your mood.

Capture how you feel in your daily life


Classical diaries are great, but they have one major flaw - they are subject to recall bias. Some activities in our lives are more salient than others. We remember them better and more vividly and therefore often believe that they take a larger part of each day than they do. However, for most of us, routines fill the largest part of our daily life and those are often overlooked in diaries.

To capture all parts of your life that matter Mood Patterns uses a technique of the social sciences: ecological momentary assessment also known as experience sampling. It never asks you to remember anything but records how you feel right at the moment.

You are unique


Where we go, who we meet, and what we do is individual. With Mood Patterns, you do not have to choose from a fixed set of categories but can tailor your options to your personal needs. Be as nuanced as you like in configuring places, people, and activities.

Your data is yours


How you feel is sensitive private data. We believe it should not be carelessly entrusted to anybody. Mood Patterns does not request Internet permission, therefore no data transfer in the background without your knowledge is possible. Mood Patterns will not send us or anybody else your data.

Nonetheless, we believe that you should have full access to the data you produce. You can export all collected data as a SQL database anytime you like.

Your data is safe


Denying Mood Patterns Internet access frees you from the need to trust us, but what about others? An app lock assures that only you can use your Mood Patterns app. To prevent that the app lock is bypassed by connecting your mobile phone to a PC all data is 256-bit AES encrypted. Unfortunately, there is no 100% safety but Mood Patterns makes it hard to get your data without your consent.
summary: Find out how different people, places, activities, and sleep affect your mood.
