recentChanges: Improved welcome screen to better explain how you unlock skills
comments: Even though it seems like I'm doing better, my skills go down almost every time I try a game. I did the bubble popping one, got halfway, played again, and had it decrease. That's after struggling with the pattern one and trying it 5 times only to have my score decrease or stay the same every time. How am I supposed to unlock anything if my score keeps decreasing? Go easy on us at least a little, not everyone's good at everything
SCAM!!!! This games doesn't list a cost, but it's $6.00, or .99 for each game. Do not install. There are other "stress games" exactly like this that are completely free. Not worth the price.

Sounds promising, but just doesn't work. The start button is unresponsive and when I have been able to get past the opening screen, clicking on the skill game or menu icon does nothing so I literally couldn't interact with this app. Waste of time. Uninstalling/reinstalling didn't help.

Probably the best relax and focus game. Very simple. And works fast. One game and you're back on track. Unlike many other relaxation games, this one doesn't mimic those slimes or fidget toys. But it works way better.

cant use sadly, sounds like a great idea but it has a start button and does not respond when I tap on it. keeping it installed and awaiting an update to have that get fixed. when/if that happens I'll change my review

title: Anxiety Relief Apps Guide
description:
Anxiety Relief Apps Guide

Are you constantly afraid, worried, or perhaps nervous? Do you have trouble sleeping, or always feel tired and panicky? Do you often wonder why you can't stop worrying and why you're still fearful? Do you wish you could overcome these issues so you can start living the life you want?

These types of feelings and emotions are often diagnosed as anxiety. These feelings of worry and fear are a normal reaction of the brain that is a result of many factors that are causing an imbalance or challenge to our daily routine. Everyone deals with moments in their life when they feel like the world is about to fall apart on us. During these moments, it can be difficult to describe the feelings of tension, helplessness, and anxiety that is running rampant through our minds. We feel that we would be ecstatic if
 
we could simply disappear and emerge when stressful situations in our lives have passed.

While this is a completely normal reaction to stressful situations, there are times when these emotions and thoughts become so common that they start to have a major impact on our lives. When this happens, you have crossed the line from normal into   abnormal. If your feelings of fear  become  so  frequent  a debilitating that you have difficulties performing even the most  basic of physical activities, then it is a much more serious problem that needs to be addressed. Many people experience this  condition, known as an anxiety disorder.  Generally  speaking,  if our reactions to certain situations are much more grandiose than the response of others, then you might be suffering from an   anxiety disorder.

Fortunately, if you are suffering from an anxiety disorder, there is hope that you can be successfully treated and start to live a   normal life once again. An experience that is free of constant fear, worry, and anxiety. By making some simple changes in your lifestyle and daily routine, you can start to overcome your anxiety and finally be free of the debilitating effects of the condition.

Features:

anxiety causes

anxiety treatment

types of anxiety disorders

anxiety depression

anxiety quotes

anxiety medication

generalized anxiety disorder

Panic Attack Treatment

Download NOW!!

title: Mindfulness Coach
description:
Mindfulness means noticing and paying attention to what is going on in the present moment, without passing judgment on it. Mindfulness has been shown to be effective for reducing stress, improving emotional balance, increasing self-awareness, helping with anxiety and depression, and coping more effectively with chronic pain.

Mindfulness Coach 2.0 was developed to help Veterans, Service members, and others learn how to practice mindfulness. The app provides a gradual, self-guided training program designed to help you understand and adopt a simple mindfulness practice. Mindfulness Coach also offers a library of information about mindfulness (for example “What is Mindfulness?”, “How to Anchor Your Attention”), 12 audio-guided mindfulness exercises and a growing catalog of additional exercises available for free download, goal-setting and tracking, a mindfulness mastery assessment to help you track your progress over time, customizable reminders, and access to other support and crisis resources. Mindfulness Coach is free, doesn’t take or share any of your personal information, and doesn’t require add-on purchases.

Mindfulness Coach was created by VA’s National Center for PTSD.

recentChanges:
* More fixes for Welcome screen issues that were causing some devices to be stuck there
* If your device still can't continue past Welcome, please email us with your model and Android version
comments: Beautiful app, with great instruction. It really helps with knowing deeper mindfulness. I have practiced meditation and mindfulness for over 10 years. Perhaps adding the option of music during the meditation might be the only improvement I would make... and possibly lengthen the log area just about 20-30 more characters for logging ideas. Thanks again for providing the app.

I love this app! It really works if you give it a chance, it's also something from the Government that's REALLY FREE! I been suffering from PTSD for over 20 years. Living on a fixed income makes it impossible to afford someone elses income. Just by hapenstance I found this & I thank God that I have a way to calm myself down on/in those "uncomfortable" times.

Neat, clean, simple, and simply the best meditation app. No ads, no subscriptions - just mindfulness. Kudos to the great work! Note: used to be buggy when I tried a year or two ago. But now (as of summer 2020) it is totally bug-free and faultless.

Such an awesome app that too free of cost...the mindfulness exercise they provide I thought they will charge for it because they are so helpful and for every thing in your life a mindfulness is present whether for emotional distress,nap,sleep, eating,walking everything...thank you so much the developers..god bless you ❤️

By far one of the best and cleanest and most simple mindfulness app I have ever used. The lessons are very helpful too, you can really tell this was created out of good and kind intentions: to help others be more self-aware in order for us to execute decisions thought about thoroughly. Thank you so much!

title: Antistress - relaxation toys
description:
When you need relaxation, diversion or just a moment of distraction enjoy this collection of toys: hear the sound of a bamboo chime, play with wooden boxes, swipe gently your finger in the water, tap buttons, draw with chalks and so on! Are you waiting for something and you need a diversion? Open Antistress app and start playing with a Newton's cradle! Are you furious with someone? Have some relaxation with the never-old fifteen game! Do you need distraction from study? Open Antistress app and choose one among dozens of toys to play!

Take your time and live a moment of diversion. This game include also an antistress Bamboo chime, a finger scale and some dirty windows to clean! 

Plus, this stress relief app is constantly updated with new antistress toys every 2 weeks, to help you calm down your anxiety with always fresh contents, like finger spinner, finger cube, slime and a bunch of anxiety free toys.

comments: This app is wonderfull!! Would rate it 5 out of 5 stars!!! I love it how you gave a try it for ten mins if you watch and ad so people could see if they wanted to buy the premium pack! But, i found a glitch, I was using the try for free (because my parents wouldn't let me buy it;-;) and i was carving the soap. On the last row, when you finished, the soap would glitch through the knife. My apologies my english isn't good, I'm ten and I'm trying my best 😀

Highly recommended distraction app! My 2 year old boy loves it. And there's plenty of entertainment for adults too. Really well designed, doesn't come across as an afterthought like some of these apps do. I enjoyed it enough to purchased the add-on content, which is good value. It adds some extra games, a few if which are more involved. There is room for improvement: the games could have more settings and added multiplayer focus. That said, the simplicity is its strength!

This game is great and is really useful for whenever I'm stressed! There's just one problem: on game 56, the stovetop cleaning game, when I'm almost done cleaning the entire surface, there's a tiny bit left. The game accepts it as clean, and this is the opposite of calming! Other than this, the game is highly enjoyable. I also have one suggestion: I think you should be able to favorite a few games for easier access, instead of scrolling through them all. All in all, this is a great game!

Amazing. I struggle to relax but this app can usually help me to calm down after a hard day at school. The graphics are of a great quality, and the sound effects really add to the experience. A particular favourite of mine is the clay simulator, which I would like to have more types of. I hope that one of the developers sees this, because I would love them to know what a great app they have made. Thank you so much ♥️.

For those of us who like the challenging and the mundane, these games are either entertaining and crazy obsessive, or relaxing and calm. Great for rainy days, while on lunch break or during time spent in the bathroom. Also perfect for my adult son who has a form of autism and intellectual disabilities. Keeps him busy and focused. Very stimulating, easy and fun. Takes your mind off things when you want it to. Five stars!

title: Anxiety Relief
description:
Anxiety Relief consists of a series of five exercises to assist with anxiety related symptoms and set goals to improve your life situation.

A bit of background, my name is Rohan and I started suffering anxiety after a hectic period in my life. As the symptoms got worse and worse, I struggled to leave the house. After some assistance from some fellow suffers, I have developed a repertoire of exercises to get me through the day and get better over time.

This app was developed in order to assist me bring these exercises into practice, especially when I have a panic attack in public such as on the train or at work. Personally, this has been an amazing companion on my road to healing and I wanted to share it with anyone else who is suffering.

I hope it is as beneficial for you as it has been for me!

NOTE: THIS APP IS NOT INTENDED AS A SUBSTITUTE FOR MEDICAL ADVICE. PLEASE CONSULT A HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL TO ADDRESS ANY MEDICAL SYMPTOMS.

title: Awesome Breathing: Pacer for Meditation and Stress
description:
Awesome Breathing is a simple, elegant tool to guide and visualize your breathing. Use it daily to help with meditation, sleep, stress, anxiety, or to simply bring a few moments of calm or mindfulness to your day.

"Beautiful and responsive UI with customizable breathing patterns."

"I became interested recently in breathwork. This app is a fantastic aid to that work. I only discovered it after weeks of using stopwatches and timers. Great app, thank you!!!!"

"Excellent app, simple to use. As a psychotherapist I am using it myself and recommending to clients who might benefit."

"Simple. Intuitive. Beautiful UI and gestures. Amazing breath app that helps you stay mindful."

Features:

• Clean, simple interface allows for uncluttered and calming breathing experience
• Fully customizable inhale, exhale, and (optional) pause durations
• Choose from included programs such as Box Breathing, Relaxing Breathing, Equal Breathing, Measured Breathing, and Triangle Breathing
• Create and save custom programs!
• Sessions can be free-form (no duration) or timed duration (up to 30 minutes)
• Optional pre-session countdown timer allows for a few moments to "settle in" before your session begins
• Choose from several pacer color themes
• Optional guided vocal cues signal when to inhale, exhale, and hold so breathing can be done without looking at your device
• Vibration mode allows for silent breathing sessions
• Bells can be enabled to signal the beginning and end of your sessions

Included Programs:

Box Breathing (4-4-4-4)

Also known as Navy SEAL or tactical breathing, this is a surprisingly simple and effective way to help regain calm and control of your thoughts when under stress. Inhale for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4. All through your nose.

Relaxing Breathing (4-7-8)

Have trouble falling asleep? Try this 4-7-8 technique. Inhale for 4 through your nose, hold for 7, exhale for 8 out of your mouth.

Equal Breathing (4-4)

A pranayama practice called Sama Vritti, this breath can help take your mind off the racing thoughts or whatever might be distracting you. Inhale for 4, exhale for 4. All through your nose. (Try a 6 or 8 count, once you feel comfortable.)

Measured Breathing (4-1-7)

A handy stress-reducing practice that can be done anywhere, anytime. Inhale for 4, hold for 1, exhale for 7. All through your nose.

Triangle Breathing (4-4-4)

Another great technique that can help alleviate anxiety or stress. Imagine a triangle with equal sides. Inhale for 4, exhale for 4, pause for 4. Repeat.

We hope Awesome Breathing helps you reach your goals, and look forward to being a part of your journey. We are just getting started, so would love to hear your reviews and feedback!

recentChanges: You can now create and save custom programs - our most requested feature! We've also added a tones-based audio cue option and more pacer color themes. 🎉
comments: This is a really fantastic breathing app. It is intuitive to use, has a range of common preprogrammed exercise but it is also extremely easy to create and customise your own. An added bonus is the lack of intrusive ads. If there is a better free breathing app I would be really surprised.

Wow! Truly an awesome app. I can customize inhale, hold, exhale, hold to 10th of sec. App calculates breaths per minute. I can set total time for a session. Audio cues mean I can breathe with my eyes closed. All of these can be saved to my own custom sessions. The added bonus is the ability to set notifications during the day to remind myself it's time to do a session. Great app!

It's rare that I will give something a positive rating after a mere two days but I am experiencing here with this program is amazing! I have done breathing exercises on my own and under guidance with varying degrees of positive results but this app is (even compared to a teacher's instruction) head and shoulders above everything else! Simple UI, voice and visual guidance, great programs that you can easily dedicate daily practice to...it's just great!

This is a great app for it lets you customized your own breathing program of inhales and exhales in decimal second increments. It also has a timer for how many minutes you want to do the breathing. I really wish they had a better choice for the beginning and end sound beside that loud gong noise for it is distracting after being relaxed from the meditative breathing. That is why the 4 rating.

An excellent app. Specifically because the custom timer allows for tenth of a second adjustments which allows me to set 5.5 second breaths for optimum resonant breathing sessions. I would give 5 stars were I able to set my own colours on the visualiser and change the jarring bell sound to something more muted and soft. This is an app I will use every day.

title: MoodLinks - Anxiety & Depression
description:
MoodLinks is suitable for people experiencing sadness, worry, depression, anxiety and other mood struggles.

Built on research. Made with love and compassion.

MoodLinks incorporates aspects of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and Dialectical Behavioral Therapy to boost your treatment and help you reach your goals.

Use for self-help or link with your treatment team’s MoodLinks app.

Easy to use: Launch the app and get started in seconds
Secure and reliable: All industry-standard security practices are met

What can MoodLinks help you do?

Link with your care team: 
- Easily share your progress
- Collaborate on identifying useful coping skills, celebrate in the little victories together
- Create an extra layer of support in between sessions
- Receive motivational messages and images from your team

Check-in’s: 
- Morning and evening check-ins help keep you aware of your motivation, progress and strengths of the day.
- Other check-in’s to guide you through reflecting anxiety episodes, feelings and thoughts.
-A check-in often takes less than 1 minute.


Self-Care Checklist:
- Get ideas for self-care activities
- Keep track of ways that you took care of yourself throughout the day
- A great way to remind yourself of your accomplishments
- Medication tracker that can send you reminders

Coping Skills & Goals:
- Included library of science-backed goals and skills to help you make progress
- Based on the process of change, with reminders in the app to work on your goals
- Share with your treatment team in the moment when you’ve achieved a goal

comments: Lots of options. Good layout.
If not taking medicine, this is good way to cope. Not to replace meds though. It helps

I deleted my previous review in which I gave this app only 1 star. I realized that my review was quite harsh and I also realized that I meant to write that review for a totally different application. Therefore, I downloaded this app again and saw how very wrong I was. I apologize to everyone who was involved in the process of making this app and I hope that you can forgive my error. I forget which app it was that I thought I was writing the review for, but I will not make that mistake again.
Very useful to use alone without feeling lonely. It is all on you as a person to get what you want/need out of app. Stay strong people!!
Helps so much. Gets you to think about problems. Checks in. It works wonders

title: Online therapy - mental help. Support groups.
description:
If you need a psychologist, psychiatrist or therapist, then this is the app for you! Here you can anonymously ask any question that is bothering you and get valuable advice.  Our anonymous psychological help chat app attracts many active users. There are depression chats, therapy chats and lonely chats, where you can meet new people and new friends, experienced counsellors will give you useful advice. This is the perfect place if you need help in your depression and anxiety. There are groups of people with the same type of depression discussing and sharing similar problems and they will never judge you, only support.

It can help you to shed new light on your problem. 

Show that you care! Share your experience. Advise and talk with other users. Sometimes for many people our psychological online therapy is the only way out of a difficult situation.To get rid of anxiety, phobias, depression, sadness, stress, anger, apathy, worries, decay and hopelessness, jealousy, problems in relationships, problems during a divorce. 

Our app allows you to find conversation partners that take an active interest in your well-being. Ask questions and get answers of caring people. Talk about anything in the world that concerns you and be sure that you remain anonymous. Psychiatry is intimate and we respect it.

Human psychology is very complex and multifaceted, and it is one of the most fascinating and interesting things that we can explore.
In this anti stress and anti anxiety chats you can find:

- emotional support
- help to free you anxiety
- new people and friends
- psychologist or psychotherapist support
- getting rid of social phobia

Or you can just open a chat alone with a cup of tea on the couch and, who knows, maybe someone from the other end of the planet is waiting for your help or is ready to help.

comments: Update: I'm removing the initial complaint since the developer claims nothing malicious was happening on their end. I'll take their word for it. However, I still stick by the privacy issue which actually caused my initial suspicion in the first place.

MY personal experience has been okay on this app. Mostly everyone was amazing at giving me advice and I was able to help them as well. Made a few friends♡ I took off 2 stars bc of the gore images. Haven't seen any, but I don't wanna worry about it. Is this problem getting fixed?

I'll rate it 5 stars because there are actually peoples cheering me up, but there's one problem... There are bots telling you to "kill yourself", and some sends gore images which is disturbing. Though I'll let it slide, this is such a nice app, hopefully those bots get banned

If I could give this app half a star or no stars at all, I would. The creators of this app say it's for Mental Health therapy ? 😂😂 They make me laugh. The users on this app are very verbally abusive and darogitory towards other users. During my time on this app I have been told to quote "pull the trigger and blow my brains out", I have been told to quote "go hang myself". And many other abusive statements. I have had people send me very graphic violent pictures. Police are involved
A very good app for me. The doctors here are very kind and professional. I asked and they helped me a lot.

title: MDLIVE: Talk to a Doctor 24/7
description:
Have an MDLIVE virtual doctor visit with board-certified physicians from the comfort and convenience of your own home or from wherever you are, whenever you want – nights, after hours, weekends and holidays.

MDLIVE also offers behavioral health appointments with licensed therapists and board-certified psychiatrists as well as dermatology services.

You can schedule an appointment at a time and day that's convenient for you or have an on-demand visit in around 15 minutes.

All MDLIVE doctors are board-certified and state-licensed, with an average of 15+ years of experience. MDLIVE has two National Committee for Quality Assurance certifications and is accredited by the American Telemedicine Association. MDLIVE doctors are also friendly, caring, compassionate, and experts in conducting virtual medical consultations. And best of all, 9 out of 10 people would recommend us to their friends and family members in need of a doctor visit.

Great reasons to use MDLIVE virtual doctors:
1.	You’re not feeling up to leaving home
2.	You want to avoid the high cost of Urgent Care or the ER
3.	Your doctor isn’t available
4.	It's after hours, the weekend or a holiday
5.	You need a short-term refill on a prescription
6.	It’s hard to get to the doctor’s office
7.	You don’t want to take time off work or be away from home
 

MDLIVE doctors treat over 50 non-emergency medical conditions like these:
• Allergies
• Bronchitis
• Colds & Flu
• Ear Pain
• Fever
• Migraines
• Pink Eye
• Rash 
• Sinus Infections
• Sore Throat
• Urinary Tract Infections (Female, 18+)
• And more…

We also offer treatment and support for a wide variety of behavioral health issues:
• Addictions
• Anxiety
• Bipolar Disorder
• Couples Therapy
• Depression
• Eating Disorders
• LGBTQ Support
• Panic Disorders
• Postpartum Depression
• Relationships
• Social Anxiety
• Stress Management
• PTSD (Post-traumatic Stress Disorder)
• And more

We treat thousands of people a day with many different conditions, but you should not use MDLIVE if you are experiencing a medical emergency. In addition, we don't treat sexually transmitted diseases, urinary tract infections in males, or urinary tract infections in females under 18 years of age. Children under 3 with a fever and children under 12 with ear pain cannot be treated by MDLIVE.


Copyright © 2020 MDLIVE, Inc. All Rights Reserved. 

MDLIVE may not be available in certain states and is subject to state regulations.  MDLIVE does not replace the primary care physician, is not an insurance product, and may not be able to substitute for traditional in-person care in every case or for every condition. 
MDLIVE does not guarantee patients will receive a prescription, does not prescribe DEA controlled substances and may not prescribe non-therapeutic drugs and certain other drugs which may be harmful because of their potential for abuse. 
MDLIVE and the MDLIVE logo are registered trademarks of MDLIVE, Inc. and may not be used without written permission. For complete terms of use visit www.mdlive.com/terms-of-use

comments: A wonderful app. I have covid19 and no doctors in my area will see me but because of the MD Live I am able to get the care and meds to help me.

First time. Video quality was like typical for video chats - not sufficient for the Dr to diagnose anything visually, a photo is necessary. FYI, I was told that the wait would be 15 minutes or less and the video call came immediately as did a text message and a voice call telling me that I was in the queue - so that was a little annoying but I'm glad the service was very responsive!

1st time using an app like this, I was skeptical, I was also desperate. Instead of waiting for open enrollment for medical insurance, this app is a Blessing to say the least. It was fast! & My prescription was at my neighborhood pharmacy in less than an hour! Thank you to the M.D. that helped me! And thank God for this app! Highly recommend ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Freaking Awesome!!! No need to go into a doctor's office. Just video chat or phone call with an doctor, therapist or psychiatrist. The average wait time is minutes and you are in the comfort of your home, I was sitting at my desk at work. What a great app and company. Super excited !!!

I love MDLive for it's convenience but I do question why there isn't an option for reoccurring appointments or a way that I didn't have to fill out the appointment request information weekly for my therapy visits. It's rather annoying that every week I have to fill out the information rather than just confirming the repeat appointment my therapist has set up. If it wasn't for that I would give it 5 stars, and I have recommended this app to many friends of mine because I do find it to be amazing.

title: Mindfulness.com Meditation App
description:
More than just a meditation app, Mindfulness.com is your daily mindfulness coach for reducing stress, anxiety and improving your sleep. Every day, you’ll receive personalized video coaching, paired with a mini-meditation that can be completed in just 10 minutes. You will also enjoy 100s of deep dive talks, courses and guided meditations from some of the world's most trusted mindfulness teachers.

Join 300,000+ people who are learning mindfulness differently. The secret? Micro-learning + world’s best teachers + genuine behavioral change. In just 10 minutes a day, we'll support your whole life on our unique learning platform - focusing on managing stress and anxiety, loving yourself, improving relationships, performance, happiness, vitality and of course, sleeping well.

- PERSONALIZED VIDEO COACHING

Every day, you’ll receive inspiring daily video guidance and friendly encouragement from a world leading mindfulness teacher who will share practical tools, stories and teachings for living mindfully.

- DAILY GUIDED MEDITATIONS

Meditation sessions available in lengths of 5, 10, 15 or 20 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to weave through your day.

- TRANSFORMATIONAL LIBRARY

Explore 100s of talks, courses and guided meditations to manage stress and anxiety, improve sleep, happiness and relationships.

- THE WORLD’S BEST TEACHERS

Listen to talks, courses and guided meditations from our library of leading authors, wisdom teachers and scientists such as Jack Kornfield, Tara Brach, Jon Kabat-Zinn, Susan Piver, Ram Dass, Kristin Neff and Thich Nhat Hanh.

- SLEEP MEDITATIONS

Guided bedtime meditations.

- MEDITATION TIMER

Customize your meditation length and background sounds.

- JOIN US IN ENDING THE MENTAL HEALTH CRISIS

When you invest in your wellbeing through Mindfulness.com, you're also helping our mission to end the global mental health crisis. We've already donated over $750,000 to non-profit organisations, and it's only just the beginning!

YOUR MINDFUL MENTORS

We’ve handpicked the highest quality, and most authentic, mindfulness teachers from around the world to be your daily guides for living a healthier and happier life. These include leading authors, wisdom teachers, professional educators and science-based practitioners.

- Cory Muscara, MA - Former monk. Mindfulness Advisor to The Dr. Oz Show. Instructor at University of Pennsylvania
- Melli O’Brien - Speaker. Writer and Renowned Mindfulness Teacher. Co-founder of Mindfulness.com. Host of The Mindfulness Summit, the world's largest mindfulness conference.

- Coming soon!
    - Rhonda Magee, JD - Author. Professor of Law, University of San Francisco
    - Shamash Alidina, MA - Teacher. Author of Mindfulness for Dummies
    - Kelly Boys - Author. Mindfulness Trainer for the United Nations
    - Vidyamala Burch - Author. Pain & illness Specialist. Founder of Breathworks
    - Mark Coleman - Mindfulness Teacher. Wilderness guide and author.

TALKS, COURSES + MEDITATIONS FROM:

- Jon Kabat-Zinn, PhD - Professor of Medicine. Bestselling author. Founder of MBSR.
- Tara Brach, PhD - Mindfulness Teacher. Psychologist and bestselling author.
- Sharon Salzberg - New York Times bestselling author.
- Thich Nhat Hanh - Zen Master. Author 60+ books and Nobel Prize Nominee.
- Jack Kornfield, PhD - Mindfulness Teacher. Bestselling Author 12+ books.
- Dan Siegel, MD - Bestselling author. Director UCLA Mindful Research Center.
- Judson Brewer, MD - Psychiatrist. Director of Research, Center for Mindfulness.
- Ram Dass, PhD - Former Harvard Psychologist. Author of bestselling Be Here Now.
- Robert Thurman, PhD - Professor Columbia University. Renowned Buddhist Scholar.
- Elisha Goldstein, PhD - Author. Founder, Center for Mindful Living LA.
- Susan Piver - New York Times bestselling author. Renowned Mindfulness Teacher.
- Mark Williams, Phd - Professor. Director of Oxford University’s Mindfulness Center.

JOIN 300,000+ PEOPLE TRANSFORMING THEIR LIVES!

comments: I listened yesterday and meant to press the first three stars, but it was gone after the first press, mistake. My problem, I now believe is deep seated and goes back to a childhood frightening experience, and have difficulty at times with the deep breathing always helping me to get into a positive mindset. I loved your first 7 day sessions, I will continue to follow and hope it gets me out of this hole. I am also seeking Reiki assistance.
I love this app.its simple. Right now I have to use the free part. But when money start to flow I am going to start paying. This app is really good. It is very simple. And I love that.

Just started my 2nd day. The immediate difference I feel following a meditation session is an exquisite contentness. Without the use of this app I would never complete a meditation session. They know what they're doing. This weekend I have been calm. Normally, I spend my entire weekend dreading the week ahead. Fantastic start. Let's hope it continues!

The experience is great so far. I have just completed a 20 min meditation on welcoming experiences. I found it tremendously useful as I was in a lot pain when I started and resisting doing any meditation. I am very glad I completed today's session. I feel better able to enjoy this day.

Absolutely astounding meditation app. Just hearing Melli's voice telling me to breathe gave me the feeling of relief, the weight being lifted from my shoulders. That really put my mind at ease. Thank you.

- Best anxiety and stress relief help app to help you alleviate stress, panic attacks, depression, fears, and insomnia
- Step-by-Step training courses to help you master amazing techniques for relaxation and controlling panic attacks & worry.

title: Aurum - best therapy app, stress, anxiety.
description:
Welcome to Aurum, the platform which provides the best professional mental and emotional wellness ecosystem. Now manage your stress, anxiety, worry through our very popular programs. Get affordable therapy and access to expert psychologists through our app. Our users love us because we make it so easy and convenient to get access to quality care and help. All our professionals are based out of India and are vetted qualified experts. Go on and be the best version of yourself. Right away. 

Programs -
These are specially designed self-educating modules based on proven techniques like Cognitive Behavior Therapy(CBT), Mindfulness, Meditation and others which will help you learn the skills to cope with your issues. Be it stress, anxiety or relationships, you can learn at your own speed and master the skills required to face these problems. The best part is you will always have your coach - who is a certified psychologist, available on chat. Your coach will guide you throughout and help you achieve emotional and mental stability.

Therapy -
There are various incidents or situations in life where we can't seem to find our way out. The mental and emotional pressure becomes too much to handle. If you feel like you are going through a tough period of grief, sadness, anger, stress, anxiety, depression, worry etc connect with one of our qualified therapists at a fraction of the cost of traditional therapy. title: Relaxation Techniques
description:
Relaxation techniques are strategies used to reduce stress and anxiety. These techniques can also be used to manage symptoms of panic disorder and help a person get through a panic attack. Relaxation techniques work to manage the fight-or-flight response, or stress reaction, that is frequently triggered among people with anxiety disorders.

The fight-or-flight reaction is responsible for causing feelings of extreme fear that typically outweigh any actual threat in the environment. For instance, people with ?agoraphobia often fear crowded areas or open spaces, where it would be difficult or embarrassing to escape during a panic attack. The fight-or-flight response often causes uncomfortable physical symptoms, such as accelerated heart rate, rapid breathing, and increased sweating. Relaxation techniques have been found to have the opposite effect on the body by improving the relaxation response, lowering heart rate, reducing bodily tensions, decreasing negative thoughts, and boosting self-esteem and problem-solving skills.

For some people, learning to control their anxiety is all they can hope for if they can't overcome it completely. To help with this, there are various relaxation techniques you can use to calm the mind and reduce the muscle tension anxiety can cause.

If you've any medical conditions such as problems with your breathing speak to your GP before trying any relaxation exercises.

You should try to set aside 30 minutes, 2 or 3 times each day to practice these techniques. The more you practice, the better you will get and the more effective they will be.

It's important to keep using these techniques, even if you don't feel better straight away. It will take time and regular practice before you start to feel the benefits.

Before you start relaxing, make sure your mind, body and surroundings are just right. To prepare yourself:

-find a cool and quiet room where you'll not be disturbed
-lie down or sit comfortably with your legs uncrossed
-put on comfortable clothes and take off your shoes
-lightly close your eyes, or focus on a spot in front of you
-clear your thoughts and focus on your breath

Don't worry if you can't relax immediately. Thoughts might pop into your mind. Don't focus on them just let them pass through.

Make a note of how relaxed you were before, and after, the exercises to see if it's helped.

Breathing to relax
Breathing too quickly, and deeply, can make you feel dizzy, faint or even more anxious. Taking slow, regular breaths can help you to control anxious thoughts and feelings, and make you feel calmer.

To control your breathing:

-place one hand on your chest and the other over your stomach. You want your stomach to move more than your chest as you breathe
-take a slow, regular breath in (through your nose if you can). Watch your hands as you breathe in. The hand on your stomach should move and your chest should not
-breathe out slowly through pursed lips
-repeat this 10 times, twice a day

It might take time to master this technique. Once you have, you won't need to watch your hands or put them on your stomach.

title: Joyster: Mental Health Journal and Life Tracker
description:
** YOUR MENTAL HEALTH TRACKER **

Mindfulness, wellness and understanding your story matter. Joyster is a smart mental health tracker and journal that allows you to track your symptoms (mental and physical) against food, exercise, activities, and social interactions happening in your life.

Joyster is a mental health & mood journal designed to feel delightful, inspirational, and beautiful. Monitor your mental health by reflecting, gaining perspective, and understanding yourself. Live a healthy lifestyle by tracking your conditions with daily notes and check-ins.

Joyster is for anyone, but especially those who struggle with anxiety, allergies, migraines, panic attacks, depression, PTSD, OCD, and bipolar disorder.

** HOW JOYSTER WORKS **

Track your happiness, stress and physical and mental symptoms against activities, exercise, food, and more. Social anxiety, for example, can be tracked to show how your anxiety is being affected by different social interactions.

Take daily notes to gain awareness on how your body and mind overlap and identify trends and triggers in your well-being. Track symptoms and see how they relate to your daily activities, such as if you are bipolar and would like to track your mania symptoms against your day to day life.

The daily tracker analyzes your data and provide positive and negative influences, such as activities, foods, exercise, and social interactions to improve your well-being. Anxiety, panic attacks and triggers can all have causes that correlate with certain aspects of your day – Joyster can help you identify them.

Joyster uses reflection, mindfulness, cognitive behavioral therapy, and data to help you understand yourself and build a habit of reflection & self-care. Develop healthy habits to help improve your mental and physical health.


** HOW JOYSTER IS DIFFERENT **

Symptom tracker designed for efficiency. Monitor yourself with check-ins throughout your day, while still keeping it relevant and personalized to you.

Track health personalized to your needs. Track meals, insomnia, your daily caffeine intake or anything else that can affect your mood, even how you feel each time you interact with a specific co-worker! Joyster is flexible and personalized to you.

Visual health tracker graphs your entire well-being for you. See how your symptoms and activities overlap and gain an in-depth analysis of best to worse influences in your life.

JOYSTER FEATURES

SYMPTOM TRACKER
- Track your mood and conditions throughout the day
- Journal and identify what outside influences impact your mood
- Track migraines, allergies, pain and more
- Track anxiety, depression and more

DAILY MOOD JOURNAL
- Daily mental health check-ins to see how you’re doing
- Add a note to mark anything important
- Log your conditions in 30 seconds

TRACK YOUR HAPPINESS
- Understand what influences your mood and conditions
- Customize based on your life and needs
- Identify patterns and triggers
- Create healthy habits

TRACK HEALTH AND CONDITIONS
- Body tracker
- Migraine and headache
- Allergies
- OCD
- PTSD
- Anxiety
- BPD
- Pain
- Stress
- Sleep tracker
- Depression
- Social anxiety
- And more

SELF-CARE AND TREATMENT
- Journal your journey with the built-in diary to look back on your day
- Activity tracker to follow your daily activities and their impact
- Self-care tracker lets you see how you’re taking care of yourself
- Self-care suggestions and insights for self-improvement
- Build a healthy lifestyle through awareness and self-care

Get a healthy lifestyle and better understand yourself, your mental health and your conditions with Joyster.

** SAY HI TO US **

We'd love to connect with you! Please don't hesitate to reach out to us on social if you have any feedback or questions:

• Facebook - https://facebook.com/joysterapp
• Instagram - @joyster.app

title: Psych Meds
description:
Want to learn about psychotropic medications quickly and easily? Then check out this free app!

With Psych Meds, you can learn important and useful information about various psychotropic medications such as antidepressants, antipsychotics, mood stabilizers, and anti-anxiety medications. 

Some major classes of psych drugs include: SSRIs, typical and atypical antipsychotics, benzodiazepines, stimulants and hypnotics. Covered are essentially all meds for insomnia, anxiety, depression, ADHD, alcohol dependence, opioid dependence and nicotine addiction, etc…

For each medication, you will find:
Generic name
Brand name
Class
Estimated Cost
Indications
Sample Photo
Dosage forms
Maximum daily dose for adults
Maximum daily dose for adolescents and children
Half-life
Side effects
Mechanism of Action (MOA)

This useful app is ideal for medical and mental health professionals, psychiatrist, psychiatric residents, medical students, psychology students, therapists, counselors, and of course curious lay people who just want to familiarize themselves with psychotropic medications. Perfect for psychology test and flashcards log, you can learn about drug interaction or interactions, meds apps, mental health, diseases and disability. Also as a nursing central handbook or pocket book for pill identifier and identification or medication guide.

Scroll alphabetically through the list and quickly jump to a letter with an A-Z side panel.
Find a medication quickly with convenient search bar function.
Tap on the medication to learn about it.

** NOTE: This is a beta version and is still under construction. Information is subject to change and always cross-reference with other sources **
If you want more detailed information, you can check out other medical apps like epocrates rx, webmd mobile cme, and medscape for symptom checker, and baby health prescription!

title: Bubble Witch 2 Saga
description:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Bubble Witch Saga & Farm Heroes Saga comes Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their land. Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this exciting bubble shooting puzzle adventure. Win levels and free Witch Country piece by piece. Play this epic saga alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Bubble Witch 2 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Bubble Witch 2 Saga features:
• The next exciting instalment to the Bubble Witch franchise 
• New and improved game modes
• Enchanting graphics that will leave you spellbound
• Hundreds of magical bubble shooting levels – more added every 2 weeks!
• Easily sync the game between devices when connected  to the Internet
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
• Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest 
• Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels
• Free & easy to play, challenging to master!

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates;
facebook.com/BubbleWitchSaga2
Twitter @BubbleWitchSaga
https://www.youtube.com/user/BubbleWitchOfficial
http://bubblewitch2saga.com/

Have fun playing Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy.  If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

comments: I did an update last night causing me to lose lives I had stored up, gold bars and even though I beat level 734 over 6 times it will not let me move past. On the Bingo like game it will not give me credit when I clear a space. Unloaded and reloaded no help. Had this game for a long time and this is the first time i had this big problem.

I've been playing ALL the Bubble Witches for years now and I COMPLETELY fell in love with all of them! 🥰 I have a panic disorder and these games help so much to soothe my anxieties and let me focus on the fun! I absolutely LOVE the sounds and watching all the super colorful bubbles fall into the cauldrons💞 EXCELLENT JOB, KING'S BUBBLE WITCHES! YOU ARE ABSOLUTELY MAGICAL 💫🔮

I love this game yet, level 136 can't be passed! The game doesn't give enouh bubbles and with no boosters, it's not passable! Three days trying to advance, is just irritating! I am fixing to uninstall if I don't pass it after today. Ridiculous!

I love bubble witch saga games. However I've wrote twice now about being screwed out of extra bubbles I've purchased and I'm unable to send or receive extra lives from anyone. None of my friends even show up to send lives to and I know a bunch of my friends who play. Fix these issues and give me back the gold I was cheated and ill change my rating.

I love this game but got to level 812 and can no longer pass this level I do not understand what happened either nor where to go to find out why I can not move forward in this game..worked hard to get this high so do not want to start over.but had a blast getting to this level

title: Disorder
description:
Welcome to Disorder.
The year is 2030, and war has become the new global norm. In an ongoing conflict for nuclear weapons and the spoils of war, multiple factions meet each other on the battlefield. In this endless war, justice and sin are intertwined and no one escapes the undercurrent of violence. As an elite soldier, the time has come for you to take up arms and fight alongside your teammates!

Five limited-time activities have been organized to celebrate the official launch of the game. A large range of rich rewards, such as characters, outfits and supplies, have been added. Wish you an unprecedented team shooter experience!

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE
All-new near-future locations, such as Ruins, Radar Stations, and Missile Silos have been built for war themed battles. As a soldier in this world, you can pledge your loyalty to three very different factions: Pale Knights, Ghost Puppets, and Cadaver Unit, with more to be revealed. Each member of the armed factions has his/her own exhaustive backstory for you to uncover. Good or evil, the choice is up to you!

UNIQUE CHARACTERS
Scout, maneuver, defense, support...characters are classed into different roles, allowing for great freedom and diversity in team setup. They are not only differentiating between personality, appearance and back story, but even unique skillsets and weapon loadouts types too. It’s up to you to control the tempo of a battle where the odds might be reversed at any time.

UPGRADE IN BATTLE 
Gain EXP and credits from mercenary or player killing. With diversified choices, you can upgrade both the weapon and ability to adapt to the ever-changing battlefield. Strengthen yourself from the landing point until you are ready to try and take control of the Missile Silo.

MULTI-MODE AVAILABLE
ULF, Base Battle, Multi-Base Battle are 3 core game modes, with more to come. For the ULF map, you need to work with your teammates and establish a plan of action to occupy and secure the area’s missile silo. On the way to victory, every decision and bullet matters. While in Base Battle and Multi-base Battle, close combat happens and situations can be changed by second.

SEASON 0 KICKS OFF
Season 0 is coming! Introducing a brand-new Season Ranking System and generous Season Pass rewards. Get ready to show your strength as you battle other players for the win!

SQUAD UP AND RULE THE FIELD
Team up with teammates to compete against enemy groups. Go directly to the missile silo or level up safely to take down bases one by one? It is all up to strategical cooperation with your teammates! Think on your feet, find alternative attack strategies and adapt your lineup is with the same importance to grab victory.

Follow us on
Official Website: www.playdisorder.com
Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/playdisorder
Discord: https://discord.gg/disorder
Twitter: twitter.com/disorderen
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/c/Disordergame

Gain EXP and credits from mercenary or player killing. With diversified choices, you can upgrade both the weapon and ability to adapt to the ever-changing battlefield. Strengthen yourself from the landing point until you are ready to try and take control of the Missile Silo.

MULTI-MODE AVAILABLE
ULF, Base Battle, Multi-Base Battle are 3 core game modes, with more to come. For the ULF map, you need to work with your teammates and establish a plan of action to occupy and secure the area’s missile silo. On the way to victory, every decision and bullet matters. While in Base Battle and Multi-base Battle, close combat happens and situations can be changed by second.

SEASON 0 KICKS OFF
Season 0 is coming! Introducing a brand-new Season Ranking System and generous Season Pass rewards. Get ready to show your strength as you battle other players for the win!

SQUAD UP AND RULE THE FIELD
Team up with teammates to compete against enemy groups. Go directly to the missile silo or level up safely to take down bases one by one? It is all up to strategical cooperation with your teammates! Think on your feet, find alternative attack strategies and adapt your lineup is with the same importance to grab victory.

Follow us on
Official Website: www.playdisorder.com
Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/playdisorder
Discord: https://discord.gg/disorder
Twitter: twitter.com/disorderen
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/c/Disordergame
summary: An epic shooter experience you can't miss. Join now for amazing in-game rewards!

I would say its too late for that since many have now decided to uninstall this game, since your last announcement. Promises of future content isn't what makes a great game. The lack of providing a fresh new gaming experience to the players is what brings a game crashing down. I too have decided to uninstall Disorder since your last announcement.

The reason why I put 4 stars is because when I first downloaded the game, I thought it was impossible to win but all you need is strategy. Another reason is because when ever I am matching, it would take a lot of time to let me in a group. Other than that, the graphics and the gameplay is the one of the BEST. I highly recommend this game. Like LEGIT.

This game has been in Season 0 for months now since it's launch, there has been no updates and no changes what so ever, you guys really gotta focus on updating your games more cuz it gets really boring when theres nothing new, I've enjoyed the game when it was just launched but now since there's nothing new it just got really boring.

This is a cool game, indeed. But a while ago, my friend got trashtalked for a stupid reason. Her teammates camped in opponents base while my friend just played the game normally than they did. And also she's lagging even though her connections fine!!! That's why she deleted the game. I don't think she'll play this anymore. Full of foul players!

The game mechanics are great the characters and skills aswell but thiers 2 things I dont like about the game 1. is that the servers right now aren't that good u can be waiting for a match to start 5mins or more that is if ur lucky, I've been playing solo this whole time for that reason. 2. When I first download this game I thought oh this is going to be a Battle royale since I'm into last man standing but it's more like capture the flag and pretty much ur efforts are worthless so for now bye👋

title: Anxiety Reliever: Mental Health Support
description:
Track your mental health, release anxiety and stress and fall asleep faster with the help of Anxiety Reliever. Listen to a variety of soothing, calming and supportive audio courses that will help you to feel better faster. The app has been featured in the media worldwide. 

Anxiety Reliever consists of a Collection of Calming Audio Recordings, Binaural Sounds, Helpful Guides, Insightful Anxiety Tracker and Supportive Messages.


SESSIONS:
Calming audio sessions will help you to overcome anxiety, relax and fall asleep faster. Listen to these recordings whenever you’re feeling anxious, stressed, depressed, worried, upset, tense, or need support and encouragement. 

Each session will guide you through stress and anxiety to feeling better and calmer. 


TIPS:
In the Tips section, you will find step-by-step guides covering many topics such as how to overcome anxiety, release painful emotions, how to deal with negative thoughts and so many others. So it’s truly a great tool to fall back on for guidance if you are feeling anxious, sad, stressed, or negative and don’t quite know how to deal with it. 


TRACKER:
A very important part of overcoming anxiety is identifying your triggers, tracking your habitual thoughts and noticing progress. It’s a wonderful daily tool if you’re struggling with anxiety to identify and evaluate your thinking patterns.

With this data, you can make a more thoughtful analysis of your mental states and stress levels. 


MESSAGES 
Receive positive and uplifting messages from the AR Team to support you during the hard and challenging times. We believe that kind and loving words have the power to change a person's day! 


PRICING:
Anxiety Reliever is free to download, however, to keep improving and maintaining the app we had to implement an upgrade option for users. 

There are two upgrade options to unlock all the content: 

A Yearly Subscription: $48.99 ($4.08/month) 
A Monthly Subscription: 8.99/month

If you decide to upgrade, you will get unlimited access to sessions, tips, tracker and messages.


These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on your country of residence. Payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. 

Your annual or monthly subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term, and your credit card will be charged through your Google Play Account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by going to your Google Play account. However, refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the time. 


TERMS OF SERVICE : https://www.anxietyrelieverapp.com/terms
PRIVACY POLICY: https://www.anxietyrelieverapp.com/privacy
Need help with the app? Please email us at help@anxietyrelieverapp.com we will be glad to help you.

Thank you for using Anxiety Reliever :)

title: Biofeedback Meditation : Deep Relaxation Breathing
description:
Guided meditation with instant feedback! As you deviate from your meditation, the app detects your breathing pattern and the waves will gently notify you. Earn "Karma Points" by breathing rhythmically.  No more meditation sessions where you wander off.


The best way to use the app is to use the phone while performing  shavasana (corpse pose in yoga/ sleeping meditation / yoga nidra).  If you wish to receive feedback while sitting, you could slide the phone halfway into your pants, so that the phone moves when you breathe. The elastic on the pant's belt line should hold the phone in place.

Set a target breathing rate that is comfortable and meditate on your breath.
Lie down on your back, place the phone on your abdomen and try to breathe at the target rate.
The waves will calm down as you start breathing at your target rate.

This app can also be used as a standalone app without biofeedback, for paced breathing, mindfulness training or sleep music


• Only app to provide instant feedback on your meditation
• Interactive meditation may help with relaxation and going to sleep
• May calm down anxious thoughts and manage stress
• Mindfulness may help with depression and panic attacks
• No expensive equipment to provide biofeedback, an affordable alternative to buying sensors.
• Helps with paced breathing, belly breathing, diaphragmatic breathing, deep breathing, box breathing, guided pranayama and other breathing exercises.
• Diaphragmatic breathing is an easy way to relax and release your worries.
• Diaphragmatic breathing is suggested as a remedy for Asthma and COPD
• Waves, rain and flute sounds as background music
• Breath in,Breath out  vipassana style breathing prompts
• Other breathing prompts include a metronome sound and om chants.
• The app comes with a Meditation timer
• If you have trouble falling asleep for a power nap, this may be the app for you.
• Biofeedback games for your meditation practice
• Turn biofeedback into a meditation game
• Free

Read more about efficacy of biofeedback at https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2939454/ 
Content licenses at https://biofeedbackmeditation.wordpress.com/attribution
Learn more about https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diaphragmatic_breathing

comments: A good app for focusing on breathing simple and effective. Helps in maintaining a steady pace as pre defined by the user. The free sounds provided as background sounds are very relaxing and go well with the breathing instructions.
A cool app. Simple to understand and use with clear instructions. I used it and felt relaxed in a few minutes.
Nice idea but too fast to relax. I'd like 5 breath cycles per minute which would feel more coherent. Unfortunately the app starts at 6 breaths per minute

The app wouldn't open. all I got was the page telling you about it and the link to read the terms. When you go to the link it sends you back to Google play to download the app. but it is already downloaded.

It works really well for me. I am able to get into a focused and conscious state while my body gets into a relaxed state. I only wish we had a way to record karma points. For the price I paid in my local currency it is worth the money!

description:
This program provides Psychiatrists and Mental health professionals an easy way to Diagnose and treat Anxiety with Pharmacology. The program offers a Numerical score based treatment for GAD, PD, OCD, SAD and PTSD.

Differential Diagnosis
Anxiety Score
OCD Score

Treatment: Generalized Anxiety Disorder, Panic Disorder, Obsessive Compulsive Disorder, Social Anxiety Disorder, Posttraumatic Stress Disorder and Substance abuse

title: Mood Tracker, Journal, Diary | Anti Depression app
description:
Reflexio is a fabulous mood tracker, self care journal app with daily questions. Every day you will receive a new interesting question about your health, relations with people, self care or emotion, selfcare, wellness or depression and select your mood. 

Open your mind with Reflexio mood tracker and emotion journal and see how your mood changes through months and years! Are you looking for ways to improve your mood and wellness? Reflexio is a fabulous app that supports you in phases of anxiety and depression.

Our fabulous features:
 
🌟Mood tracker. Use this feature to explore the patterns in your mood. 
- Select your mood on the mood tracker screen. You can choose between Happy mood, Good, Neutral, Bad or Awful mood (depression) to define how you feel
- Track how your mood changes through the months and years. We recommend checking statistics of your mood daily
- Self-help for anxiety & depression (self care diary)

🌟Private diary (journal) with a fingerprint. Note how was your day.
- Make notes in your private diary with fingerprint every day
- Note in the diary about your mental health, relationships, current mood, or feelings. Reflect on wellbeing, mood, self-improvement or self care. Mark activities, personal goals or habits
- Love and relationship: reflect on your romantic relationship and problems with your couple. It can help you understand how to fix them and what steps you should do to prevent problems in your relationship.

🌟Question diary. One question a day that makes you think
- Every day you will receive a new question that will make you reflect on the most important topics of our life: friendship etc
- Share the questions with your friends through social networks!
 
🌟Word cloud. Track not only your mood, but also the most used words in the diary.
-  Get your personalized word cloud monthly, with those words that you use the most in your daily answers! The more complete your answers, the more information your word clouds will have in your journal

🌟Passcode or fingerprint 
Do not worry, all your diary notes are private. Set a password (PIN code or fingerprint) to protect your diary secrets. Change passcode whenever you want

🌟Beautiful themes to match your mood
Beautiful themes that match perfect your mood: Reflexio default, Night Sky, Pacific Forest, and Choco Autumn.

🌟Reminders
Set reminders to make sure important things don't slip away from the diary

Join us and create a happier mind. Reflexio is more just a journal or mood diary. Reflexio benefits: focus and concentration, happiness, healthier mind & motivation! 

Important: If you have noted that during a long period of time you have a bad mood or some kind of anxiety we recommend you to visit a doctor. It’s important to ask your doctor whether they think you have depression, anxiety, or it was just a bad mood days caused by the temporary life difficulties which is nothing to do with depression.

Give some time to yourself for your well being. With Reflexio App you get focus and concentration, happiness, healthier mind and motivation.

Reasons to use the diary app:

maintain a journaling routine feelings
find answers on the main life things - relations with friends, people, colleagues
find a place to reflect on important things privately and track the achievements you've made in life
get out of stress or anxiety and take your life to a new level

In Reflexio we are always happy to know your opinion and proposals about the mood tracker or journal to improve our app. Do not hesitate to ask us and we will answer you as soon as possible!
Send us your questions and suggestions to reflexio.app@gmail.com 

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reflexio_app/

Greta app to write your thoughts daily. Keeps me writing and I love the asthetics.

title: SWF Panic
description:
The objective is to race through the Kingdom, survive the Boss’ forces, and save the Genie. The game is a side-scrolling platformer; the player moves from the left side of the screen to the right side in order to hit the “right arrow” brick at the end of each level.

The game world features gems scattered around for Opera to collect and special bricks marked with a “S”, which when hit from below by Opera may reveal more gems or a special item.  Other "secret", often invisible, bricks may contain more gems or rare items. If the player gains a heart, Opera will turn purple color. If Opera gets hit in purple color, then instead of dying she turns back to red Opera.

Players start with six lives and may gain additional lives by picking up 1-Up heart hidden in bricks, or by collecting 100 gems, defeating several enemies in a row with a monkey, or bouncing on enemies successively without touching the ground. Opera loses a life if she takes damage while red color, falls in a bottomless pit, or runs out of time. The game ends when the player runs out of lives.

Opera’s primary attack is jumping on top of enemies, though many enemies have differing responses to this. Some enemies will flatten and be defeated, while others will temporarily faint, allowing Opera to use it as a projectile. These enemies may be deflected off a wall to destroy other enemies, though they can also bounce back against Opera, which will hurt or kill her. Other enemies, such as underwater foes and enemies with spiked tops, cannot be jumped on and damage the player instead. Opera can also defeat enemies above her by jumping to hit the brick that the enemy is standing on. Opera may also acquire the “green heart with wings” from certain “S” blocks that allows her to throw fireballs. 

The game consists of eight worlds with four sub-levels called "stages" in each world. The final stage of each world takes place in a castle where Boss is fought above a suspension bridge; the first seven of these Bosses are "false Bosses" whom are actually minions disguised as him, whilst the real Boss is found in the 8th world. Boss and his decoys are defeated by jumping over them and reaching the button on the end of the bridge, although they can also be defeated using fireballs. The game also includes some stages taking place underwater, which contain different enemies. In addition, there are bonuses and secret areas in the game. Most secret areas contain more gems for Opera to collect, but some contain "warp pipes" that allow Opera to advance directly to later worlds in the game without completing the intervening stages. 

[Control]
D-Pad: LEFT and RIGHT will move Opera in the corresponding directions. DOWN will cause Opera to duck.
A Button: This Button will allow Opera to leap onto enemies, go over gaps, and to make your way past Boss.  Learning to control Opera exactly as she jumps will make your quest a success.  This is also how Opera takes a stroke underwater.
B Button: By holding this down, Opera will run.  If Opera has Fireballs Power, Opera will throw fireballs with every pressing of the B Button (max of two on the screen at a time).
START: Start/Pause the game.

Download now and enjoy !

title: 나도혹시? 공황장애 증상 및 자가진단-삼*병원 공식 공황장애 자가진단 테스트 (심리테스트)
description:
연예인병? 생각보다 흔한 공황장애!

삼*병원, 아*병원 공식 공황장애 자가진단 질문 적용!

당신도 예외 일 수 없습니다.

100% 무료 공황장애 자가진단 테스트 입니다.

[공황장애란?]
심한 공황발작(panic attack)을 주요 특징으로 하는 불안장애다. 공황발작은 예기치 않게 강렬하고 극심한 공포가 갑자기 밀려오는 것을 뜻한다.

일반적이지 않은 사건, 예를 들어 천재지변이나 사고, 전쟁 등이 일어난 때에 극심한 공포를 느끼는 것은 정상적인 뇌의 반응이다. 그리고 심한 스트레스 등을 받으면 공황발작이 자주 일어나므로 이런 이유라면 섣불리 정신과를 찾을 필요가 없다. 그러나 예기치 않게 아무런 유발요인 없이 느닷없이 발생하거나 일상생활에서의 사소한 유발상황 등 일상생활에 지장을 줄 정도로 심한 불안증상과 발작이 일어나는 것을 '공황발작'이라고 한다.

대부분의 공황장애 환자는 첫 공황발작 시, 심박이 매우 가쁘게 뛰고, 호흡이 곤란해지는데, 이는 공황발작에 동반되는 과호흡증후군의 한 증상이므로, 응급실을 찾기보다는 봉투호흡법을 실시하는 것이 효과적이다.

공황장애가 무서운 점은, 공황발작도 견디기 힘든데 거기서 오는 예기불안이 환자들을 미치게 만들기 때문이다. 이게 왜 무섭냐면 공황발작은 불특정 상황에서 예기치 않게 발병하는 경우가 흔한데, 운전 중에 발생하거나 특정 직업을 가지고 있는 사람 등에게 발병함으로써 나 자신과 타인이 위험해질 수 있는 경우가 생길 수 있기 때문이다. 이런 경우에 해당되면 일상생활에서나 직장생활에서 언제 또 발작이 올지 모르는 불안감을 떨쳐버릴 수가 없게 되고, 어떤 식으로든지 행동에 변화가 온다.

많은 사람들이 평상시 길을 걷다가, 직장이나 집에서 일을 하다가 공황발작이 갑작스럽게 발병하여 119로 실려오는데, 그 전까진 정말 죽을 것 같았는데 도착하면 언제 그랬냐는 듯이 멀쩡해진다. 공황장애로 진단받으면 "그래도 몸에 문제가 있는 건 아니구나"라는 생각과, 몸이 멀쩡하다는 것에 대해 정말 여러가지로 사람 환장하게 만드는 질병이다.



[요구권한 설명]
android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS을 필요로 합니다.
이 권하는 PUSH 메시지 발송을 위해서 구글 아이디 값을 확인 합니다.
본 앱에 일체의 정보는 저장 되지 않고, 구글 PUSH 서버에서 활용 합니다.


[구글에게]
당신들에게 이의제기를 통해서  다음과 같은 메일을 받았습니다.
===
확인 결과, 나도혹시? 공황장애 증상 및 자가진단-삼*병원 공식 공황장애 자가진단 테스트 (심리테스트) 앱 (패키지 이름: com.forest.panic)에 대한 사용자의 문의 및 불편 사항이 정상적으로 접수되지 않은 것으로 확인되었습니다.

귀하의 앱의 상품에 대한 지원 및 관리, 상품에 대한 불만사항을 처리할 책임이 있습니다. 유료 상품이나 인앱 거래의 경우 고객의 지원 문의에 대해 영업일 기준 3일 이내에 답변해야 하며 Google에서 긴급하다고 명시한 지원이나 상품 관련 우려사항의 경우 24시간 이내에 답변해야 합니다.

환불 정책이 명확하게 정의되어 있으며 사용자가 이용할 수 있는지 확인합니다. 사용자는 환불 및 취소에 관해 궁금한 점이 있는 경우 개발자에게 직접 문의하도록 안내받습니다.

개발자 배포 계약의 4.7항을 확인 하시기 바라며, 경고장이 발송된 달의 30일까지 이 문제를 해결하시기 바랍니다. 
 
=== 
회신을 할 곳이 없어서 이곳에 답변을 남깁니다.

1. 이 앱은 유료 앱이 아닌데. 왜 자꾸 환불정책 명확히 하라고 하는데 무료 앱에 왜 환불 정책이 필요 합니까?

2. 사용자 문의 및 불편사항이 정상적으로 접수가 되지 않다고 하는데 스토어 등록정보에 전호번호가 등록되어 있고, 이메일도 있는데 있는데 불만사항을 처리 안하고 있다고 계속 이야기 하는 이유가 무엇입니까? 
 


공황장애 극복 어플, 공황장애 자가진단, 공황장애 증상, 공황장애 테스트
----

010-2786-3930

title: Dealing with Depression
description:
Depression is an extreme low mood that lasts a long time and makes a person feel sad,
irritable or empty. Many people, including many teens, have suffered in this way. A
depressed person:
^ has much less energy to do activities
^ feels like nothing matters.
^ sees life in a negative way.
^ feels like it will never get better
But depressed people do get better and depression does end. There are effective
treatments and self-help skills to deal with depression. Health care professionals give
depression treatments, but you can learn self help skills and apply them to your own life. This guide teaches a set of antidepressant skills you can use to overcome depression. Sometimes the skills can be used on their own, when the depression
isn’t too severe. Sometimes they have to be used along with treatments by professionals.
Dealing with Depression is meant for those who have been coping with depressed mood. Some of the things in this guide will make more sense to younger teens and some will make more sense to older ones. But check it out for yourself. Decide which parts of this guide make sense for your life.
This Depression Test is designed to help you evaluate the severity of your depression with just nine simple questions. This app uses the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9), an empirically-based, self-test questionnaire. Clinical depression is a mood disorder in which feelings of sadness, loss, anger, or frustration interfere with everyday life for weeks or longer. Clinical depression generally responds positively to treatment, so it is important to seek treatment if you are concerned about your mental health.
 DISCLAIMER: This self-test is not meant to be a diagnosis for your depression. Remember that this app should not be used as a replacement for professional treatment or guidance.
Do you suffer from depression? Depression may stem from a personal tragedy or from sad unexpected events or circumstances. It does not discriminate its victims. Depression can affect anyone regardless of their background, race, age, income, etc.
The natural management of depression involves understanding depression and the factors that contribute to the symptoms. Learning to manage stress in your life and engage in self-care behaviors can improve your symptoms and your mood.
Depression is one of the most prevalent and treatable mental disorders. Diagnosis of depression is based on the presence of certain symptoms that significantly impair function for a certain duration. These symptoms are described in the DSM-IV, the diagnostic manual for mental disorders. 
This app is designed to help with Depression treatment and controlling stress by advising mood enhancing foods, teaching the importance of writing wellness journals and how to get adequate sleep during depressive episodes.
Dealing with Depression app is an app that helps you diagnose the level of depression you have, and based on that it gives you the suitable solution for your depression level, in some cases depression is only a result of anxiety and some passing problems, but if the person did not get out of that condition then his condition might advance, we will give you some ways to avoid the advancement of your situation, if the depression is severe we will guide you to what to do as soon as possible
Depression is common but many people don't admit to it. Some people feel there is a stigma attached, or that people will think they are weak. Great leaders such as Winston Churchill have had depression. Depression is one of the most common illnesses that GPs deal with. People with depression may be told by others to "pull their socks up" or "snap out of it". The truth is, they cannot and such comments by others are very unhelpful.
Depression (major depressive disorder) is a common and serious medical illness that negatively affects how you feel, the way you think and how you act. Fortunately, it is also treatable. Depression causes feelings of sadness and/or a loss of interest.

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: The writing is very, shall we say, "colloquial" l but the content is spot on and straight to the point. This app is practical, easy to read, useful and positive. A very cost-effective alternative to a life coach! I think this app will also appeal to teenagers who might be put off but a more "serious" format and style of writing. Available in all formats so accessible to all. Free with Kindle Audio trial I believe.

I found this app at the right time. Consider all going on during unprecedented times and consider reading this app. Great tips mentioned to help cope with my depression. I am fond of the idea that the author gave the reader the chance to interact. I feel like there are things I can take from this to help. Pleased with the app.

Dealing with Depression is an awesome app for anyone dealing with depression. The author provided a self care process that’s effective and easy to follow. So many forget that self care is a must. The self care activities provided ways to help you acknowledge and incorporate new routines in your daily routines.

I've battled depression all of my life. I've had more success with rising above depression with the solutions in this app than I have with medication and therapy combined. It makes so much sense, and the solutions are real life tools people can use and apply for quick, sustainable results. Reading this app has changed my life for the better.
A really good list of things and the right information to deal with situation. I have even recommended this app to a friend of mine who appreciated work done by the team. Good work.

title: Psychological Medicine
description:

title: Virtual Hope Box
description:
The Virtual Hope Box (VHB) is a smartphone application designed for use by patients and their behavioral health providers as an accessory to treatment.  The VHB contains simple tools to help patients with coping, relaxation, distraction, and positive thinking.  Patients and providers can work together to personalize the VHB content on the patient's own smartphone according to the patient's specific needs.  The patient can then use the VHB away from clinic, continuing to add or change content as needed.


Patients can use the VHB to store a variety of rich multimedia content that they find personally supportive in times of need.  For example, a patient can include family photos, videos and recorded messages from loved ones, inspirational quotes, music they find especially soothing, reminders of previous successes, positive life experiences and future aspirations, and affirmations of their worth in their VHB.  A patient can also collaborate with their provider to create coping cards to use in response to personal problem areas they experience.  Finally, the VHB provides the patient with positive activity planning, distraction tools, and interactive relaxation exercises including guided imagery, controlled breathing and muscle relaxation.

title: FeelJoy - Mental Well-Being for Anxiety
description:
Are anxiety, low self-esteem and depressive thoughts bothering you? Have plenty friends but no one to talk to? Feeljoy Buddy is here to support you! Here, you can interact with individuals who are available to talk to you in real time. Learn more about self-care and self-reflection in an ecosystem designed by Feeljoy for the very purpose of helping you cope with the stressors of daily life and promoting emotional wellbeing. Feeljoy Buddy is your new Mental Health companion.

Good at counselling others? Been told that you’re a good listener? Think you can help others by helping them vent out? Want to help promote the idea of Mental Wellness and Mental Wellbeing? Be a Buddy with us and support others' well-being by being an effective listener.

COMPANIONSHIP
•	Connect with *The Buddy*, your all-time support system.
•	Gain a good listener who is always ready to help.

INTROSPECT THE INNER YOU
•	Self reflection through others' experience.
•	Gain knowledge on your own psychology and therapy.

ANONYMITY
•	An app that guarantees anonymity.

TOP FEATURES
•	Customized
•	Anonymous
•	Connect to a Buddy (free service)
•	Self-Help area
•	User friendly
•	Quick screening assessments: to help you identify problems and get a personalized plan through a Coach

CHARGES
•	FREE

BOOST YOUR HAPPINESS WITH OUR EMOTIONAL WELL BEING APP
•	Learn how to effectively deal with you problems.
•	Learn how to let go of unhealthy coping mechanisms. 
•	If you ever feel exhausted and drained, you have a buddy to listen to all you have to say. 
•	A judgment free zone where you can openly discuss all your problems while staying anonymous. 

*PRODUCT DESCRIPTION*
Everyone faces problems like anxiety, depression, sadness in their daily life but we usually end up keeping it all to ourselves because of various reasons like fear of judgment, fear of rejection, not wanting to “burden” our friends with our problems and the list goes on. Stressors and problems are a part of life that tend to throw us off balance more than we realize. Given our super busy lives, we rarely pay attention to signs of deteriorating mental health, let alone put it to check. Talking it out and sharing your thoughts serves as a great remedy to all such problems. 

Feeljoy Buddy helps you cope with the above problems and gain self-esteem by assigning you a Buddy who’ll listen to all you have to say as well as supporting you. Receive help from individuals who are ready to help. After all to be healthy as a whole, mental wellness plays a very crucial role.

o Talk to your Buddy
o Magic, the friendly bot     
o Therapy with your Coach
