title: Serenity: Guided Meditation & Mindfulness
description:
Serenity: Guided Meditations allows you to learn a variety of meditation and mindfulness techniques that aims to bring a sense of peace, calm and happiness to your life.

Learn the basics with the free, easy to follow 7 day audio course. Gain the skills required to make mindful meditation a part of the rest of your life.

Foundations: Expand your skills and learn about mindfulness, self awareness, values and goals

Sleep guides: A selection of guided mediations designed to guide you to sleep using relaxation techniques, peaceful music and tranquil sounds

Stress relief: soothe anxiety with relaxation and mindfulness techniques to calm the mind and body

Quick meditations: short sessions to practice your skills or provide a sense of serenity and calm from the stresses of your day

Daily meditations - Different meditations each day to help maintain regular practice

Plus more being added to the app all the time

Other features:

No sign up/log in required - start meditating straight away

Ideal for beginners with over 2 hrs of free audio.

No subscriptions necessary -  extra content is available either through one time permanent purchases or unlock everything with a subscription

Easy to follow - serenity is ideal for beginners and more experienced mindful meditators alike

Silent mind - learn a technique to quieten the mind of thoughts

Meditation and mindfulness skills - Learn to separate thoughts from feelings to improve your emotional well being

Gratitude - Change your perspective on life by understanding gratitude and gain a new appreciation of the world around you

Plus

Set up daily reminders to stay on track

Stay motivated by completing challenges and unlocking more free sessions as you progress

Monitor your progress with stats and graphsSee if mindful meditation can improve your life - install now!

comments: I love the option of purchasing (not "borrowing") packs you want instead of a ridiculous subscription price. I will add more packs as I need, but it's a great feature for those of us who don't want to pay $250 a year for a garbage meditation app no one uses 99% of. I like the guide's voice and the daily progress, not just repeating trash over and over like most apps. If you've looked at the other meditation apps and laughed at how useless they are, this may be your app.

I have been using the app daily and it really has helped me to build a daily meditation routine. The instructions are clear, calm, positive. The process takes you step by step so you don't struggle while you build the foundations of your routine. You feel rested after the exercises. Day by day you start to feel changes in your mood, thoughts and energy.

This is a wonderful, helpful app. I appreciate the organization and accessibility of this app. The meditations are easy to follow, and the guide has a soothing voice. I'm new to meditating, and the instructions are clear and well-timed throughout the meditations. The dark mode option is perfect for doing meditations right before bed. Longer meditations would offer even more variety (hour long affirmations or guidance to self-compassion, etc). Thank you for continuously improving the app!

Very good app. I finally feel like I'm making progress and learning. I fall asleep relaxed and l'm calmer in heated situations. It's around 3.30e a month, so it's not a too bad, but I'm on week 2 and it feels a bit repetitive an you have to commit to 6 months. If I could pay monthly, I would be more inclined to go for it. You only get a week of free trial.

This is mu fourth meditation in Serenity (I tried other apps before) and it's so good. It has an amazing repertoire of guided meditations, with a very soothing voice, relaxing music and great techniques to improve gradually. I recommend it to some friends already. I hope it will continue being for free for quite long. Thanks Serenity!

title: Stress Free with  Andrew Johnson
description:
Sometimes it can seem that there’s nothing you can do about your stress levels. Constant bills, lack of time, too many commitments, busy at work, demanding families and so many more situations that can seem overwhelming.

This app allows you to realize that you have a lot more control than you may think. These simple and effective suggestions listened to daily will reduce your stress and allow you to see solutions to your problems.

Stress Free with Andrew Johnson will help you:

  • Learn to take charge of your thoughts and emotions.
  • Create a healthy, positive routine for work or studies.
  • Change the way you react to problems.
  • Maintain a balanced life that allows quality time for family, work, and fun.
  • Build the resilience to deal with pressure and meet challenges with a relaxed, positive, 
    stress-free mind and body.

Destress, improve your mindset, sleep better, grow your confidence and be healthier with guided meditations, mindfulness sessions and positive messages – and much more.

Mindfulness expert, coach and therapist Andrew Johnson has been helping people deal with life’s challenges with guided relaxations, meditations, self-care tools and breathing exercises for many years. 

His best-selling range of mindfulness apps have a variety of content to help you, whether you are looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety, lose weight, improve your health & confidence, learn relaxation techniques, etc.

Key features:

  • Short meditations you can do anywhere: at work, commuting, at home, walking.

  •Inspirational sessions to help you tackle life’s challenges, to be calm and find clarity.

  •Mindfulness stories and talks to help you build better, healthy habits.

  •Meditations to help you feel inspired and find motivated to eat well, workout and stay 
   healthy both in body and mind.

  •Relaxation techniques and tools to help you sleep better every night, to wake feeling 
   energised and refreshed.

  •Breathing exercises and calming meditations for anxiety, panic attacks and stress relief.

  •Meditation sessions to stop anxiety in its tracks and release stress.

How do I get more?

Start your day mindfully, keep feeling positive and be inspired throughout the day with a range of guided meditations to help during tough or stressful moments. Boost your energy with a Power Nap, stay focussed to Beat Procrastination, and then drift off using a Deep Sleep meditation for a restful night.

Think of Andrew as your personal mindfulness coach, always there to help when you need him most.

Search for Andrew Johnson to unlock more daily mindfulness and guided meditation sessions.

title: Anxiety Challenger
description:
Anxiety Challenger is a companion app to Dr. Reid Wilson’s anxiety management strategy, as described in his book, Stopping the Noise in Your Head.

You can use this app to make a game plan and use it to score points against anxiety and OCD.  Schedule Challenges where you will learn to respond to anxiety in a healthy way.  

This app will also help you to stay motivated through rewards, positive feedback, reminders, and tips. You can also ask Anxiety Challenger to email your accomplishments to your therapist.

For more information, visit https://anxietychallenger.org.

title: Daylio - Diary, Journal, Mood Tracker
description:
Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


😁 WHAT IS DAYLIO

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your food log. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

This is the time for your wellbeing, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal. We build it on three principles:

✅ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
✅ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?
✅ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment—no learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use, create your first entry in two steps.

For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats. 


🤔 HOW DOES IT WORK

Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep an old school diary. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive!

You can review all entries in the statistics on charts or the calendar and share them with your friends.

To make it even better, Daylio allows you:
⭐ Make reflection a daily habit
⭐ Discover what makes you happy
⭐ Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities 
⭐ Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis
⭐ Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly or yearly charts
⭐ Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity or group
⭐ Customize color themes
⭐ Enjoy nights with dark mode
⭐ See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels'
⭐ Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself
⭐ Build habits and collect achievements
⭐ Share statistics with your friends
⭐ Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
⭐ Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
⭐ Turn on PIN lock and keep your diary safe
⭐ Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


🧐 PRIVACY AND SECURITY

We are a top private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to the Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

We don't send your data to our servers. We don't have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app can't read your data.

summary: Self-Care Bullet Journal with Goals - Mood Diary & Happiness Tracker
recentChanges: Thanks for using Daylio. We have made several small improvements and fixed a couple of bugs. Enjoy the app!
comments: Far more useful and life-improving than expected! I've been using daylio every single day for almost 2 years, which is both an achievement and a testament to the app's ease-of-use. It's still being actively developed so great new features keep popping up. An app that I'm very happy to support and recommend.

I bought the app, but when I switched my phone, they didn't saved my purchase, restricting me in use of the app. Although premium version still valid and working on the old phone. Ridiculous! Btw: asking monthly subscription for the app, for which you don't even need to pay for servers, is the most violent insult of your users🖕

Great tool to help you keep track of life. I like the fact it works with speech to text so I don't actually have to type down my journal throughout the day and it helps keep track of things I want to do things I'd like to do and just things like that. it reminds me to do stuff a lot which honestly sometimes I would forget and it's honestly help me a lot with my depression by just reminding me to like be kind to myself and things like that. I highly recommend it.

I have struggles with remembering to do simple daily tasks and keeping a routine in place. This is the only app I pay for because its the easiest to use and the only one that's ever actually managed to keep me on task and keep track of things. I highly recommend it for anyone with executive dysfunction, ADHD or autism if you need help staying on task or remembering daily self care!!

Great mood and activity tracker. I would really like the ability to still log things after midnight as the same day. I am having to customise the time and date for late night entries because they don't make sense to include in the next day. I haven't started that day yet! I think a "day start/end time" we can set would be an easy fix, much like choosing if weeks start on Sunday or Monday. I hope you consider this feedback!

title: Nabu - Help for Challenging Moments
description:
*** Now also available from within Pocketcoach ***

Sometimes we need a little help. Whether it's anxiety, worries, procrastination or a full-blown panic attack. These moments are tough to overcome if you're on your own. 

Nabu is here to support you in those difficult moments. It guides you through exercises and helps you calm down when it's too difficult. 

Download Nabu to have your own digital coach on your phone.


- Get help when you’re worrying

- Keep yourself from procrastinating

- Nabu helps when you’re about to panic

- When you’re having trouble falling asleep, Nabu helps you relax and doze off

- In stressful situations, you’ll have someone by your side

summary: A digital companion who can guide you through moments of stress and anxiety
recentChanges: Improved notifications
comments: Got me out of multiple panic attacks, I love the fact it is like somebody talking to you and the gifs make it fun (welcome distraction) I have shared it with so many friends, it's honestly a great app and I'm so glad I downloaded it.
When I used it the first time, if was great but after that I started showing me videos even without listening to my problem
This app really helped me a lot. Thank you for creating it, I'll definitely use it again.

title: Healthpiper
description:
Chat with a Super Doctor® psychiatrist

Use our healthcare secure app and receive your prescription by overnight shipping.

Available in most of the U.S.

Currently, we serve AR, AZ, CA, CO, CT, DC, DE, FL, HI, IA, ID, IL, IN, KY, MD, ME, MI, MN, MO, MS, MT, NE, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, PA, RI, TN, UT, VA, WA, WV, and WY.

We treat most psychiatric symptoms

These include ADHD, panic attacks, anxiety, bipolar disorder, OCD, and depression.

We have made healthcare the way it should be

We have been treating people for over 4 years. Over 97% of our reviews are 5 stars. Although our clients can stop anytime without penalty, virtually no one does, because we treat them right and their lives are transformed.

Prescriptions to Your Door

Many medications we prescribe are $10, including free overnight shipping.

Effortless Communication

We often respond within seconds or minutes, and we never go to bed until we answer all your messages.

The Symptom Scan™ gives an objective picture of your symptoms

The Symptom Scan™ was developed in collaboration with some of the leading experts in the world, and the core module was validated under National Institutes of Health grant NIH MH55918 R43.

A fair price. And the initial chat and Symptom Scan™ is free

You will do our Symptom Scan™ and chat with a Super Doctor® psychiatrist about your symptoms and treatment options, all for free, in fact, without even entering a credit card.

Once you are confident healthPiper is terrific, you have an hour-long videochat with your Super Doctor® psychiatrist, for $199.

The package price for each month of service is $199. You can stop any time with no penalty. But we promise that you won’t want to.

Superb Doctors Who Are Also Really Nice

A wonderful doctor needs to not only to be an expert, they also have to be welcoming, kind, and good-natured. We constantly are scouring the country for terrific doctors- if a psychiatrist is on healthPiper, that means that not only are they smart, but also that they are nice, will listen to you, and work together with you as a partner to get you feeling right.

comments: The app has problems, especially with notifications, but it still works for the purpose needed. The services themselves are better than the app performance.

Ive had an excellent experience with the doctor and Ben.They quickly have responded everytime i send a message.I did 1 video chat and They have filled my prescriptons early alot of the time .Very dependable mostly works with anxiety and depression does do adhd but u have to meet with the doctor in his office in LA.Anyhow Very friendly empathetic Doctor and assistent.
Helpful. Very professional, efficient staff. Great value. App does have glitches though.
Cant even sign up - trying to verify my phone number even though I've entered the correct verification several times now.

title: TherapyChat - Online therapy & counselling
description:
The leading online psychotherapy app for couples counselling, anxiety, mindfulness, stress, depression and coaching through video calls with qualified CBT therapists.
 
TherapyChat access your online therapist in a safe and private way, anywhere you are and whenever you want.

BECOME YOUR BEST SELF
TherapyChat's aim is to democratize psychology and mental healthcare. We make psychological therapy easier, more comfortable and accessible so you can learn how to manage personal conflicts and become your best self. TherapyChat is an online therapy service that is safe, private and of the highest quality, and allows you to achieve goals and greater happiness, in a comfortable way and at an affordable price. 

THE BEST ONLINE THERAPIST
Get access to the right counsellor for you, without having to go through an extensive search: in TherapyChat we carefully select highly qualified and certified therapists for each of the different areas of psychology. All licensed and with extensive knowledge in their fields of expertise.

HOW CAN THERAPYCHAT HELP ME?
Our cognitive behavioural therapists accompany you in the process of becoming your best self through online therapy in different treatments: 
    ✅Learn strategies for coping with anxiety
    ✅Reduce your stress level
    ✅Acquire anger management techniques
    ✅Overcome depression symptoms
    ✅Enhance your relationship with couples therapy
    ✅Therapy and counselling for panic disorder
    ✅Grow personally and professionally through coaching
    ✅Regain self-esteem
    ✅Increase emotional intelligence
    ✅Accept the loss of a loved one and go through all the stages of mourning
    ✅Receive cognitive therapy for postpartum depression
    ✅Deal with work stress
    ✅Practice mindfulness
    ✅And many more...

HOW DOES ONLINE THERAPY WORK
Most of our psychotherapists work within a Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) approach.
In order to understand your situation, we will have a first conversation and seek for the most suitable psychological support for your case. Subsequently, you will choose the plan that better fits your needs and in a maximum period of 24 hours, you will be assigned to the right therapist for you. Via video calls your therapist will acknowledge and evaluate the circumstances that are influencing your situation. This way, your online therapist and you can begin your CBT, which will have a variable duration depending on the case.  

MORE AFFORDABLE THAN TRADITIONAL THERAPY
We offer different plans to be chosen according to your preferences: 
    - Weekly Plan: Includes one video session for £49
    - Monthly Plan: Includes 4 video sessions for  £40 each
    - Bimonthly Plan: Includes 8 video sessions for  £35 each

Regardless of the plan, you will always have the option of requesting a change of online therapist if your expectations are not fully met. Additionally, you have access to an open chat with your counsellor. 

More than 3.000 people already feel better and 91% of our users recommend our services to family and friends. We lead the online therapy and coaching industry internationally. 

Contact

    1. Download the app or go to TherapyChat.com and speak with Cloe, our virtual coach who will guide you when selecting the area that best suits your situation and will assign you the right therapist.
    2. We are at your disposal to accompany you through this journey on https://therapychat-help.zendesk.com/hc/en-us
    3. or you can send us an email to support@therapychat.com

Become your best self with TherapyChat: the online therapy app with qualified coaches and psychotherapists.

comments: What a great app! Works fantastically. The video chat is great and extremely easy to use. Even though I live in the UK, I was able to use it. Plus great service. Highly recommended! Que gran aplicación! Funciona perfectamente. El video chat is genial y facilísimo de usar. Incluso viviendo en el Reino Unido lo uso muy fácilmente. A esto hay que añadir el fantástico servicio. Lo recomiendo!! Usarlo!!

Una aplicacion excelente! a pesar de que no vivo en España, nunca tuve problemas para coincidir con los horarios y nunca tuve esa sensacion de lejania. Es muy facil de usar. Lo recomiendo a todo el mundo! :) Excellent application! I live outside Spain but I've never had any problems with the times difference and I never had the feeling of remoteness. Easy to use on the go, any time. I recommend to everybody! :)

Although happy with my therapist, the app has room for improvement: Pictures shared through the app appear trimmed Not possible to open files while videoconferencing Missing a dedicated storage space for files shared Not possible to have two sessions with therapist in the same week
I couldn't get through to the chat. It doesn't work.

Please be aware that this service not operate if you live in the US. They work with Spain time zone and when you try to set an appointment with them is basically impossible. Also they don't offer money back, even though they haven't provided any type of service. I have payed $ 77 that they are not going to give me that money back. In that sense the application does not offer any type of customer protection. Even if you are unhappy with the service or if you fail to accommodate your schedule with the Spain time zone

title: Happy being - stress relief, improve wellbeing
description:
Personalized guidance to enhance wellbeing, manage stress & anxiety better, create stronger relations, boost focus & decision making. Heal from past pain, overcome blocks, and get aware, manage, and express your feelings better.

Featured 
+ App of the day. +
+ Award-winning #1 wellbeing app, +
+ Among Global Top 5 Apps for meditation +
+ Among Global top 5 App for mental health and emotional wellbeing App +

Wellbeing is a state in which you feel healthy, happy, and successful.
It includes achieving your true potential, coping effectively with day-to-day stress and challenges, having meaningful relationships, and living to your full potential.

Wellbeing affects one's state of health, thoughts, and actions. This impacts your relationships, focus, personal harmony, and decision making.

Often a lack in one, without one's awareness, can negatively impact other areas, showing up as more dissatisfaction, discord, poor performance, health issues, and distress, affecting your quality of life.

With just 10-15 mins a day, our happiness bots help you enhance and take self-care of your wellbeing in 3 simple steps.

STEP 1: Get instantly, your wellbeing measured across 8 pillars of your life. 

STEP 2: Get personalized actions, priorities, and tools that work best for you to enhance your wellbeing. 

STEP 3: Get personalized workouts and guidance every day, by our happiness bots (powered by AI), ensuring your privacy, supporting anywhere, anytime. Choose from 800+ tools that work best for you. 

FEATURES:
+ My Goals: The first step to improving your wellbeing is to help you understand - what are your aspirations, approaches, and priorities. Measure your wellbeing, set goals, and achieve growth across 8 pillars of your life:

1.	Health and fitness
2.	Self and family relationships
3.	Emotional strength
4.	Friends and community
5.	Career success
6.	Financial security and growth
7.	Purpose and meaning
8.	Personal environment

+ My Coach: A new workout every day. 10 mins My coach presents everyday practices that build skills and habits to boost mental strength, enhance focus, develop self-love, and take actions to achieve goals.

•	Mindfulness meditation
•	Positive affirmations
•	Get aware of your current feelings, get help when feeling alone, sad, low, fear, confusion, and rest-less.
•	Guided Imagery

+ MindSpa: Different relaxation techniques to help you focus, calm down and sleep better.
Relaxation music & meditations
Mindfulness meditations
Breathing exercises
Visualization meditations
5 senses relaxation
Positive Perspective – on 
Let go of emotional pain
Positive affirmations
Self-healing
Take a break

+ My Journal: Guided help on practicing gratitude across every area of your wellbeing and your goals. A confidential platform to shift your focus away from the negative aspects of your life to the positive ones.

What makes Happy Being special compared to other wellbeing or meditation apps?

Though there are many apps to provide meditation practice, a happy being is not just a set of mindfulness or meditation practice alone. It combines techniques from positive psychology, neuroscience, and mindfulness to give the best and fastest way to boost mental wellbeing and emotional wellbeing like no other app existing in the market. 

The app starts with helping you discover, measure wellbeing across 8 pillars of your wellbeing, personalized day to day activities to prioritize areas that are most critical to you. 

Happy Being personalizes methods that are likely to work best for you. 

Being a Happy Being is easy. Start with the free trial, now.

title: BlissU : Online Support Groups | Peer Counselling
description:
BlissU is a safe space for everyone to Talk, Evolve and Grow!

Do you struggle with Depression, Anxiety or any other Mental Health Issues? Or are you just feeling low today? 
It is not easy to share your feelings and discuss mental health with family or friends. BlissU provides you with free online support groups where you can connect with like-minded people. These groups will help you to listen to other's experiences anonymously and show and find support amongst people who are struggling as well.

Being a member of an online support group can add great value to your life. Not only do you get a broader perspective of life, but you also get a safe space to vent out your feelings. These groups act as a great medium of depression self help and grief counselling in the form of depression support groups. The best part is that you can join a single online support group of your choice or multiple online support groups to get an even broader perspective.

BlissU is for everyone! title: UP! Buddy - Bipolar Disorder Partner App
description:
Team up and fight bipolar, depression, BPD and anxiety.
UP! Buddy is the partner app of the UP! mood diary for individuals with mental health issues. Get to know the early warning signs and the mood triggers of your loved one even better. Learn to differentiate between normal and pathological mood swings, avoid interpersonal conflicts and provide help if really needed. Please note that UP! and UP! Buddy are two different apps. 

Getting started:
1. Download UP! Buddy
2. Generate a pairing code by using the entry "Buddies" within the UP! menu. Usually an UP! user invites a relative, friend or other confidants to participate by sending a pairing code
3. Enter the pairing code during the setup process of UP! Buddy
4. Done, the data will be synched periodically

Features:
• Mood calendar and mood chart view.
• Mood triggers: Sleep, work, physical- and social activity.
• Early warning signs of hypomania, mania and depression: A list of today’s and past observed warning signs as well as a description of all known warning signs.

The UP! user decides which category of diary entries is shared and is in control of the remote connection.

The buddy approach also helps to avoid overprotective behavior and supports the self-protection of care givers.
Only those who are and remain healthy can help.

Team up by using UP! and UP! Buddy.
If your loved one in need does not use UP! yet, recommend it and connect.

UP! is successfully used by individuals by people
• to keep track of bipolar I, bipolar 2 and cyclothymia.
• with rapid cycling bipolar.
• with mixed episodes.
• as depression journal when struggling with recurrent depression.
• with anxiety attacks and panic attacks.
• with borderline personality disorder (BPD).
• undergoing a burnout syndrome.

Take care and download now!

Your feedback matters to us! We need it to constantly improve the app.
Troubles, questions, suggestions, commendations and criticism - tell us: info@netural.com

comments: I liked the app to begin with once I figured out it is 2 apps...each person needs to have UP! Then to see each others moods both need to have the UP!Buddy. The problem the past week has been I cant get the UP!Buddy app to even open, let alone show me the mood calendar and that is very important right now due to my buddy being on suicide watch... Please fix ASAP or this is going to be a useless app that we paid for.
Keeps restarting. Can't even see anything before it restarts. Very frustrating.
I wish there was a way to send a notification so if my buddy charts a specific mood or trigger I would be alerted.
Can't use it unless you have someone to be your buddy. Not even sure how to generate the buddy code.
instructions are usually a good idea.😏

title: Psious VR | Virtual reality for mental health
description:
Psious is the first all-in-one VR platform for therapists and mental health professionals. Apply more effective therapeutic interventions in less time on dozens of conditions.

Pisous offers:
- A Complete Virtual Realy therapy solution: A complete solution that includes unlimited access to the Psious VR therapy platform, a state-of-the-art VR headset for psychotherapy, and an advanced biofeedback sensor.

- An Online platform: With a clean and intuitive interface and 1-click sync with the VR headset and biofeedback, it has never been easier to apply VR therapy in the clinical practice.

- 70+ VR environments and scenes: The platform includes more than 70 virtual reality and augmented reality scenes, together with 360º videos, to treat almost any kind of mental health condition.

- Academy and learning resources: Get free access to the Psious Academy learning resources, and get certified as a VR Therapy expert through ongoing training, webinars, and courses.


The Psious platform has more than 70 virtual environments and scenes specially designed to easily treat dozens of pathologies. The therapist can use multiple therapeutic techniques (psychoeducation, gradual exposure, systematic desensitization, relaxation, distraction, acceptance and commitment, mindfulness, EMDR …) to work with their patients.

It allows for the treatment of all kinds of disorders such as anxiety (phobias, panic, agoraphobia, generalized anxiety, OCD, ADHD, public speaking, exams, etc.), attention management, eating disorders, and pain management, among others.

Validated by more than 25 years of scientific studies. VR therapy provides the opportunity for mental health professionals to not only reproduce real-life scenarios but also to adapt and control these environments to suit the individual needs of their clients.

This technology allows mental health professionals to evaluate and identify their client’s fears and anxieties within the safety of a consultation room. VR is a tool that effectively facilitates the application of psychological evaluation and intervention protocols.


Main benefits of Psious for psychology and mental health:

- Personalized Treatments: It provides greater control of the stimuli. The therapist can adjust the process to the needs of each patient.

- Easy and Accessible: It offers the ability to carry out treatments in difficult-to-access stimulation configurations (For example, airplane take-offs, storms, interactions with animals)

- Greater Control: You can control what the patient experiences at all times during the session, allowing you to detect the most clinically relevant stimuli.

- Lower Cost: It is cost-effective as it allows the therapist to treat patients without leaving the office.

- Beyond the Reality: It allows repeating scenes as many times as necessary. For example, recreating 10 airplane take-offs in a row, or having the patient ride the elevator without stopping for five minutes.

- Safer Environments: Both the patient and the therapist have complete control at all times of what is happening.

- Self-training: The patient does not have to wait for the events to take place in real life but can produce and reproduce them whenever he wishes. 

- Scientifically Validated: More than a decade of controlled studies have proven the effectiveness of virtual reality therapy.

- More Privacy: It offers a greater degree of privacy than in vivo exposure.

title: Diseases and Disorders Complete Handbook
description:
Completely Offline & FREE medical handbook app containing medical disorders & diseases with detailed definitions, symptoms, causes and treatment information. 

This medical disease handbook can act as a clinical advisor for self diagnosis and can also be used to look up symptoms, diseases and treatment. Medical diseases handbook free download is like a FREE Doctor at home for common diseases and treatment codes.

Diseases handbook FREE - Medical App Features:
- Works Offline without internet.
- Detailed description of all major medical conditions and diseases.
- Information regarding treatment of diseases for all medical conditions and symptoms along with medication information, medication interaction and drug side effects.
- Medical reference book and thesaurus covering all medical terminologies and abbreviations.
- Prescription drug info along with pill description is provided in the treatment section.
- Physicians desk reference and pharmaceuticals handbook.
- A handy free pocket guide for nurses for use as an emergency guide.

Who can use this free disease handbook:
Healthcare professionals, pharmaceuticals, physicians, hospital nurses, medical students, nursing professionals, pharmacy, physician assistants and for students who work in clinical practice & dispensary.

DISCLAIMER:
This app cannot and should not replace a pharmacist or a doctor consultation. App content is only for pocket reference & educational purposes. Consult a doctor before actual usage of any of the information in this app.
TAG: #lupus,#anxiety disorder, #depression symptoms, #anxiety symptoms, #rheumatoid arthritis

title: anxiety and stress routines
description:
Stress is a feeling of physical or emotional tension. It can come from any situation or thought that makes one feel frustrated, furious or nervous.

The cause of stress is the presence of a stressor, anxiety is the stress that continues after the stressor has already disappeared.

symptoms of too much stress:
- symptoms of diarrhea or constipation
- symptoms of bad memory
- symptoms of frequent aches and pains
- headache symptoms
- symptoms of lack of energy or concentration
- symptoms of sexual problems
- Rigid neck or jaw
- Tiredness
- Trouble sleeping or sleeping too much
- Stomach upset
- Use of alcohol or drugs to relax
- Weight loss or gain

Feeling anxiety occasionally is a normal part of life. However, people with anxiety disorders often have intense, excessive and persistent worries and fears about daily situations. Perform relaxation and breathing exercises promotes health.

These feelings of anxiety and panic interfere with daily activities, are difficult to control, are disproportionate compared to real danger and can last a long time.

We teach you many mental relaxation techniques and relaxation exercises so you can have peace of mind to control anxiety and stress.

Relaxation is very important in our life, having a daily tranquility favors our health, breathing exercises to control anxiety and stress.

It is good to have physical exercise routines, good eating routines, relaxation exercise routines, breathing control exercise routines, all these routines favor our physical and mental health.

Download this free application to improve your health, control your breath and the symptoms of stress and anxiety. Put in your life some healthy routines to improve your physical and mental health.

title: Fight Depression Naturally
description:
This app is designed by medical doctors to help with Depression treatment and controlling stress by advising mood enhancing foods, teaching the importance of writing wellness journals and how to get adequate sleep during depressive episodes.

Chosen as one among the Top 10 apps for Depression by Healthline

The scientific information provided in this app are updated with the current research articles published in standard Journals of Psychiatry, to the best of our knowledge.

♥ 20 Super foods that removes depressing thoughts and anxiety
A beautiful description of the foods items that can enhance your mood and release feel-good chemicals which will make you happy in no time. The scientific explanations of how each food will elevate your mood are also included in a simple way.

♥ 8 Techniques to help with your Depression treatment
Learn the simple tricks of getting adequate sleep to writing a wellness checklist and journal, which will brighten up your day and prevent the occurrence of depressive episodes. Each techniques are explained in detail with a step by step action plan.

♥ Essential book of Inspirational Songs
The right inspiring lyrics can give you a kick in the backside and provides a quick 'pick me up' to motivate you to accomplish your goals.

♥Over 100 hours of Relaxing Nature Sounds and Meditation Songs with Videos to fight depression

♥10 hours of Binaural beats to help you concentrate easily
 
♥ Yoga techniques that can help in your depression treatment

♥ How to Use Breath Watching Meditation for anxiety relief

♥ The Big Book of Inspiring Stories

♥ Motivational Movie Archive for controlling Stress

♥ The Vault of Inspirational Quotes

♥ Poems That Inspire

All the contents used in this app are non copyrighted or under CCO license.

Please read the medical disclaimer in the Info section of the app before you start using it.
This application uses Google Analytics to anonymously track usage data within the application.

title: Stop Drinking with Andrew Johnson
description:
Are you finding that one drink is turning into a few or too many? Are you finding that you are using alcohol to relax?

 Stop Drinking is designed to help listeners relax and overcome the emotional and physical cravings for alcohol.

Drinking can quickly turn into a habit that many people find hard to break. These habits soon become an accepted part of your life and many people hold themselves back with the thoughts they can't stop.

This relaxing, positive, motivational app will give you the tools to:
 
  • Stop drinking altogether or regain control and cut down.
  • Break those negative habits that lead to reaching for a drink.
  • Build positive resources to achieve your goals, and so lead a happier, healthier, more 
    fulfilling life.
  • Change your thinking and access the incredible power of your unconscious mind. 
  • Easily break unwanted habits.
  • Regain control of your clarity of thought, well-being, money, health and much more.

Destress, improve your mindset, sleep better, grow your confidence and be healthier with guided meditations, mindfulness sessions and positive messages – and much more.

Mindfulness expert, coach and therapist Andrew Johnson has been helping people deal with life’s challenges with guided relaxations, meditations, self-care tools and breathing exercises for many years. 

His best-selling range of mindfulness apps have a variety of content to help you, whether you are looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety, lose weight, improve your health & confidence, learn relaxation techniques, etc.

Key features:

  • Short meditations you can do anywhere: at work, commuting, at home, walking.

  •Inspirational sessions to help you tackle life’s challenges, to be calm and find clarity.

  •Mindfulness stories and talks to help you build better, healthy habits.

  •Meditations to help you feel inspired and find motivated to eat well, workout and stay 
   healthy both in body and mind.

  •Relaxation techniques and tools to help you sleep better every night, to wake feeling 
   energised and refreshed.

  •Breathing exercises and calming meditations for anxiety, panic attacks and stress relief.

  •Meditation sessions to stop anxiety in its tracks and release stress.

How do I get more?

Start your day mindfully, keep feeling positive and be inspired throughout the day with a range of guided meditations to help during tough or stressful moments. Boost your energy with a Power Nap, stay focussed to Beat Procrastination, and then drift off using a Deep Sleep meditation for a restful night.

Think of Andrew as your personal mindfulness coach, always there to help when you need him most.

Search for Andrew Johnson to unlock more daily mindfulness and guided meditation sessions.

We update our app regularly so we can make it better for you. What's new?

• New and improved style!
• Push notifications to receive the latest news from Andrew Johnson (you can opt out from Settings)
• A brand new bonus meditation!

Like the app? Please rate us! Your feedback helps us to improve the app.
comments: Fantastic hypnotherapy app. I am now on day 27 sober and have no desire at all. This app helps me get off to sleep every evening and the healthy lifestyle suggestions have also clicked with me too. I am highly recommending this to anyone that wants to change their unhealthy habits.

Help! Pd for the app, embraced the initial 17 min meditation, but now all Im finding is links to his social media sights and ability to listen to the initial intro & meditation again. Am I missing something? Did I pay for a single meditation in hopes Ill buy into the other things offered (at addi cost) Confused!
Listened once and stopped drinking. Great life hack! Thanks Andrew. Xant wait to see how else I can be reprogrammed!
I'm a psychotherapist, and I have 5 clients using this app, all with success. Thank you Andrew Johnson!

I can't believe how well this App works for me! I was a regular drinker, 7 days a week. After listening once, I've had virtually no desire for alcohol. ☺️ It's been 8 days with no problems passing up alcohol and I look forward to listening each day. I feel both relaxed and refreshed afterwards. And the money I'm saving is great!! I highly recommend this App. Thank you Andrew Johnson!

title: Anxiety Relief & Sleep Melodies
description:
You need relaxing melodies for lighter and better sleep?🎵 Anxiety Relief & Sleep
Melodies will help you with this.🎵 Do you want to feel more comfortable and more relaxed?🎵 Listen to this incredible list of melodies and enjoy yourself.💤

Enjoy a large variety of Anxiety Relief & Sleep Melodies that you can mix and combine to make sure that our content and techniques will help you overcome Insomnia, Tinnitus, Feeling moody, Bad mood, Mental exhaustion, Night-Time Anxiety and lower your Everyday Stress.
Anxiety Relief & Sleep Melodies brings great collection of HD relax melodies that can be mixed into the perfect relaxing ambiences.

If you’re seeking stress relief or anti anxiety help, you are not alone. Anxiety and depression affect millions and can make everyday life unbearable. 
 Do you struggle with some of your thoughts and emotions? Are you looking for ways to improve your emotional well-being? Moodpath is your 
personalized mental health companion and supports you in phases of stress, depression, and anxiety.
You're not feeling your best. You might call it stress, anxiety, depression, low mood, or something completely different. 
What you do know is that you want to do something about it.

When your anxiety is reduced, you may also notice an improvement in related symptoms like anger management, OCD, PTSD, or even panic attack relief. 
You have the power to relieve stress, anxiety and depression — see if hypnosis is right for you to unlock your own ability to live your life 
outside of the shadow of depression and anxiety!
 

 
Anxiety disorders are a group of mental disorders characterized by feelings of anxiety and fear, where anxiety is a worry about future events and 
 fear is a reaction to current events. These feelings may cause physical symptoms, such as a racing heart and shakiness. There are various forms of 
 anxiety disorders, including generalized anxiety disorder, phobic disorder, and panic disorder. While each has its own characteristics and symptoms,
 they all include symptoms of anxiety.This sound will help you to relief the anxiety symptoms. 
 
Mental health is the level of psychological well-being or an absence of mental illness. It is the state of someone who is "functioning at a satisfactory 
level of emotional and behavioral adjustment". From the perspectives of positive psychology or of holism, mental health may include an individual's 
ability to enjoy life and to create a balance between life activities and efforts to achieve psychological resilience.


Feel free to share Anxiety Relief & Sleep Melodies on Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, Telegram, Tumblr, Instagram, messengers and anywhere on the internet.
Listening to nature sounds is the most natural and healthy way to relax and improve your sleep.
In this app you will find the best instrumental music, incredible nature sounds, meditation music, nature music, harp music, birds sounds,  piano music, 
music for mind and much more. Download it and dive into the magical world of Relaxing Music.

Listen exclusively  Free Melodies, Contemporary Music , ringtones, alarm tones and sounds. 
Best Mobile Apps and APK Free Download! - New MELODIES & SOUNDS For Tablet, Smartphone & Mobile Phone.







Features:

✔️  You can set it as a melody / ringtone . 
✔️  You have 100 min to enjoy in Anxiety Relief & Sleep  Melodies.
✔️  You can set an notification sound and alarm.   
✔️  Social sharing button.
✔️  Melodies can be used without an internet connection.
✔️  It’s 100% free

📫 All sounds are copyright of their perspective owners. No copyright infringement is intended, and any request to remove one of the images will be honored.
You can send your suggestions to contact page or simply leave a comment. We read all of them.📫

title: Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker - Medisafe
description:
Get the free “MUST HAVE” award-winning pill reminder and medication tracker ranked #1 by pharmacists, physicians and patients. Join the millions of people using Medisafe who are taking control of their medication management with our free app - stay on track and never miss another med.

💊 Features
• Pill reminder and alarm for all medication needs
• Drug-to-drug interaction checker
• Family and caregiver support via “Medfriend” functionality
• Medicine tracker
• Refill reminders
• Dr appointment manager and calendar
• Support for complex dose schedules 
• Add “as needed” medications, vitamins and supplements
• Full selection of OTC and RX medications
• Daily, weekly & monthly med reporting with logbook to share with your doctor
• Track health measurements for various medical conditions (diabetes, hypertension, cancer, anxiety, depression, HIV, multiple sclerosis, MS, Crohn’s, lymphoma, myeloma and leukemia) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels
• Android Wear enabled
• Customizable reminders and time settings (i.e weekend mode so you can sleep in)
• Automatic time zone detection
• Easily customize your pill reminder notifications. 

❤️ A Health Tracker Built for You
Medisafe doesn’t just remind you to take your meds. As a medication management platform, Medisafe is a comprehensive tool that compiles all of your medical and health information in one place: pill and medicine reminders, drug-to-drug interactions, refill alerts, doctor appointments, and health journal with 20+ trackable health measurements


🔒Privacy
• Medisafe is available for free and no registration is required
• We comply with strict privacy laws (HIPAA and GDPR compliant) to safeguard medical information


✅ App Permission Information
Read Your Contacts - used if you choose to add a doctor or Medfriend. The app never stores your address book content and it doesn’t access your address book without asking you first. 
Find Accounts on the Device - Medisafe uses push notifications to Medfriends to let those with permission know if the main user has forgotten to take medication.


🔎 Additional Information
Frequently Asked Questions: http://bit.ly/2yZt1Bh
Terms of Use: http://bit.ly/2Cpoz0n
Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/2Cmpb7d
Validation by 3rd Party Independent Studies:
• http://bit.ly/2GjwcYJ
• http://bit.ly/2gLdPCp

Medisafe is FREE for download and use. Medisafe Premium includes unlimited Medfriends, access to more than 20 health measurements, and the choice of a dozen reminder sounds. Premium is offered by a subscription with automatic renewal.

recentChanges:
This version encourages additional social distancing in the US due to coronavirus by granting full access our pharmacy delivery service. Simply order your meds through the app with free delivery, no need to visit the pharmacy.
Tap More >> Pharmacy Services in the menu for more information.
In addition this update:
- Bug fixes
Have suggestions or want a sneak peek at what we’re working on? Join our beta community at https://medisafe.com/betacommunity
comments: After a rocky start, I have finally figured out this app and it's almost perfect! Sometimes I run into issues when I experience a time change (for travel or daylight savings), and I would love an option to record a ketone measurement. Other than those, I'm so grateful that this app helps me keep track of my son's complicated medication schedule!

Honestly, this is a life saver! I was losing track of all the meds i was taking, missing out numerous doses and occasionally taking medication twice by accident! This app allows me to add all my medication (and give it an icon that actually looks like the tabley/inhaler/etc) and set up reminders for each day. The great thing is that if I'm in the middle of something and can't take my meds there and then, I can "snooze" the reminder to go off in 5/10/15+ minutes! Fantastic app :-)

This was a good app on my last phone but on my new phone it's very unreliable. Customer support sorted out my problems last time but now it's missing reminders again and I've changed nothing. It's happening every few days. I think the recent update killed it. I've never encountered a more troublesome app, ever! I'm now looking for another medication tracker as these problems seem to be more trouble than they're worth. EDIT: Rating lowered to 2 stars due to app breaking again after another bad update and customer support not responding for 17 days. I've resorted to using my bedside alarm clock and a paper note for guaranteed reminders. EDIT2: I did contact customer support. You choose to not respond. I'm not going to beg for help. Sort your app out. 20 people agree with me so far.

Reminds me when to take my meds and every week it lets me know how often I have missed them. If I miss my meds I am asked a multiple choice question of why. At the end of the week I am able to see why I miss my meds so I have insight on how to fix the situation. This app is better than I expected, although it could be a tad more user friendly.

I found a few glitches here and there but this app is very well done if you're somebody like me who has several serious medical conditions requiring medications at different times a day and you'd like to track on the effectiveness of such medication highly recommend this app. The designers and developers really did put the user in the driver's seat. There is still some work that could be done however I'm extremely impressed and I use this app every day multiple times a day. I love it.

title: Tell A Buddy - Online Counseling & Life Management
description:
Dealing with issues at workplace? Bogged down by Stress? Facing Relationship Issues? Worried about career? Are you experiencing adolescent or parenting Issues? 

Sometimes life is a battlefield. You find yourself alone, confused and hopeless – it’s hard.

In situations like these you need someone to talk to online or online counseling with certified professionals – and there is no better life management app & online counseling tool than Tell A Buddy! It’s the easiest way to talk to a therapist online and handy tool for life management and self-improvement.

We like to call it the next big thing is online therapy!

PRIVATE LIFE COUNSELING APP
Tell A Buddy is created for moments of psychological despair and consists of people who will walk the journey with you and help you. Our life-counseling app is discreet; where anonymity is constantly upheld regarding your emotional feelings and information shared. Get professional help & online psychologists from various field in an easy convenient manner.

TALK TO SOMEONE ONLINE
When mental problems or life problems struck, often the person is feeling alone or afraid to share them with someone. With Tell A Buddy you’re never alone; this online life management app offers the best online therapy, and tons of ways to get through any situation you’re facing. Take that first step towards your emotional wellbeing. Find what works for you, and the motivation to continue forward will come with a great life management tool like Tell A Buddy. 

SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE
Your situation and problem my come from different categories of life. From relationship problems with the people you love, to troubles in school or with friends – Tell A Buddy is useful for all fields of life and for all age groups. Just pick a private chat with an online therapist for online mental health counseling and start your process to therapy. 

Don’t need private online therapy and you just seek advice or opinion about a problem you are facing? Then use the group chats feature of Tell A Buddy.

Features: 
• Private chats with professionals who are experts in Counselling and Therapeutic work.
• Various categories for group chats – Friends, School, Family, Girls Talk & Relationship
• Support groups
• User-friendly 
• User Profile options

Services
• Career Counselling
• Depression
• Family Difficulties
• Anxiety
• Social Anxiety
• Self Development
• Panic Attacks
• Relationship Problems
• Grief and bereavement
• Anger Management
• Work/Life Stress ect..

HOW MANY SESSIONS CAN I HAVE? 
• Unlimited.

No matter if you need online relationship counseling, online psychologist or just someone to talk to online, Tell A Buddy is your best solution!

It’s a tool for all fields of life. A tool that can really change and improve your overall well-being and change your life to the better.

Get ultimate professional help, download this life management app.

Thank you for using Tell A Buddy - Online Counseling & Life Management
comments: Absolutely love it!! This app runs smoothly and effortlessly replaces traditional psychology, the counsellors tend to you right away and what I love most is the security(being asked to type in my password every once in a while) so they know that it's me who's still busy communicating with the counsellor.

I have been on this App for 3 months now and I'm happy with the services they provide. The payments are more reasonable than other online counseling App. Thanks for the support you have provided for me.
It's a good app to have, most people have problems but they afraid to seek help because they don't want to be judged. Having to engage your problems without being judged it's great.

Great app,jst a few days using it and l'm very impressed. The app is easy to use and my therapist is very kind,very helpful and understands me.Since l started talking to with her l feel more calm.Feels like I'm talking with a friend.Highly Recommend.

It appeared a good app, however my 7day free trial stopped working after only 3 days which upset me as I couldn't afford to buy the subscription straight away . Now keep getting told to update yet no new features appear .

title: Techniques relaxation against anxiety
description:
The relaxation of mind and body is very important to keep us in harmony and peace.
Application relaxation techniques helps users to control their breathing, which directly influence the reduction of hyperventilation, chills, heartbeat, tension, stress, anxiety and panic attack.
Physical and mental relaxation is intimately related to the individual's joy, calmness and personal well-being.
With this application of relaxation techniques to eliminate stress you will have the best routines to get that deep relaxation we need. Daily stress tenses us too much, with this application of deep relaxation techniques you can relax and enjoy for a few moments the tranquility of relaxing music and park your worries leaving your mind blank and your body relaxed.
The benefits that we will obtain when putting relaxation techniques in our lives are the following:
- They make our self-esteem improve.
- They help us fall asleep.
- Reduce the levels of cortisol (the stress hormone) in our blood.
- They lead us to a feeling of well-being.
The best times to perform these relaxation techniques are right after waking up or before going to sleep. Below we show you some of the relaxation techniques you can use every day, making them part of your routine against anxiety or stress:
- Perform breathing with the diaphragm
- Perform meditation
- Direct the imagination towards an imagined scenario that transmits peace and calmness.
- Jacobson's progressive muscle relaxation
About 10 minutes of these techniques of daily relaxation of deep breathing, can help you to generate a state of calm and peace all day.
So download this free application with the best music, techniques and relaxation and breathing exercises to maintain a healthy balance, and combat anxiety and stress.

title: Selfpause: Positive Affirmations & Manifestations
description:
Positive affirmations by Selfpause are designed to help you overcome negativity with meditation. Use our powerful mantras to manifest success in all areas of your life as you meditate with the law of attraction (LOA). Visualize success with thousands of affirmations professionally recorded into tens of categorized tracks. Selfpause is the perfect visualization tool to give you some self pause and any department of your life a boost.

Selfpause is a transformative app available for anyone looking to transform their mind, body, and spirit to achieve a hopeful, joyful, and successful life.
Selfpause is an amazing app for those new to the psychologically-altering potential of positive affirmations. It contains such unique and specific affirmations that it allows even experienced visualizers to take their affirmations to a whole new level.  

With the ability to record and listen to your own affirmations, along with over a hundred hours of thought provoking and inspirational guided manifestations, Selfpause is the perfect tool built to serve YOUR positivity needs.

These guided affirmations – artfully written and specifically designed to help you overcome negativity and manifest joy into all areas of your life - include a large variety of topics that include:
*Millionaire Mindset
*Weight Loss
*Overcoming Panic Attacks
*Overcoming Stress
*Think and Grow Rich
*Lasting Relationships
*Dating Confidence
*Happy Marriage
*Relationship Commitment
*Sleep
*Overcoming Depression
*Running
*Marathon training
*Football
*Swimming
*Healthy Body Image
*Diet Motivation
*Networking Confidence
*Mental Clarity
*Eliminate Debt
*Investor Mindset
*Sales Success
*Dream Career
*AND MUCH MORE!

Other app features include:
*Daily positivity reminders
*Categorized personal recordings
*Ability to write, record, and listen to one’s own positive affirmations
*A pleasant library of soundscapes and music to both layer on top of recorded affirmations and to listen to by themselves

Selfpause is free for anyone to download and use without any ads. A large selection of the categories and features will be free to use forever.

However, some categories and features are only available to those with a premium subscription. If you choose to become a subscribed member and access the entire Selfpause library, payment will be charged to your Google Account once there has been a confirmation of purchase.

title: How To Overcome Anxietys
description:
Overcome Anxiety is an application that helps you to overcome disruptions in your life Anxiety is a condition that usually arises with excess stress and worry. It is usually the feared possibility of the consequences of an action that brings about anxiety. The people who get anxious are always worrying about the bad things that might happen and thus create an environment of fear in their minds.

It is wise you quickly learn how to overcome anxiety now otherwise you will continue to feel stressed, unhappy and anxious throughout your life. You will suffer unduly because anxiety will weaken you mentally, sap your energy and you will not be at your best. Anxiety comes in many forms. Some suffer from panic disorder where there are unpredictable attacks of panic on the person, with its physiological consequences, while some others feel helpless in an embarrassing situation and this is agoraphobia.

As it can be seen, anxiety comes in many forms, and the first step to be taken in the treatment of anxiety lies in finding out what the cause is. Once the reason of the anxiety has been found out, it proves to be rather easy to cure anxiety. It is best to avoid these situations as much as possible in the beginning of your treatment so that there is no feeling of anxiety at all.

Because anxiety is a type of fear, the things we’ve described about fear above are also true for anxiety.

The word ‘anxiety’ tends to be used to describe worry, or when fear is nagging and persists over time. It is used when the fear is about something in the future rather than what is happening right now.


For those with an anxiety disorder, it’s important to look into strategies that can help manage or reduce anxiety in the long term, like talk therapy or medication. But everyone can benefit from other ways to reduce stress and anxiety with lifestyle changes such as eating a well-balanced diet, limiting alcohol and caffeine, and taking time for yourself.

Anxiety symptoms can range from the smallest things ( fidgeting) to full on panic attacks and more. Either way this can be confusing and frightening at times. Unfortunately there is not a one for all fix when it come's to stress & anxiety. In terms of anxiety treatment there is the obvious medical route , however some might want some to go down the more natural, anxiety treatment path which is where we come in. 

Fear can make some of the smallest changes seem insurmountable. If, for example, you were deeply unsatisfied with your life inside that gray clad cubicle, fear might hold you back from applying or even looking for a better job. It may even prevent you from taking advantage of the internet, which abounds with money-making opportunities. 


* Topic Coves in app are:

- How to Beat Anxiety Without Medication, According To a New Scientific Study
- How To Deal With Anxiety The Natural Way
- Ways to Help Reduce Anxiety in Children with Autism
- Things You Should Know If Your Partner Has Anxiety
- How to Overcome Job Interview Anxiety
- How To Handle Anxiety At Work So It Doesn't Destroy Your Whole Day
- Ease Anxiety
- Eliminate Panic Attacks 
- Reduce Worry and Stress
- Calm Your Mind.
- Lengthen Sleep.
- Dealing with depression.
- Fight Depression Naturally.

title: Mental illness - Treatment
description:
We often encounter people who are in bad shape, dirty clothes and strange behavior. Many people feel very frightened when approaching them. They call them "madmen." They are scientifically referred to as psychotic patients with mental illnesses or disorders. 
Symptoms of mental illness
There are many general symptoms that appear on people with mental illness:

    Act strange and surprising around him with his abnormal behaviors.
    Not knowing what is going on around him, such as time and time, since he does not care about time and does not feel it.
    Not caring for himself in general, and his personal cleanliness in particular.
    Loss of awareness of what he does he does not know why he behaves this way or what to do.
    May do some dangerous behavior on himself and on others, and can exceed the other words or already.
    Hearing and seeing things that are unreal and exist only in his mind, which leads him to speak with fictional characters.

Types of mental illness

There are many mental illnesses that can be divided into several types based on the main causes of this mental illness:

    Organic diseases resulting from a problem in the brain, such as imbalance in the brain and its cells.
    Functional diseases As a body member is unable to function normally.
    Toxic diseases, such as poisoning in some organs of the body as a result of the treatment of toxic substances.
    Mental illness may be caused by a deficiency in the amount of certain vitamins in the body, or a lack of mineral salts.
    Diseases associated with external causes, such as a strong blow to the head, causing concussion, sunburn, or various types of drugs or alcohol.
    Mental illness in children, due to problems during pregnancy.

Examples of mental illness

    Schizophrenia.
    Obsession.
    Bipolar disorder, characterized by two directions in which either joy and excessive movement and feeling euphoria, or severe depression.


The mental illness is characterized by the existence of disorders, mental illness characterized by the existence of psychotic disorders, and the mental patient is different from the mental patient that he is a scientist in his condition and that he is sick and does not imitate the characters, and his behavior is acceptable, and hallucination scare And the behavior of a person is not very clear. It is not socially acceptable, and it is often the hallucination that he lives and believes as if he reality .



Mental illness

Medical conditions involving changes in emotion, behavior, and thinking are referred to as Mental Illnesses. These diseases are associated with problems, difficulties in social, family or work activities, and mental or mental illnesses As treatable.
Types of mental illness

There are some types of mental illness, including the following:

    Anxiety.
    Late dysfunction.
    Autism disorder.
    Schizophrenia.
    Post Traumatic Stress Disorder.
    Personality Disorders.
    Obsessive-compulsive disorder.
    Multiple eating disorders, such as anorexia, or bulimia.
    Dual diagnosis.
    Personality disorders schizophrenia.
    Seasonal Affective Disorder.
    Bipolar disorder.
    Tourette syndrome.
    Attention deficit, hyperactivity.
    Panic disorder, or panic attacks.
    Depression.

title: Serenity: Guided Mental Health
description:
Serenity is a mental health chatbot that provides you with expert, confidential, and judgment-free mental health counseling and support, anytime, anywhere.
 
Serenity can help a wide range of issues including anxiety, depression, low esteem, sleep problems, and relationship conflict to name a few, using the latest research in the fields of cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT), mindfulness, and positive psychology.
 
1. Serenity helps you become conscious of the connection between your thoughts, feelings, and actions and how this connection may be preventing you from achieving good mental well-being.
 
2. Serenity helps you track changes in your mood over time as you complete regular check-ins, and helps you identify and address issues early on before they become a serious problem.
 
3. Serenity creates action plans of science-based, hands-on, and practical techniques that help you challenge negative thinking patterns and turn unhealthy coping behaviors into productive ones that improve the quality of your life.

Serenity is your companion to share your troubles--and celebrate your triumphs! Working alongside you to help you become more conscious of the connection between your thoughts, your feelings, and your actions and how this connection may be preventing you from achieving good mental well-being and improving the quality of your life.
 

Ready to gain expert insight and take action to transform your mental health? Download Serenity today and say "Hi"!


Disclaimer:
Serenity is a tool and is not a replacement for a physician, loved ones, or a crisis line.
Please seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

title: Music for Meditation
description:
With music for mindfulness meditation, people focus more, sleep better and stress less. Practicing meditation affects: stress, anxiety, falling asleep, focus, depression, happiness, self motivation, creativity, anger, pregnancy and much more. Listening to the right music for meditation greatly facilitates the attainment of profound meditation, relaxation and concentration. Improve mental and physical health.

Science proves that people who practice meditation are fighting better with stress, depression and fatigue. Reducing anxiety and stress significantly improves relationships with other people and improves quality of life.

Relax your mind and body and improve your meditation technique.
Now you can listen to music for meditation anytime and anywhere.

Meditation features:
● Self-meditation timer,
● High quality sound,
● Ability to work in the background,
● Can play with screen off and does not drain battery,
● Auto-play mode,
● Ease of use,
● Off-line operation, no data connection needed,
● Free access to all melodies (totally free app).

title: Build Confidence with Andrew Johnson
description:
Boost your confidence and self-esteem with this gentle guided meditation.

Designed to help you overcome self-doubt, this app will help you live an empowered life. Gain confidence, boost your self-belief, and learn to think positively, so that you can handle any of the day’s challenges.

With Build Confidence you’ll discover how to:

  •Be calm and in control no matter the circumstances. 
  •Build your inner strength and mental resilience for a stress-free day. 
  •Learn mindful techniques to feel relaxed and free from anxiety. 
  •Make changes and develop healthy habits. 
  •Feel calmer and be your best self – so you radiate confidence, no matter what.

Destress, improve your mindset, sleep better, grow your confidence and be healthier with guided meditations, mindfulness sessions and positive messages – and much more.

Mindfulness expert, coach and therapist Andrew Johnson has been helping people deal with life’s challenges with guided relaxations, meditations, self-care tools and breathing exercises for many years. 

His best-selling range of mindfulness apps have a variety of content to help you, whether you are looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety, lose weight, improve your health & confidence, learn relaxation techniques, etc.

Key features:

  • Short meditations you can do anywhere: at work, commuting, at home, walking.

  •Inspirational sessions to help you tackle life’s challenges, to be calm and find clarity.

  •Mindfulness stories and talks to help you build better, healthy habits.

  •Meditations to help you feel inspired and find motivated to eat well, workout and stay 
   healthy both in body and mind.

  •Relaxation techniques and tools to help you sleep better every night, to wake feeling 
   energised and refreshed.

  •Breathing exercises and calming meditations for anxiety, panic attacks and stress relief.

  •Meditation sessions to stop anxiety in its tracks and release stress.

How do I get more?

Start your day mindfully, keep feeling positive and be inspired throughout the day with a range of guided meditations to help during tough or stressful moments. Boost your energy with a Power Nap, stay focussed to Beat Procrastination, and then drift off using a Deep Sleep meditation for a restful night.

Think of Andrew as your personal mindfulness coach, always there to help when you need him most.

Search for Andrew Johnson to unlock more daily mindfulness and guided meditation sessions.

title: EMDR TriSense™
description:
EMDR TriSense™ is an app providing bilateral desensitization stimulus using three modalities. It assists an EMDR therapy session performed by a professional psychotherapist. It can also be used for general relaxation or anxiety reduction.

Use any combination for stimuli:

   ●   Audio (configurable stereo sound)
   ●   Vibration (haptic stimulus)
   ●   Visuals tracking (eye movement)

For best effects, use two smartphones (may be different type). Two handsets are required to use visual and haptic stimulus. Audio stimulus is available in both single and dual handset modes.

Other salient features:

   ●   Adjustable cycle speed, from 1 second (0.5 s per side) to 8 seconds
   ●   Support for Bluetooth headphones – finally no more wires!
   ●   Sounds with brainwave entrainment frequencies (optional)

Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR) is a safe psychotherapeutic technique that can help overcome anxiety, stress, and traumas. By applying the EMDR psychotherapy, a person can:

   ●   Decrease effect of disturbing memories
   ●   Decrease post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) symptoms
   ●   Decrease phobia and panic disorder symptoms

The EMDR protocol includes desensitization of negative emotions associated with painful memories, and consequently reprocessing those memories from a current, healthier perspective. The desensitization effect is achieved by appropriate dual attention stimulation of the left and right brain hemispheres. Under proper conditions, reprocessing happens naturally, using innate healing capacities of the brain. Eye movement is one of the ways to trigger desensitization and reprocessing, not unlike the process happening during a dreamful sleep, in the Rapid Eye Movement (REM) phase.

See for more info www.emdrtrisense.com

comments: Audio doesn't alternate? I thought the point of EMDR was to go back and forth between the right and left sides. The audio seems to be both sides at the same time.

I've been trying to find a way to do breathing with bilateral haptic feedback to enhance and support the emdr work I do each week, without spending a fortune on a kit. I don't know why your app didn't show up until today, but I'm beyond thrilled that it did. I plan on bringing it with me to my next session, to see if I can get any insights on what speed/duration has been most relaxing for me. You truly made my day.

title: June's Journey - Hidden Objects
description:
Nothing like a mystery! 

Find the hidden objects to crack every case. Solve mind teasing mysteries in the glamorous 1920s! 
Dive into June Parker's captivating quest to unveil a scandalous family secret. Escape to an era of opulent mansions and romance as you search for hidden clues through hundreds of stunning mind-teasing puzzles! 

* ARE YOU READY FOR THE JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME?* 

⭐KEEN-EYED DETECTIVES WANTED – Engage your sense of observation to find all hidden clues 

⭐YOUR 1ST CLASS TICKET TO THRILLS – Mystery! Danger! Romance! Where will each new chapter take you? 

⭐MYSTERY WITH ADDED GLAMOUR – Relax through hundreds of dazzling hidden-object scenes and customize your very own luxurious mansion and garden island 

⭐25 MILLION FANS ALREADY LOVE IT – Don't miss out on the latest hit from the makers of the mythical hidden object classic "Pearl's Peril"

You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. You may require an Internet connection to play June’s Journey and access its social features. June’s Journey may also contain advertising.
